en: The Nigerian government announced Friday it was suspending Twitter in the country, just days after Twitter deleted a harmful tweet by Nigerian President Muhammadu Buhari that suggested the state would use violence against the Igbo ethnic group.
swa: Serikali ya Naijeria imetangaza siku ya Ijumaa kwamba inaufungia mtandao wa Twita nchini humo, siku kadhaa baada ya mtandao huo kufuta twiti hatari iliyoandikwa na Rais wa Naijeria Muhammadu Buhari iliyodai kwamba serikali itatumia nguvu dhidi ya kabila la Igbo.
mt0: Huku serikali ya Nigeria ikitangaza kwamba itakuwa ikisitisha Twitter nchini humo, siku kadhaa baada ya Twitter kuondoa tweet mbaya ya Rais Muhammadu Buhari ambayo ilikuwa ikipendekeza kwamba nchi hiyo itatumia uasi dhidi ya idadi ya Igbo.

en: Despite removing the tweet, the message continues to circulate on social media, bringing up painful memories of a civil war that left more than one million dead.
swa: Pamoja na kuondolewa kwa twiti hiyo, ujumbe uliendea kusambaa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii, hali iliyokumbushia maumivu ya vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe vilivyopoteza maisha ya watu zaidi ya milioni moja.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kutafsiri swali kisha ulisema kwamba haujui. Despite removing the tweet, ujumbe unaendelea kusambaa kwenye mtandao wa kijamii, ukikumbusha enzi za uhondo uliosababisha zaidi ya watu milioni moja kufa.

en: But the tweet also sparked a movement on social media in support of Nigerians from the Igbo ethnic group.
swa: Lakini twiti hiyo ilichochea harakati kwenye mitandao ya kijamii kusimama na Wanaijeria wa kabila la Igbo.
mt0: Na tweet hiyo pia ilikuwa na uanzishaji wa umoja wa kijamii katika umoja wa kikundi cha Igbo cha Nigeria.

en: In a series of tweets posted on June 1, 2021, Buhari threatened to treat Nigerians from the eastern part of the country in the language they understand, in a reference to Nigerias 1967-1970 civil war against the secessionist Republic of Biafra, in southeastern Nigeria.
swa: Kwenye mfululizo wa twiti zilizochapishwa mnamo June 1, 2021, Buhari anatishia kuwashughulikia Wanaijeria wanaotoka kwenye sehemu ya mashariki ya nchi hiyo kwa kutumia lugha wanayoielewa, akirejea vita vya wenyewe kwa wenyewe nchini Naijeria kati ya mwaka 1967-1970 dhidi ya vuguvugu la kujitenga la Jamhuri ya Biafra, kusini mashariki mwa Naijeria.
mt0: Inaripotiwa katika tweets kadhaa zilizochapishwa mnamo Juni 1, 2021, Buhari alitishia kuwajali Nigerians kutoka katika eneo la mashariki mwa nchi kwa lugha yao inayoelewa, katika a reference to Nigerias 1967-1970 uhuru wa umoja wa nchi katika eneo la mashariki mwa Nigeria.

en: The tweets came after a series of attacks on government and security installations in the region, which have been blamed on an armed group linked to the Indigenous People of Biafra (IPOB), a pro-Biafra secessionist movement.
swa: Twiti hiyo iliandikwa baada ya mfululizo wa mashambulio dhidi ya serikali na vyombo vya usalama kwenye eneo hilo, ambalo linalaumiwa kuwa na kikundi cha kijeshi  kinachohusishwa na Wenyeji wa Biafra (IPOB), vuguvugu la watu wanaotaka sehemu ya Biafra ijitenge.
mt0: Tweets zilifuata shambulio la serikali na vituo vya usalama katika eneo hilo, ambalo limechukuliwa kuwa la ushirikiano na kundi la wananchi wa asili wa Biafra (IPOB), shirika la umoja wa nchi katika Biafra.

en: IPOB denied involvement in the attack, says the Voice of America.
swa: Kikundi hicho kimekanusha kuhusika na mashambulizi hayo, kwa mujibu wa Sauti ya Amerika.

en: For most Nigerians, the war over the breakaway state of Biafra is generally regarded as an unfortunate episode best forgotten, but for the Igbo people who fought for secession, it remains a life-defining event, asserts Nigerian writer Adaobi Tricia Nwaubani.

en: An investigation by the social media forensic expert Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) reveals that Buharis abusive tweet is still visible across numerous timelines two days after it was deleted by Twitter, due to Quote Tweets:
swa: Uchunguzi uliofanywa na mtaalam wa mtandao ya kijamii wa Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) unaonesha kwamba twiti ya vitisho iliyoandikwa na Buhari bado inaonekana kwenye akaunti kadhaa siku mbili baada ya kuwa imefutwa na Twita, shauri ya kunukuliwa na watumiaji wengine:
mt0: An investigation by the social media forensic expert Digital Africa Research Lab (DigiAfricaLab) reveals that Buhari's abusive tweet is still visible across numerous timelines two days after it was deleted by Twitter, due to Quote Tweets:

en: Over 30 hours after Twitter deleted a Tweet by Nigerian president @MBuhari for violating its rules, the deleted Tweet REMAINS VISIBLE across numerous timelines due to Quote Tweets!
swa: Zaidi ya saa 30 baada ya Twita kufuta twiti ya rais wa Naijeria @MBuhari kwa kosa la kuvunja sheria, twitiiliyofutwa BADO INAONEKANA kwenye akaunti nyingi mtandaoni kwa sababu ya kunukuliwa!
mt0: Kwa siku 30 baada ya Twitter kuondoa Tweet ya Rais wa Nigeria @MBuhari kwa kuvunja sheria zake, tweet iliyofutwa bado inapatikana katika timeline nyingi kwa sababu ya Tweets za Quote!

en: Signing onto different accounts through different devices, DigiAfricaLab was still able to view the more than 17,000 quoted tweets made by users before the social media company pulled down the offensive tweets from the timelines of @MBuhari and @NGRPresident, both verified Twitter handles of President Buhari.
swa: Kwa kuingia mtandao kwa kutumia akaunti tofauti kupitia vifaa tofauti, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kuona zaidi ya twiti 17,000 zilizonukuliwa na watumiaji kabla kampuni hiyo ya mtandao wa kijamii haijaifuta twiti hiyo kutoka kwenye akaunti ya @MBuhari na @NGRPresident, zote zikiwa ni anuani za twita zilizohakikiwa zinazotumika na Rais Buhari.
mt0: Inapatikana kwa kuingia kwenye akaunti mbalimbali kwa njia tofauti, DigiAfricaLab ilikuwa bado inaweza kuona zaidi ya tweets 17,000 zilizochapishwa na watumiaji kabla ya shirika la habari kuondoa tweets mbaya kutoka kwenye timelines za @MBuhari na @NGRPresident, zote mbili ambazo ni akaunti za uthibitisho wa Rais Buhari.

en: Furthermore, DigiAfricaLab was able to click and expand President Buharis deleted tweet.
swa: Zaidi ya hayo, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kubofya na kukuza twiti ya Rais Buhari iliypfutwa.
mt0: Kwa hiyo, DigiAfricaLab iliweza kufungua na kupanua tweet iliyofutwa na Rais Buhari.

en: Deleted tweets may still be visible to Twitter users because Twitter's software, also called, Application Programming Interface (API) relies on third-party applications that connect to Twitter servers via a URL.
swa: Twiti zil nizofutwa zinaweza kuendelea kuonekana kwa watumiaji wa mtandao wa twita kwa sababu zana inayotumiwa na Twita (API) hutegemea zana za mitandao mingine inayounganisha kazi data za Twita kwa kupitia URL.
mt0: Deleted tweets may still be visible to Twitter users because Twitter's software, also called Application Programming Interface (API) relies on third-party applications that connect to Twitter servers via a URL.

en: Another reason, according to J. D. Biersdorfer of New York Times, was that deleted tweets may still be cached away and therefore available to show up in search results  until the site goes indexing again and updates itself with a fresh copy of your Twitter profile and posts.
swa: Sababu nyingine, kwa mujibu wa  J. D. Biersdorfer wa New York Times, ni kwamba twiti zilizofutwa zinaweza kuwa bado zinapatikana na hivyo kuonekana kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji mtandaoni  mpaka tovuti ihuishwe na nakala mpya ya twiti kwenye ukurasa mkuu wa akaunti husika.
mt0: Kwa sababu nyingine, kulingana na J. D. Biersdorfer wa New York Times, tweets zilizofutwa zinaweza kuhifadhiwa bado na hivyo kupatikana kuonekana kwenye matokeo ya utafutaji mpaka wakati wa uendelezaji wa tena wa Twitter na uendelezaji wa nakala mpya ya utambulisho wako na maoni yako.

en: On March 27, a heated debate ensued on Kenyan social media about utterances made on-air by three radio hosts during a breakfast show.
swa: Mnamo Machi 27, mjadala mkali uliibuka kwenye mitandao ya kijamii ya Kenya juu ya matamshi yaliyotolewa hewani na watangazaji wa redio tatu wakati wa kipindi cha asubuhi Breakfast Show.
mt0: Inaonekana kwamba katika March 27, debate kubwa ilizuka kwenye media za Kenya kuhusu ufafanuzi uliotolewa kwenye matangazo ya radio ya asubuhi.

en: The hosts were discussing an ongoing court case involving Eunice Wangari, a woman who was pushed off a 12-floor building by a man with whom she was on a date.
swa: Watangazaji walikuwa wakijadili kesi inayoendelea ya kortini inayomshirikisha Eunice Wangari, mwanamke ambaye alisukumwa nje ya jengo la ghorofa 12 na mwanamume ambaye alikuwa na mahusiano naye.
mt0: Huku wakaribishaji wakijadili kesi inayoendelea ya Eunice Wangari, mwanamke aliyefukuzwa kutoka ghorofa ya 12 na mtu ambaye alikuwa na ndoa naye.

en: On Twitter, angered Kenyans lashed out at the presenters Shaffie Weru, Joseph Munoru, and Neville Muysa for their remarks on the case of alleged gender-based violence, and called out the hosts victim-blaming.
swa: Kwenye mtandao wa Twitter, Wakenya wenye hasira waliwaghadhabisha watangazaji Shaffie Weru, Joseph Munoru, na Neville Muysa kwa matamshi yao juu ya kesi ya madai ya unyanyasaji wa kijinsia, na kuwaita watangazaji hao wahanga-wa-kulaumu.
mt0: In Twitter, Kenyans waliokasirika walishambulia waandishi Shaffie Weru, Joseph Munoru, na Neville Muysa kwa ufafanuzi wa kesi ya ngono ya jinsia moja, na aliwakemea waandishi kwa kusema kwamba wanajihusisha na unyanyasaji.

en: Shaffie is insinuating that the lady who was pushed from the 12th floor of a building in Nairobi CBD after she said no to a man's advancements was because she was too loose & very available hence putting herself is such a situation.
swa: Shaffie anasisitiza kwamba mwanamke huyo alisukumwa kutoka gorofa ya 12 ya jengo jijini Nairobi baada ya kusema hapana kwa mwanamume ni kwa sababu alijiachia sana na kuwa huru kwa hivyo kujiweka mwenyewe katika hali kama hiyo.
mt0: Shaffie ana insinua kwamba yule mwanamke aliyefukuzwa kutoka kwenye ghorofa ya 12 ya jengo la Nairobi CBD baada ya kukataa ahadi ya mtu alikuwa kwani alikuwa msikivu sana na alikuwa mtu aliyejiweka wazi zaidi hivyo kuweka yeye mwenyewe katika hali kama hiyo.

en: And although in 2018 the country passed a law against cyberbullying  which defines the behaviour as interacting with others in a manner that is likely to cause [] apprehension or fear of violence to them or damage or loss on that persons property  with penalties of up to 10 years in prison, mass online trolling still runs rampant.

swa: Inaonekana kwamba kwa wanawake kushiriki mazungumzo ya maana mkondoni juu ya mada zinazoathiri moja kwa moja maisha yao, mtandao lazima uwe mahali salama zaidi kuliko ilivyo sasa.

en: Caribbean nations have, one by one, been readjusting their law books to reflect greater equity for LGBTQ+ people by decriminalising colonial-era sodomy clauses.
swa: Nchi za Caribiani, moja baada ya nyingine, zimekuwa zikirekebisha vitabu vyake vya sheria kuakisi usawa zaidi kwa watu wenye kupenda mapenzi ya jinsia moja kwa kuondoa vipengele vya enzi za ukoloni vilivyokuwa vinazuia tabia ya kuingiliana kinyume na maumbile.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, nchi za Caribbean zimekuwa, kila moja, zikibadilisha sheria zao ili kuonyesha ulinganifu zaidi kwa watu wa LGBTQ+ kwa kughairi sheria za zamani za unyanyasaji.

en: In 2016, it was Belize.
swa: Mwaka 2016, ilianza nchi ya Belize.
mt0: In 2016, ilikuwa Belize.

en: Two years later, Trinidad and Tobago followed suit, but the ripple effect of dismantling connected pieces of legislation has been slower in coming.
swa: Miaka miwili baadae, Trinidad na Tobago ikafuatia, ingawa hatua yake hiyo haijatafsirika kwenye mabadiliko ya sheria.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, kisha Trinidad na Tobago ilifuata, lakini athari ya kuachana na sheria zinazohusiana imekuwa ikizidi kuonekana.

en: Three years after the court deemed the country's buggery laws unconstitutional, Trinidad and Tobago's Equal Opportunity Act (EOA) finally looks set to amend its regulations pertaining to sexual orientation.
swa: Miaka mitatu baada ya mahakama kutamka wazi kwamba sheria hizo zinakwenda kinyume na katiba, hatimaye Trinadad na Tobago inaonekana iko njiani kurekebisha kanuni za Sheria ya Fursa Sawa (EOA) zinazohusiana na ushoga.
mt0: Huku miaka mitatu baada ya mahakama kuamua sheria zake mbaya kuwa haramu, Sheria ya Haki ya Msingi ya Trinidad na Tobago (EOA) sasa inaonekana kuanza kubadilisha sheria zake kuhusu uhuru wa jinsia.

en: The Act's self-proclaimed purpose is to prohibit certain kinds of discrimination and promote equality of opportunity between persons of different status.
swa: Sheria hiyo ina lengo linalosomekana kama, kuzuia aina fulani za ubaguzi na kukuza usawa wa fursa baina ya watu wenye hali tofauti.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo ulisema kwamba lengo lake ni kukataa aina fulani za unyanyasaji na kuendeleza uhuru wa haki kati ya watu wa ngazi tofauti.

en: To this end, an Equal Opportunity Commission and an Equal Opportunity Tribunal were established to handle such issues but so far, neither body has been unable to deal with matters of discrimination based on sexual orientation.
swa: Kwa minajili ya lengo hiyo,  Tume ya Fursa na Mahakama ya Fursa Sawa zilianzishwa ili kushughulikia masuala hayo lakini mpaka sasa, vyombo hivyo vinashindwa kushughulikia masuala ya ubaguzi dhidi ya ushoga.
mt0: Kwa hiyo, Bodi ya Haki za Msingi na Mahakama ya Haki za Msingi ilianzishwa ili kushughulikia masuala haya lakini kwa sasa, bado neither shirika imeshindwa kushughulikia masuala ya discrimination inayotokana na jinsia.

en: The current laws only cover discrimination based on sex, race, ethnicity, origin, religion, marital status, or disability in matters of employment, training, education, and the like.
swa: Sheria zilizopo zinashughulikia ubaguzi wa kijinsia, rangi, kabila, asili, dini, hali ya ndoa, au ulemavu kwenye masuala ya ajira, mafunzo, elimu na kadhalika.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know The current laws only cover discrimination based on sex, race, ethnicity, origin, religion, marital status, or disability in matters of employment, training, education, and the like.

en: Pressure to amend the current Act mounted after Scotiabank Trinidad and Tobago announced on April 14 that it would extend its health benefits to the partners of employees in same-sex relationships, in the same way it already offered access to the common-law partners of heterosexual employees.
swa: Shinikizo la kurekebisha Sheria ya sasa liliongezeka baada ya Benki ya Scotiabank nchini Trinidad na Tobago kutangaza mnamo Aprili 14 kwamba itapanua wigo wa huduma za afya kwa wenzi wa waajiriwa walio kwenye mahusiano ya jinsia moja, kwa namna ile ile ilivyo kwa wenzi wa waajiriwa wa jinsia tofauti.
mt0: Huku uwezekano wa kubadilisha sheria ukaongezeka baada ya Scotiabank Trinidad na Tobago kutangaza mnamo Aprili 14 kwamba itakuwa itapanua ufadhili wa afya kwa wenzi wa wafanyakazi katika uhusiano wa jinsia moja, kama ilivyokuwa inavyopanua ufadhili wa afya kwa wenzi wa wafanyakazi wa jinsia moja.

en: The announcement sparked a nationwide conversation and was praised by the American Chamber of Commerce (AMCHAM) and Ian Roach, chairman of the Equal Opportunity Commission, who noted in an interview with the Trinidad and Tobago Newsday:
swa: Tangazo hilo liliibua majadiliano makali nchini humo na pia kupongezwa na Chemba ya Biashara ya Marekani (AMCHAM) na Ian Roach, mwenyekiti wa Tume ya Fursa Sawa, aliyenukuliwa katika majadiliano yake na gazeti la Newsday la Trinidad na Tobago akisema:
mt0: Habari hiyo ilianzisha mjadala nchini kote na ilikaribishwa na Chama cha Biashara cha Marekani (AMCHAM) na Ian Roach, mwenyekiti wa Bodi ya Haki za Binadamu, katika mahojiano na Trinidad na Tobago Newsday.

en: It is a good move on the part of the private sector and especially by the bank, who has a wide cross-section of employees.
swa: Ni hatua nzuri kwa upande wa sekta binafsi na hasa kwa benki, ambayo ina waajiriwa wa aina mbalimbali.
mt0: Ni hatua nzuri kwa serikali na hasa kwa benki, ambayo ina idadi kubwa ya wafanyakazi.

en: It is important that the others should follow suit, past what the law insists.
swa: Ni muhimu na wengine wakaiga hatua hii, pamoja na kile ambacho sheria inasisitiza.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Attorney General Faris Al-Rawi has said he is encouraged by Scotiabank's inclusive initiative and remains open to doing what is necessary to address the spectrums of discrimination that exist.
swa: Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Serikali Faris Al-Rawi amesema ametiwa moyo na hatua hiyo ya Benki ya Scotiabank kulinda haki za watu na kwamba milango iko wazi kufanya kile kinachohitajika ili kuondoa aina mbalimbali za ubaguzi unaoendelea kuwepo nchini humo.
mt0: Huku akiwa na uhuru wa kusema kwamba alikuwa anaunga mkono jitihada za Scotiabank za kuendeleza uhuru na yuko tayari kufanya kila kitu kinachohitajika ili kukabiliana na aina zote za unyanyasaji.

en: Al-Rawi's stance is markedly different from his position after the 2018 High Court ruling; soon after the unconstitutional verdict was handed down, the state announced its intention to appeal.
swa: Msimamo huo wa Al-Rawi unaonekana kubadilika kulingana na msimamo aliokuwa nao baada ya Hukumu ya Mahakama Kuu ya 2018; mara tu baada ya uamuzi usio wa kikatiba kutolewa, serikali ilitangaza nia yake ya kukata rufaa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uamuzi wa Al-Rawi unabadilika sana na uamuzi wake wa 2018 wa Mahakama Kuu; baada ya uamuzi huo usio wa kisheria kuchukuliwa, serikali ilitangaza nia ya kupinga.

en: While Trinidad and Tobago has undeniably made great strides when it comes to discrimination for members of the local LGBTQ+ community, homophobiamuch of it rationalised on religious groundsstill exists.
swa: Wakati Trinidad na Tobago zimefanya maendeleo makubwa kwenye kuondoa aina mbalimbali za ubaguzi, lakini linapokuja suala la ubaguzi dhidi ya mashoga wa nchi hiyo, hofu ya mashogakwa kutumia hoja za kidinibado hali haijabadilika sana.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. While Trinidad na Tobago imefanya mabadiliko makubwa katika unyanyasaji kwa watu wa LGBTQ+, homophobia ambayo imeratibiwa kwa sababu ya imani bado inapatikana.

en: Public reactions to Scotiabank's announcement on social media networking platforms like Facebook were met with lots of criticism.
swa: Kwa kutazama mwitikio wa wananchi dhidi ya tangazo la Benki ya Scotiabank kwenye majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii kama Facebook upinzani ulikuwa mkubwa.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile, LGBTQ+ people continue to face not just discrimination, but acts of violence, many of them ending fatally.
swa: Wakati huo huo, mashoga wanaendelea si tu kukabiliana na ubaguzi, lakini pia vitendo vya ukatili, vingi vikiishia kwa kupoteza maisha.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Most recently, the murder of Marcus Anthony Singh, a member of the local LGBTQ+ community, sparked online conversations about the reality that many LGBTQ+ people face in terms of both security and discriminatory practices.
swa: Katika tukio la hivi karibuni,  kifo cha Marcus Anthony Singh, mwanachama wa chama cha mashoga kwenye eneo analoishi, kiliibua mjadala mzito mtandao kuhusu mazingira magumu ambayo mashoga wanakabiliana nayo hususani usalama wao sambamba na vitendo vya ubaguzi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri ukweli ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Many of those conversations have been happening on Twitter Spaces, which provide an audio-only chat forum for safe discussion and education.
swa: Mazungumzo hayo mengi yamekuwa yakifanyika kupitia teknolojia ya Twitter Spaces, jukwaa la mazungumzo ya sauti linalowezesha mijadala na elimu salama.
mt0: Mambo mengi ya hizi mazungumzo yamekuwa yakifanyika kwenye Twitter Spaces, ambayo inatoa forum ya mazungumzo ya audio pekee kwa ajili ya mazungumzo ya salama na elimu.

en: While Attorney General Al Rawi has not provided a timeline by which the amendments to the legislation will be tackled, for the LGBTQ+ community and its allies, the hope remains that moves by private sector companies like Scotiabank will soon be followed by the government, eventually leading to societal change.
swa: Wakati Mwanasheria Mkuu wa Serikali Al Rawi hajatoa muda rasmi wa kufanyika mabadiliko hayo ya sheria, kwa mashoga na washirika wao, matumaini yanabaki kwamba huenda hatua zinazochukuliwa na makampuni binafsi kama Benki ya Scotiabank si muda mrefu zitaanza kuchukuliwa na serikali, na hatimaye kuleta mabadiliko yenye sura ya jamii nzima.
mt0: Kama Attorney General Al Rawi hajatoa ufafanuzi wa muda wa kushughulikia mabadiliko ya sheria, kwa ajili ya jumuiya ya LGBTQ+ na wenzi wake, bado inatarajiwa kwamba hatua za serikali kama Scotiabank zitafuata, ambayo itapelekea mabadiliko ya kijamii.

en: For internet and technology companies, collecting user data remains one of their main sources of income.
swa: Kwa kampuni za mtandao wa intaneti na teknolojia, ukusanyaji wa taarifa za watumiaji wa mtandao wa intaneti umekuwa ni chanzo chao kikuu cha kujipatia kipato.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri kisha ulisema kwamba haujui. Kwa kampuni za internet na teknolojia, kukusanya data ya watumiaji bado ni mojawapo ya njia zao kuu za mapato.

en: But this business model includes a security risk for users, as demonstrated by recurring cases of undisclosed commercial use, massive leaks, and hacking incidents.
swa: Hata hivyo, namna hii ya kujipatia kipato inawaweka hatarini watumiaji kama inavyojidhihirisha katika matukio ya mara kwa mara ya uwekaji wazi wa taarifa za kibiashara, uvujaji mkubwa wa taarifa na udukuaji.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hili, uthibitisho wa usalama kwa watumiaji unaonyesha kwamba utumiaji wa shirika huwa na uwezekano wa kushambuliwa, uharibifu mkubwa, na uharibifu wa usalama.

en: Is there a credible solution for strengthening users privacy?
swa: Je, kuna njia muafaka ya kuboresha haki ya faragha ya watumiaji wa mtandao wa intaneti?
mt0: Je, kuna suluhisho la ukweli kwa ajili ya kuongeza usalama wa watumiaji?

en: Companies such as Google and Apple focus on collecting daily user data, mostly via smartphones, and combining information from the applications running over time: the user's contacts and agenda, for example.
swa: Kampuni kama vile Google na Apple zimewekeza nguvu kukusanya kila siku taarifa za wateja wao, haswa kupitia simu za mkononi, na muunganiko wa vitumizi mbalimbali vinavyotumiwa mara kwa mara kama vile kalenda na ajenda.
mt0: Kama shirika kama Google na Apple, wanazingatia kukusanya data za watumiaji kila siku, hasa kwa smartphones, na kuchanganya habari kutoka kwa programu zinazofanya kazi kwa muda: majina ya watumiaji na agenda, kwa mfano.

en: A multitude of apps track the user's location in real time, while health and sports apps dig deep into their biometric information.
swa: Vitumizi kadha wa kadha vimekuwa vikifuatilia mahali halisi mtu alipo, na kwa upande mwingine vitumizi vya masuala ya afya na michezo vikijikita katika kukusanya taarifa za vinasaba vya wateja.
mt0: Mwingi wa apps huwafuatilia watumiaji katika eneo lao kwa wakati halisi, wakati apps za afya na michezo huwachunguza habari zao za biometric.

en: This data is collected and analyzed, allegedly to offer more tailored and sophisticated services.
swa: Inaaminika kuwa, taarifa hizi zinakusanywa na kuchanganuliwa kwa lengo la kumrahisishia na kumpatia mtumiaji kile anachokihitaji kwa haraka.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hili, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: In fact, most users do not realize they are offering a wealth of data to service providers and platform owners, free of charge.
swa: Hata hivyo, ukweli ni kwamba, watumiaji wa intaneti na vitumizi vya kiteknolojia hawafahamu kuwa, wanatoa taarifa zao bure bila ya malipo yoyote.
mt0: In fact, wengi watumiaji hawajui kwamba wanatoa idadi kubwa ya data kwa wakala na wamiliki wa platform, bure.

en: They highlight the risks of increasingly frequent privacy violations and abuses.
swa: Anaangazia hatari ya ongeseko la matukio ya mara kwa mara ya unyanyasaji na ukiukwaji wa sheria ya haki ya faragha.
mt0: Hukuonyesha hatari ya unyanyasaji na unyanyasaji wa kibinafsi ulioongezeka.

en: This was perhaps best illustrated by the Facebook scandal known as the Cambridge Analytica case  in which British consulting firm Cambridge Analytica obtained the personal data of 87 million Facebook users without consent, in order to provide analytical assistance to the 2016 presidential campaigns of Ted Cruz and Donald Trump.
swa: Moja ya matukio kama haya pengine yameelezwa vizuri sana kupitia tukio la skendo ya Facebook linalofahamika kama kesi ya Cambridge Analytica ambapo Taasisi binafsi ya ushauri ya Cambridge Analytica ilijikusanyia taarifa binafsi za watumiaji milioni 87 wa Facebook bila idhini yao kwa lengo la  kuwasaidia wagombea kiti cha Urais Ted Cruz na Donald Trump mapema mwaka 2016.
mt0: Hii labda ilikuwa zaidi inayoonyesha katika kesi ya Facebook inayojulikana kama Cambridge Analytica, ambapo kampuni ya ushauri ya Uingereza Cambridge Analytica ilipata data za kibinafsi za watu milioni 87 bila idhini, ili kutoa ushauri wa siasa kwa Ted Cruz na Donald Trump.

en: Schrems says he warned Facebook representatives about the data-mining activities of Cambridge Analytica, but could not convince them to act:
swa: Schrems anasema kuwa aliwatahadharisha wawakilishi wa Facebook kuhusu matukio ya ukusanyaji taarifa za wateja wao uliokuwa unafanywa na taasisi ya Cambridge Analytica, na hata hivyo, hakuweza kuwashawishi kuchukua hatua:
mt0: Schrems alisema kwamba aliwaambia wawakilishi wa Facebook kuhusu shughuli za kutafsiri data za Cambridge Analytica, lakini hakuweza kuwashawishi kufanya hivyo:

en: They [Facebook representatives] explicitly said that in their view, by using the platform you consent to a situation where other people can install an app and gather your data.
swa: Wawakilishi wa Facebook bila kumumunya maneno walisema kuwa kwa maoni yao, unapotumia jukwaa la mmiliki fulani unakuwa umeruhusu watu hao wapakie vitumizi vyao [kwenye simu za mkononi na vifaa vingine] kwa ajili ya kukusanya taarifa za mtumiaji.
mt0: [Facebook representatives] explicitly said that in their view, by using the platform you consent to a situation where other people can install an app and collect your data.

en: French software engineer and data expert Gal Duval has been involved for years in free software development, including the Mandrake Linux distribution  an operating system (based on a Linux kernel) which can legally be modified and shared with others.
swa: Mhandisi wa Kifaransa wa vitumizi vya kompyuta na mtaalam wa masuala ya data, Gal Duval amejihusisha kwa muda mrefu katika uundaji wa vitumizi vya kompyuta ikiwa ni pamoja na kitumizi cha Linux cha Mandrake ambao ni mfumo endeshi(wenye mrengo wa keneli ya Linux) ambao kila mtu ana haki ya kuuboresha na kisha kutumiwa na wengine.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uthibitishe tu kwamba wewe hujui. Mhandisi wa programu na mtaalamu wa data wa Kifaransa Gal Duval amekuwa akishiriki kwa miaka mingi katika uendelezaji wa programu za bure, ikiwa ni pamoja na uendelezaji wa uendeshaji wa Linux (katika kernel ya Linux) ambayo inaweza kubadilika na kushirikishwa na wengine.

en: Duval then decided to build an OS that would provide smartphones users with heightened protection of their data: /e/OS.
swa: Duval aliamua kuunda mfumo endeshi ambao unaosaidia kutoa ulinzi wa uhakika wa taarifa za watumiaji wa simu za mkononi: /e/OS.
mt0: Duval kisha akaamua kujenga OS ambayo ingewapa watumiaji wa smartphones usalama mkubwa wa data zao: /e/OS.

en: Global Voices spoke to him to understand how communication technology impacts lives, and present both an opportunity and a risk.

en: I personally have very mixed feelings about it because I've always been passionate about technology.

en: Younger people might be surprised to know that until I was five, there was no phone at home and no television.
swa: Vijana wanaweza kushangaa kuwa, hadi nilipofikisha miaka mitano, nyumbani hakukuwa na simu wala runinga.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba watu wenye umri mkubwa wanaweza kushangaa kujua kwamba kabla ya miaka mitano, hakukuwa na simu nyumbani na televisheni.

en: So sometimes I feel I lived a part of my life in a totally different world, that doesn't exist anymore.
swa: Kuna wakati ninawaza kuwa niliishi maisha ya ulimwengu tofauti kabisa,  na ambayo kwa sasa hayapo kabisa.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: On the other hand, it's really exciting to see what we can do with modern technology, like having an HD video call with someone on the other side of the planet, and seeing all those electric cars that, at least, are not burning petrol and [filling] our lungs with the exhaust fumes.
swa: Kwa upande mwingine, inafurahisha sana haswa tunapojaribu kuwaza ni jambo gani tunaweza kufanya kwa uwepo wa teknolojia za kisasa, kama vile kuwasiliana na mtu aliye sehemu tofauti kabisa ya ulimwengu kupitia picha za video za ubora wa hali ya juu sambamba na kushuhudia magari ya umeme yasiyotumia petroli inayojaza mapafu yetu kwa moshi hatari.
mt0: Kama sio hivyo, ni kweli ajabu kuona kile tunachoweza kufanya na teknolojia ya sasa, kama kufanya video ya HD na mtu katika upande mwingine wa dunia, na kuona magari ya ndani ya nchi ambayo, kwa ujumla, sio kuokoa petroli na [kutupa] hewa ya hewa ya ndani.

en: Besides the seductive dangers of nostalgia for those who still remember analog times, we are also facing a real risk of dependence on information technology.
swa: Kwa wale wanaokumbuka, ukiachilia raha na karaha za miaka ya kipindi cha mfumo wa analogia, kwa sasa tunakabiliana na hatari kubwa ya utegemezi kwenye teknolojia ya habari.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, kisha ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: A 2018 study linked behavioral problems in children with excessive use of smartphones, which was shown to cause issues including attention deficit disorder (ADD) and depression.
swa: Utafiti uliofanyika mwaka 2018 uliohusisha  matatizo ya kitabia ya watoto na mazoea yaliyopitiliza ya matumizi ya simu janja , ulibaini kuwa, matumizi makubwa ya simu janja hupelekea matatizo kadha wa kadha yakiwemo Tatizo la Kukosa Umakini (ADD) na sonona.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: A survey published in 2020 by Common Sense Media found that 50 percent of teenagers in the Los Angeles area feel dependent on their smartphones.
swa: Utafiti uliochapishwa mwaka 2020 na Common Sense Media ulibaini kuwa  asilimia 50 ya vijana katika jimbo la Los Angeles walisema wasingeweza kukaa bila kutumia simu janja zao .
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: The risk inherent in our use of such technology was recently openly acknowledged by insiders from the industry in the Netflix documentary The Social Dilemma, which includes testimonials from former employees of Big Tech  including Google, Twitter and Facebook  explaining how they purposefully nurtured user addiction for profit.
swa: Madhara yatokanayo na matumizi ya teknolojia hizi hivi karibuni yaliwekwa bayana na vyanzo vya kuaminika katika makala ya Netflix ya  The Social Dilemma, ambayoinayoelezea ushuhuda wa wafanyakazi wa zamani wa kampuni kubwa zikiwemo Google, Twitter na Facebook  wanaoelezea ni kwa namna gani walivyokuwa wanaweka mazingira ya kushawishi mtumiaji kujenga uraibu wa vutumizi kwa minajili ya vipato.
mt0: Inaonekana kwamba uwezekano wa kutumia teknolojia kama hizi umekwisha kutambuliwa waziwazi na insiders kutoka kwa sekta hiyo katika The Social Dilemma, ambayo ina ushuhuda wa awali wa watu wa teknolojia kama vile Google, Twitter na Facebook wakieleza jinsi teknolojia hizi zilitaka kuendeleza usumbufu kwa watumiaji kwa faida.

en: Some governments have reacted by upgrading protective legislation in order to both raise user awareness and place more responsibility on technology companies.
swa: Baadhi ya serikali zimejaribu kukabiliana na tatizo hili kwa kuboresha sheria ili kujenga uelewa wa watumiaji sambamba na kuongeza uwajibikaji kwa makampuni husika.
mt0: Mkuu, angalia tu sheria za usalama ambazo serikali kadhaa zimebadilika ili kuongeza uelewa wa watumiaji na kuweka wajibu zaidi kwa kampuni za teknolojia.

en: In May 2018, the European Union passed the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR).
swa: Mwaka 2018, Umoja wa Ulaya (EU) ulipitisha  Sheria Mama ya Ulinzi wa Taarifa (GDPR).
mt0: In May 2018, Umoja wa Ulaya ilisaini Sheria ya Usalama wa Data (GDPR).

en: The law adds multiple constraints to data management, such as asking users for explicit authorization for the use of their data and requiring companies to remove this data after a period of three years without interaction.
swa: Sheria hii imeongeza matakwa kadhaa kuhusu utunzaji wa taarifa ikiwamo kupata ridhaa isiyo na shaka ya mtumiaji kuhusu taarifa zake na kuyataka makampuni husika kuondoa taarifa hizi baada ya kipindi cha miaka mitatu bila kushurutishwa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, ueleze tu kwamba sheria inaweka kizuizi kadhaa kwenye usimamizi wa data, kama kuuliza watumiaji kukubaliana kwa utumiaji wa data zao na kulazimisha kampuni kuondoa data hiyo baada ya miaka mitatu bila ushirikiano.

en: It also introduces extremely large fines for those who do not respect these rules.
swa: Pia, sheria hii imeweka fidia kubwa kwa wale ambao hawataheshimu kanuni hizi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hizi usiogope kusema kwamba haujui.

en: But its enforcement is limited by a lack of resources to do so among local authorities, and it is, of course, only applicable in EU member states.
swa: Hata hivyo, utekelezaji wake unakabiliwa na ukosefu wa vitendea kazi katika mamlaka za serikali, na pia, sheria hii inayahusu tu mataifa wanachama wa Umoja wa Ulaya.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uthibitishe tu kwamba haujui.

mt0: A tool to empower users

swa: Kwa jinsi hali ya mambo ilivyo sasa, Duval alishawishika kuandaa nyenzo itakayowawezesha watu kuchukua jukumu la kulinda taarifa zao wenyewe, kama anavyoelezea:

en: /e/ is a digital ecosystem that provides a smartphone operating system that doesn't send [to Google] any piece of your personal data, like your searches, your geolocation and that respects users data privacy.
swa: /e/ ni mfumo endeshi msawazo wa kidigitali wa simu janja ambao hautumi taarifa yoyote [kwenda Google] kama vile unapoperuzi, mahali ulipo na unaozingatia faragha ya mtumiaji.
mt0: /e/ ni mfumo wa kidigitali unaowezesha uendeshaji wa simu ambayo haiwezi kupeleka [Google] habari yoyote ya kibinafsi kama utafutaji wako, ueneo wako na ambayo inaheshimu uhuru wa watumiaji.

en: It doesn't look at the user's data for any purpose.
swa: Mfumo huu haukagui kwa namna yoyote taarifa binafsi za mtumiaji.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know It doesn't look at the user's data for any purpose.

en: It also provides basic online services such as an email address, some storage, a calendar, a way to store your contacts  everything linked with the smartphone operating system.
swa: Unatoa pia huduma za msingi   za mtandaoni kama vile barua pepe, hifadhi, kalenda, kuhifadhi mawasiliano  kila kitu kinachohusiana na mfumo endeshi wa simu janja.
mt0: Inatoa huduma za msingi za mtandao kama upatikanaji wa barua pepe, hifadhidata, kalenda, njia ya kuhifadhi majina yako yote yaliyounganishwa na mfumo wa smartphone.

en: Duval said that when it comes to personal data, Google and Apple are in the same boat  this data fuels Google's business model, which is essentially based on selling advertising, while Apple, despite claiming to protect its users privacy, receives an estimated 8 billion to 12 billion US dollars each year to pre-install Google search on iPhones and iPads.
swa: Duval anasema kwamba, linapokuja suala la taarifa binafsi za mtu, Google na Apple wana malengo yanayofanana  taarifa hizi zinapalilia mfumo wa kibiashara wa Google, ambao kimsingi unategemea  bilioni 8 hadi 12 kila mwaka kwa ajili ya kuweka kitumizi cha kuperuzi cha Google kwenye iPhones na iPads.
mt0: Duval alisema kwamba katika habari za kibinafsi, Google na Apple ni katika umoja huu. Data hii huendesha mfumo wa biashara wa Google, ambayo ni katika uendelezaji wa matangazo, lakini Apple, licha ya kusema kulinda uhuru wa watumiaji wake, hupokea takriban dola 8 billion hadi 12 billion kwa mwaka ili kuweka Google Search kwenye iPhones na iPads.

en: In a context of growing dependence on smartphones, it is clear that protective legislation is not enough to raise awareness and equip users with the right tools and knowledge to protect their data privacy  and this is where a digital tool that makes users more responsible and proactive can play an important role.
swa: Katika mazingira ya ongezeko kubwa la matumizi ya simu janja,  ni dhahiri kuwa sheria pekee hazitoshi katika kujenga uelewa na kuwapatia watumiaji nyenzo sahihi na maarifa ya kulinda taarifa zao  na hapa ndipo unapokuja umuhimu wa nyenzo za kidigitali zinazowasaidia watumiaji kuwajibika zaidi
mt0: Inaonekana wazi kwamba sheria za usalama haziwezi kusaidia kuongeza ufahamu na kuwapa watumiaji zana na maarifa ya kutosha ili kulinda uhuru wa data zao na hapo ndipo kwamba mbinu za digitali ambazo huwafanya watumiaji wawe wenye uwajibikaji na kushirikiana zinaweza kucheza jukumu muhimu.

en: Information and awareness is important to prevent the spread of COVID-19.

mt0: Habari na ujuzi ni muhimu ili kuepuka kusambaa kwa COVID-19.

en: Here in Kenya, clinical health care workers are sensitising the community on COVID-19.

en: Kenyas COVID-19 vaccination rollout has been mired by allegations of bribery, line cutting and corruption that have left poor and elderly citizens waiting in long queues outside public hospitals even as the country grapples with a third wave of infections and deaths.
swa: Kuanza kutolewa kwa chanjo ya UVIKO-19 nchini Kenya kumegubikwa na tuhuma za vitendo vya rushwa, upendeleo na ufisadi ambavyo vimewaacha wananchi wengi masikini na wazee wakisubiri kwenye mistari mirefu nje ya hospitali za umma wakati huu ambao nchi hiyo inakabiliwa na mlipuko wa tatu wa maambukizi na vifo vinavyotokana na UVIKO-19.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile, hundreds of well-connected Kenyans are paying anything up to $100 to secretly receive early inoculations, as documented through eyewitness accounts by various Kenyans online and news coverage in Kenyan and international media.
swa: Wakati huo huo, mamia ya Wakenya wanalipa kiasi cha hadi dola 100 ili waweze kuitwa mapema, kama ilivyoelezwa kwenye akaunti kadhaa za Wakenya mtandaoni sambamba na vyombo vya habari vya Kenya na vile vya kimataifa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa, idadi kubwa ya watu walio wenye uhusiano na Kenya wanalipa hadi $100 kwa ajili ya kupokea early inoculations, kama ilivyorekodiwa na ripoti za habari za Kenya na kimataifa.

en: In early March, Kenya procured over 1 million doses of Oxford-AstraZeneca vaccine doses through the COVID-19 Vaccines Global Access initiative, a World Health Organization-backed global vaccine distribution effort known as COVAX.
swa: Mapema mwezi Machi, Kenya ilinunua zaidi ya dozi milioni 1 za chanjo ya Oxford-AstraZeneca kupitia mpango wa Upatikanaji wa Chanjo ya UVIKO-19 Duniani, inayoratibiwa na Shirika la Afya Duniani kupitia utaratibu unaoitwa COVAX.
mt0: In early March, Kenya ilikuwa imepata zaidi ya 400,000 doses za vaksini ya Oxford-AstraZeneca kwa njia ya upatikanaji wa vaksini ya COVID-19 Global Access initiative, shughuli ya upatikanaji wa vaksini ya kimataifa inayoendeshwa na WHO inayojulikana kama COVAX.

en: The delivery marked the start of a campaign to offer the vaccine free of charge at select public and private hospitals.
swa: Kupokelewa kwa chanjo hizo kulianzisha kampeni ya kutoa chanjo bure katika hospitali teule za umma na binafsi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sakramenti hiyo ilikuwa mwanzo wa kampeni ya kutoa vaksini bure kwa hospitali kadhaa za umma na za kibinafsi.

en: The rollout was broken down into three phases: healthcare workers and security and immigration officials, citizens over age 58 and adults with certain medical conditions, and other citizens in vulnerable conditions such as those living in informal settlements.
swa: Kutolewa kwa dawa hizo kuligawanywa katika hatua tatu: watumishi wa afya na maafisa usalama na uhamiaji, wananchi wenye umri zaidi ya miaka 58 na watu wazima wenye changamoto mbalimbali za afya, na wananchi wengine wanaoishi kwenye mazingira hatarishi kama wale wanaoishi kwenye makazi yasiyo rasmi.
mt0: Huku ukishindwa kutafsiri uhamisho uligawanywa katika hatua tatu: wagonjwa na wahudumu wa usalama na uhamiaji, watu zaidi ya miaka 58 na watu wenye magonjwa maalum, na watu wengine wenye hali ngumu kama vile wanaoishi katika kambi huru.

en: The country is set to receive 24 million doses through COVAX.

mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know The country is set to receive 24 million doses through COVAX.

en: It plans to vaccinate 50 percent of the population by June 2022 through a combination of COVAX vaccines and donations from other countries, reports The Washington Post.
swa: Kwa mujibu wa jarida la The Washington Post, Kenya inalenga kuchanja asimilia 50 ya wananchi wake ifikapo Juni 2022 kwa ushirikiano kati ya mradi wa COVAX na misaada kutoka mataifa mengine.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uambie tu kwamba haujui.

en: With the arrival of these vaccines, UNICEF and partners are honouring the promise of the COVAX facility to ensure people from less wealthy countries are not left behind in the global rollout of life-saving vaccines, she said.
swa: Kufuatilia kuwasili kwa chanjo hizi, UNICEF na washirika wake wanapongeza ahadi ya COVAX kuhakikisha kuwa watu wanaotoka kwenye nchi zisizo na uwezo mkubwa kiuchumi hawaachwi nyuma kwenye mpango huu wa kimataifa wa kuokoa maisha ya watu kwa chanjo, alisema.

en: In his article questioning what is going on with Kenyas COVID-19 vaccine drive, Patrick Gathara, a Nairobi-based writer and award-winning political cartoonist noted:

en: Politicians loudly and self-servingly argued that they should be given priority to inspire confidence among the population, even though the Ministry of Health was reporting encountering little resistance.
swa: Kwa sauti kubwa na ubinafsi, wanasiasa walidai kwamba wao ndio wanaopaswa kupewa kipaumbele ili kuwajengea imani wananchi, ingawa Wizara ya Afya tayari ilisharipoti kutokuwepo kwa upinzani mkubwa wa chanjo hiyo.

en: Because the state had ignored the need to explain its plan to the population, there was widespread confusion about where and when people were expected to be in line.
swa: Kwa kuwa serikali imepuuza takwa la kueleza mpango wake kwa wananchi, kulikuwa na mkanganyiko mkubwa kuhusu wapi na lini watu wanatarajiwa kusimama kwenye mstari.
mt0: Kama serikali haikuelewa hitaji la kueleza mpango wake kwa umma, ulikuwa na utata mkubwa kuhusu mahali na wakati watu walitarajiwa kusimama.

en: Despite government directives prioritizing citizens over the age of 58, Kenyan media reported that businessmen and politicians not in this age group have found a way to get the jab early, exposing the country's rich-poor divide.
swa: Pamoja na maelekezo ya serikali  kuwapa kipaumbele wananchi wenye umri wa zaidi ya miaka 58,  vyombo vya habari nchini Kenya viliripoti kwamba wafanyabiashara na wanasiasa wasio kwenye kundi la umri huu wamekuwa wakipata huduma kinyume na utaratibu, hali inayoonesha ubaguzi mkubwa wa masikini unaofanywa na wenye fedha.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kuelewa, ukweli ni kwamba serikali imeweka sheria ya kuzingatia watu wenye umri wa miaka 58, lakini habari za Kenya zinasema kuwa watu wasio katika umri huu wamepata njia ya kupata tiba mapema, kuonyesha ulinganifu kati ya watu wenye umri huu na watu wasio katika umri huu.

en: Meanwhile, eligible senior citizens and poor Kenyans, who aren't well connected and don't have money to pay a bribe, often wait in line all day starting at 5 a.m., only to be asked to return the following day because the doses are finished, according to The Washington Post.

en: In early March, as Tanzanians began to speculate about the health and location of President John Magufuli, many citizens took to social media with their queries and concerns.
swa: Mwanzoni mwa mwezi Machi, wakati wa-Tanzania walipoanza kuhoji afya na mahali alipo Rais John Magufuli, raia wengi walitumia mitandao ya kijamii kuuliza maswali na hata kuonesha wasiwasi wao.
mt0: In early March, Tanzanians began to speculate about the health and location of President John Magufuli, many citizens took to social media with their questions and concerns.

en: In response, the government issued threats of mass arrests to anyone who used social media to share false information about the president.
swa: Katika kujibu maswali hayo, serikali ilitishia kumkamata mtu yeyote aliyetumia mitandao ya kijamii kusambaza taarifa potofu kuhusu rais.
mt0: In response, serikali ilituma tishio la ukamataji wa watu wote waliotumia mtandao wa kijamii kueneza habari uongo kuhusu rais.

en: Authorities swiftly referred to Tanzanias 2015 Cybercrimes Act, and the 2020 Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations (EPOCA) to arrest and detain those who violated its rules.
swa: Mamlaka za serikali zilirejea Sheria ya Makosa ya Mtandao ya Tanzania ya mwaka 2015 na Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandao) (EPOCA) zilizotungwa mwaka 2020 kuelezea uwezekano wa kuwakamata na kuwaweka ndani wote waliovunja sheria hizo.

en: The government has often used cybercrime laws and online content regulations to undermine and clamp down on digital rights and freedom of expression in Tanzania, this time was no different.
swa: Huu ulikuwa ni mwendelezo wa hatua za serikali, ambayo mara kadhaa, imetumia sheria za makosa ya mtandao na kanuni za maudhui ya mtandaoni kudhibiti na kubana haki za kidijitali na uhuru wa maoni nchini Tanzania.
mt0: Return only. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know. The government has often used cybercrime laws and online content regulations to undermine and clamp down on digital rights and freedom of expression in Tanzania, this time was no different.

en: On March 17, then-Vice President Samia Suluhu Hassan revealed on state TV that John Magufuli had died.

en: Soon after, Hassan was sworn in as the sixth president of Tanzania.

en: By then, at least four people had been arrested in different parts of the country for spreading false rumors about Magufulis health and location.

en: Many now wonder if Tanzania will review its repressive online content regulations in a post-Magufuli world, or whether these laws will remain firmly in place until 2025- the remainder of Magufuli's term served by Hassan.
swa: Wengi hivi sasa wanajiuliza ikiwa Tanzania itapitia upya kanuni zake zinazodhibiti maudhui ya mtandaoni baada ya utawala wa Magufuli, au ikiwa sheria hizi zitaendelea kutumika mpaka mwaka 2025  kipindi cha Magufuli kilichobaki kitakachokamilishwa na Rais Samia Hassan.
mt0: Many sasa wanauliza ikiwa Tanzania itaangalia sheria za kijamii za kisasa za habari za kijamii katika ulimwengu uliopo baada ya Magufuli, au ikiwa sheria hizi zitakuwa chini ya utawala wa Hassan mpaka 2025- katika kipindi cha utawala wa Magufuli.

en: In early March, Innocent Bashungwa, Tanzanias Minister of Information, Culture, Arts and Sports, issued a warning specifically to the media to desist from spreading rumors about Magufulis whereabouts, who had not been seen in the public eye since February 27.
swa: Mapema mwezi Machi, Innocent Bashungwa, Waziri wa Habari, Utamaduni, Sanaa na Michezo wa Tanzania, alitoa tahadhari kwa vyombo vya habari kuepuka kusambaza uvumi kuhusu  aliko Magufuli, ambaye wakati huo alikuwa hajaonekana hadharani tangu Februari 27.
mt0: In early March, Innocent Bashungwa, Tanzania's Minister of Information, Culture, Arts and Sports, issued a warning specifically to the media to desist from spreading rumors about Magufuli's whereabouts, who had not been seen in the public eye since February 27.

en: Additionally, the Minister of Legal and Constitutional Affairs, Mwigulu Nchemba, also threatened netizens with jail time via his Twitter account for sharing nonsense rumors, specifically citing Section 89 of the Penal Code and Section 16 of the Cybercrimes Act.
swa: Aidha, Waziri wa Sheria na Mambo ya Katiba, Mwigulu Nchemba, pia aliwatishia watumiaji wa mitandao adhabu ya kifungo kupitia akaunti yake ya Twita kwa kosa la kusambaza uvumi wa kijinga, akirejea Kifungu cha 89 cha Kanuni za Adhabu na Kifungu cha 16 cha Sheria ya Makosa ya Mtandao.

en: Police Chief Ramadhani Kingai expressed specific interest in the Twitter account of Kigogo, a Swahili name referring to a high-ranking official, who often exposes government wrongdoing.

en: Human rights activists have condemned these moves and the overall climate of fear created by these regulations and subsequent threats of enforcement.

en: EPOCA 2020: Further restrictions on digital rights

en: Tanzania has experienced remarkable internet, communications and technological advancements over the last decade.

en: Nevertheless, the state often plays an influential role over Tanzanian media companies and platforms and independent media lacks diversity in terms of viewpoints and representation.

en: The internet created new spaces online for Tanzanias young bloggers and social media activists to make their voices heard, but the government has not welcomed this new reality.

en: In 2010, Tanzania first published the Electronic and Postal Communications Act, the first of its kind in the country.

en: By 2018, specific regulations regarding online content were released through Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations, 2018.
swa: Kufikia 2018, kanuni mahususi zinazodhibiti maudhui ya mtandaoni zilitolewa kupitia Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandaoni) 2018.

en: The government argued that these regulations were intended to monitor and regulate citizens use of social media, in particular, and tackle issues like hate speech and disinformation.

en: However, the regulations applied not only to mainstream media but to individual bloggers and content providers, who were shocked by the new requirement to pay $900 United States dollars for a license.

en: Any person who provides network services without obtaining any relevant individual license, commits an offense and shall be liable upon conviction to a fine of not less than 6 million Tanzanian shillings [ $2,587 United States dollars] or imprisonment for a term not less than 12 months or to both.
swa: Mtu yeyote anayetoa huduma za mtandao bila kupata leseni muafaka, anafanya kosa na adhabu yake ni hukumu ya kulipa faini isiyopungua Shilingi za Kitanzania milioni 6 [dola za marekani 2,587] au kifungo cha jela kisichopungua miezi 12 au vyote kwa pamoja.

en: Secondly, the TCRA expanded a more detailed list of prohibited content including, among other things, content that motivates or promotes phone tapping, espionage, data theft, tracking, recording or intercepting communications or conversation without right.

en: The biggest problem here is that these powers contain no safeguards against abuse, and with the current situation, they certainly have the effect of stifling legitimate freedom of expression in Tanzania, said one human rights professional who asked to remain anonymous.

en: EPOCA 2020 makes it virtually impossible to remain anonymous online, under Regulation 9(e), coupled with the requirement imposed on the internet caf providers to register users via recognized IDs, assign static IP addresses to their computers and put camera surveillance to record the activities in their premises, according to this analysis by the Media Council of Tanzania.

en: In an open letter to Magufuli, Eyakuze points out the inconsistency of Magufuli's ideas, but also applies the empathy Magufuli himself seemed to lack, at times  and forgives him.
swa: Katika barua ya wazi kwa Magufuli,  Eyakuze anaeleza kubadilika badilika kwa misimamo ya Magufuli, lakini anatumia mbinu ya kuelewa hisia za mwingine, mbinu ambayo inaonekana kumshinda Magufuli mwenyewe  mara nyingine  na kumsamehe.

en: Who has the power to decide what does or doesn't appear on the internet?

en: That's the fundamental question posed by activist and writer Jillian C. York in her upcoming book Silicon Values,* set for release on March 23, 2021.
swa: Hili ndilo swali muhimu linaloulizwa na mwanaharakati na mwandishi Jillian C. York kwenye kitabu chake kijacho Silicon Values,* kinachotarajiwa kuzinduliwa mnamo Machi 23, 2021.
mt0: Je, unaelewa kweli? Ni swali muhimu ambalo Jillian C. York, mharakati na mwandishi, anauliza katika kitabu chake cha Silicon Values,* kinachotarajiwa kuzinduliwa mnamo Machi 23, 2021.

en: On Wednesday, February 10 at 2:00pm GMT, Jillian will join Global Voices executive director Ivan Sigal for a live video conversation about the book, which, as she notes in the preface, seeks to encapsulate the history of how Silicon Valleys major communications platforms created a system apartspecifically, a system that governs how we can express ourselves online.
swa: Mnamo Jumatano, Februari 10 saa 2:00mchana GMT, Jillian ataungana na mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Global Voices Ivan Sigal kwa mazungumzo mubashara ya video kuhusu kitabu chake, ambacho, kama anavyoeleza kwenye dibaji, tunatafuta kuchimbua historia ya namna majukwaa makubwa ya mawasiliano ya Silicon Valley yalivyotengeneza mfumo wake wa kipekeehususani, mfumo ambao unatawala namna tunavyoweza kujieleza mtandaoni.
mt0: Jillian itashiriki katika mazungumzo ya video ya Global Voices na Ivan Sigal Jumanne, Februari 10, saa 2:00pm GMT, ili kujadili kitabu hicho, ambayo, kama inavyosema katika muhtasari, inalenga kuonyesha historia ya jinsi Silicon Valleys kubwa za habari za habari zilijenga sheria maalum, sheria ambayo inaongoza jinsi tunayoweza kujielezea online.

en: Jillian, who is the Director of International Freedom of Expression at the Electronic Frontier Foundation, is also a long-standing member of Global Voices, where she cut her teeth writing about digital rights and freedom of expression in the context of the Middle East.

en: But, after recording up to 509 cases and 21 deaths in late April, the nation announced its status as coronavirus-free in June.
swa: Hata hivyo, baada ya takwimu kuendelea kupanda na kufikia wagonjwa 509 na vifo 21 mwishoni mwa mwezi Aprili, serikali ya Tanzania ilitangaza kuwa hakuna hata mgonjwa mmoja wa UVIKO-19 mwezi Juni.

en: That same month, Kassim Majaliwa, the countrys prime minister, told parliament there are only 66 active coronavirus cases in the country, but did not provide further details.

en: Since then, government has been silent on the coronavirus with a strong politic of denial and no data released to the public on infections or deaths.
swa: Tangu wakati huo, serikali imekuwa kimya kuhusiana na virusi vya Korona huku matamko makali ya kisiasa kukanusha uwepo wa virusi hivyo yakiendelea kutolewa bila kuambatana na takwimu zozote za wagonjwa wala vifo.

en: Today, most activities continue business-as-usual, including Tanzania's tourism industry, attracting thousands of visitors to its airports with few public health protocols in place.

en: According to their report, new cases of the South African virus variant were confirmed in two travelers flying into Denmark on January 19, from Tanzania.

en: The highly anticipated annual African music festival, Sauti za Busara, will take place in mid-February in Zanzibar, with support from the European Union in Tanzania and several European embassies, despite the risk of highly contagious new coronavirus variants circulating in the United Kingdom, South Africa, and Brazil.
swa: Tamasha kubwa la muziki linalosubiriwa kwa hamu ambalo hufanyika mara moja kwa mwaka, Sauti za Busara, litafanyika katikati ya mwezi Februari visiwani Zanzibar, kwa hisani ya Umoja wa Ulaya nchini Tanzania na baadhi ya balozi za nchi za Ulaya zilizoko nchini Tanzania, wakati huu ambapo nchi inakabiliwa na hatari kubwa ya aina hiyo mpya ya kirusi wa Korona inayosambaa katika nchi za Uingereza, Afrika Kusini, na Brazil.

The highly anticipated annual African music festival, Sauti za Busara, will take place in mid-February in Zanzibar, with support from the European Union in Tanzania and several European embassies, despite the risk of highly contagious new coronavirus variants circulating in the United Kingdom, South Africa, and Brazil.

en: On January 24, the Catholic Archdiocese of Arusha issued a letter warning congregants of the existence of COVID-19 in Tanzania, and urged members to follow all necessary public health measures to prevent the spread of the virus in churches.
swa: Mnamo Januari 24, Jimbo Kuu Katoliki la Arusha lilitoa waraka wa maonyo kwa waumini wake dhidi ya uwepo wa UVIKO-19 nchini Tanzania, na kuwaasa waumini wake kufuata tahadhari zote muhimu za afya  ili kujilinda na kusambaa kwa virusi hivyo makanisani.
mt0: Inaripotiwa kwamba katika Januari 24, Katoliki Archdiocese of Arusha ilituma barua kwa wanachama wake kuwaambia kwamba COVID-19 ilikuwa imepatikana Tanzania, na iliwataka wanachama kufuata sheria zote za afya za kitaifa ili kuepuka ueneaji wa virusi katika kanisa.

en: While Tanzanias recorded cases are moderate compared to other countries, the governments silence about COVID-19 data raised grave concerns among public health experts and human rights activists, who are forbidden from speaking or talking about COVID-19 in digital spaces.
swa: Ingawa kumbukumbu zinaonesha kuwa Tanzania ina wangonjwa wachache ukilinganisha na nchi nyingine, ukimya wa serikali kuhusu takwimu za UVIKO-19 umeleta hali ya wasiwasi miongoni mwa wataalam wa afya na wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu, ambao  wamezuiwa kuzungumza na kuongelea UVIKO-19  katika majukwaa ya mitandaoni.
mt0: Kama unaweza kusema kwamba idadi ya wagonjwa Tanzania ina chini kuliko nchi nyingine, ukimya wa serikali kuhusu idadi ya wagonjwa wa COVID-19 ulipelekea usumbufu mkubwa kwa wataalamu wa afya na watu wa haki za binadamu, ambao wamekatazwa kusema au kuzungumza kuhusu COVID-19 katika eneo la digitali.

en: The country updated its 2018 Electronic and Postal Communications (Online Content) Regulations in July, prohibiting any content with information with regard to the outbreak of a deadly or contagious disease in the country or elsewhere without the approval of the respective authorities.
swa: Nchi hiyo ilifanya marekebisho ya toleo la 2018 la Kanuni za Mawasiliano ya Kieletroniki na Posta (Maudhui ya Mtandaoni mwezi Julai, ikizuia maudhui yenye taarifa zinazohusiana na mlipuko wa ugonjwa hatari au unaoua nchini au kokote pale bila ruhusa ya mamlaka husika.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo, uthibitishe tu kwamba haujui. Sheria hiyo ilibadilika katika Julai 2018, ikikataza habari zote zinazohusu uwezekano wa kuwepo kwa ugonjwa mbaya au ambukizi katika nchi au nchi nyingine bila idhini ya mamlaka zote.

en: Despite initial restrictions to contain the spread of the virus, schools, colleges, offices and other social activities are back to normal.
swa: Ingawa hatua za awali za kudhibiti maambukizi ya virusi zilichukuliwa, hivi sasa shule, vyuo, ofisi, na shughuli nyingine za kijamii zimerudi katika hali ya kawaida.
mt0: Hata baada ya sheria za kwanza za kuzuia ueneaji wa virusi, shule, shule za sekondari, idara na shughuli nyingine za kijamii zimerejea katika hali ya kawaida.

en: Even as the virus continues to spread in the region.
swa: Hata hivyo, virusi hivyo vinaendelea kusambaa nchini humo.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: President John Magufuli had cast doubt on the credibility of laboratory equipment and technicians after secret tests allegedly performed on papaya and a goat gave positive test results.
swa: Rais John Magufuli ameonesha wasiwasi na ubora wa vifaa vya maabara na uaminifu wa watalaam wake baada ya majaribio ya siri kudaiwa kufanyika kwa kutumia mapapai na mbuzi kuleta majibu kuwa vilikuwa na maambukizi ya virusi hivyo.
mt0: Rais John Magufuli aliweka shaka kuhusu uwezo wa vifaa vya utafiti na wataalamu baada ya uchunguzi wa siri uliofanywa kwenye papaya na mbwa ulionyesha matokeo ya ubora.

en: The president said releasing this data was causing unnecessary panic and soon after, fired Nyambura Moremi, director of the national health laboratory, for allegedly botching the testing results.
swa: Rais alisema alisema kutoa takwimu hizi kulikuwa kunaleta tahayaruki isiyo na sababu na muda mfupi baadae, alimfukuza kazi Nyambura Moremi, mkurugenzi wa maabara ya afya ya taifa, kwa madai ya kuchakachua matokeo ya vipimo.
mt0: Rais alisema kwamba kutangaza habari hii ilikuwa ikisababisha hofu isiyohitajika na kisha akafukuzwa kazi Nyambura Moremi, msimamizi wa shirika la afya nchini, kwa uwezekano wa kudanganya matokeo ya uchunguzi.

en: The ministerial COVID-19 information team was dissolved.
swa: Timu ya kushughulikia UVIKO-19 iliyoundwa na waziri nayo iliishia kuvunjwa.

en: In June, Magufuli thanked God for eradicating the virus from Tanzania, following three days of national prayer.
swa: Mwezi June, Magufuli alimshukuru Mungu kwa kumwondoa kirusi huyo  kutoka Tanzania, kufuatia siku tatu za maombi ya kitaifa.
mt0: In June, Magufuli alishukuru Mungu kwa kuepuka virusi kutoka Tanzania, baada ya siku tatu za sala ya kitaifa.

en: He made this announcement publicly during a Sunday service, amidst a praising congregation, making claims that God had answered their prayers.
swa: Alitoa tangazo hilo hadharani akiwa kwenye ibada ya Jumapili, katikati ya waumini waliokuwa wakimsifu, wakidai kuwa Mungu amejibu maombi yao.

en: He also praised congregants for not wearing face masks, despite calls from the World Health Organization to wear masks to prevent the spread of the virus.
swa: Magufuli aliwasifu waumini hao kwa kutokuvaa barakoa, pamoja na wito wa Shirika la Afya Duniani kuwaomba watu wavae barakoa kuzuia kuenea kwa virusi hivyo.
mt0: Pia alipongeza wafuasi kwa kukataa kuweka masker, licha ya ombi la Shirika la Afya Duniani kuweka masker ili kupunguza uwezekano wa kusambaa kwa virusi.

en: Just before the elections, Tanzanians experienced an internet shutdown with access denied to all the major social media platforms including Instagram, WhatsApp and Twitter.
swa: Kabla ya uchaguzi huo, Watanzania walishangazwa na kuzimwa kwa mitandao ambapo majukwaa yote makubwa ya mitandao ya kijamii ikiwa ni pamoja na Instagram, WhatsApp na Twitter yalifungwa yasipatikane.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali simply say you don't know. Tanzanians experienced an internet shutdown just before the elections with access denied to all the major social media platforms including Instagram, WhatsApp and Twitter.

en: To date, many Tanzanians cannot access Twitter without using a Virtual Private Network (VPN).
swa: Mpaka leo, Watanzania wengi hawawezi kuingia kwenye mtandao wa Twita bila kutumia teknolojia ya kutumia mitandao ya siri yaani VPN.
mt0: Return only. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know

en: Over the last five years, the Magufuli administration has narrowed democratic and civic spaces and has cracked down hard on freedom of expression and access to information in digital spaces.
swa: Kwa zaidi ya miaka mitano, utawala wa Magufuli umebana mno uhuru wa demokrasia na shughuli za kiraia sambamba na kuminya uhuru wa kujieleza na haki ya kupata taarifa kwenye majukwaa ya kidijitali.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, utawala wa Magufuli umeweka uhuru wa demokrasia na uhuru wa kisiasa chini na utawala wake umeweka kizuizi kubwa kwa uhuru wa kusema na upatikanaji wa habari katika eneo la kidijitali.

en: With the governments strong denial stance, Tanzanians are not allowed to release any COVID-19 data that the government has not verified, which means that ordinary citizens as well as journalists and medical professionals are barred from commenting on COVID-19 in digital spaces, or accessing information.
swa: Kufuatia msimamo mkali wa serikali kukana uwepo wa UVIKO-19, Watanzania hawaruhusiwi kutoa takwimu zozote za UVIKO-19 ambazo serikali haijazihakiki, hii ikiwa na maana kwamba wananchi wa kawaida ikiwa ni pamoja na waandishi wa habari na wataalam wa afya wanazuiwa kutoa maoni kuhusu UVIKO-19 kwenye majukwaa ya kidijitali au kupata taarifa muhimu.
mt0: Kwa uamuzi wa serikali ulio kuathirika, Tanzanians hawawezi kutoa habari kuhusu COVID-19 ambayo serikali haijathibitisha, ambayo inamaanisha kwamba raia huru na wanahabari na wafanyakazi wa afya wanazuiwa kuzungumzia COVID-19 kwenye eneo la digitali au kupata habari.

en: Access to COVID-19 information has become an elite privilege, according to one doctor from the national hospital who spoke to Global Voices on the condition of anonymity, fearing reprisal.
swa: Haki ya kupata taarifa za UVIKO-19 imegeuka kuwa upendeleo wa tabaka la watu fulani, kwa mujibu wa daktari mmoja wa hospitali ya taifa aliyeongea na Global Voices kwa masharti ya kutokufahamika, akiogopa kufukuzwa kazi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri uendelee kusema kwamba upatikanaji wa habari kuhusu COVID-19 imekuwa uhuru wa kipekee, alisema daktari kutoka hospitali ya nchi hiyo ambaye alizungumza na Global Voices kwa uhuru, akiwa na hofu ya reprisals.

en: Unlike other countries with established COVID-19 information response teams who give daily updates on COVID-19, Tanzania simply offers a website with limited and outdated COVID-19 information.
swa: Tofauti na nchi nyingine zenye timu maalum zinazofanyia kazi taarifa za UVIKO-19, Tanzania ina tovuti yenye taarifa chache zilizopitwa na wakati kuhusu UVIKO-19.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kupata ufahamu simply say you don't know Unlike nchi zingine zilizo na timu za ufuatiliaji wa COVID-19 zilizoanzishwa ambazo huweka habari kila siku kuhusu COVID-19, Tanzania hutoa tovuti ambayo inatoa habari ndogo na ndogo kuhusu COVID-19.

en: The denial has been so convincing that its now widely accepted by Tanzanians, including medical experts, who disregard basic safety measures like wearing face masks and social distancing.
swa: Matamshi ya kukataa uwepo wa UVIKO-19 yanaonekana kukubalika na Watanzania wengi, ikiwa ni pamoja na wataalam wa afya, wanaopuuza hatua muhimu za kuchukua tahadharani kama kuvaa barakoa na kuepuka misongamano.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kukubali ukweli huu, ukweli huu umekuwa urefu sana kwamba sasa unakubaliwa na Tanzanians, ikiwa ni pamoja na wataalamu wa afya, ambao wanasahau sheria za usalama kama vile kuweka usalama wa uso na kuweka umbali wa kijamii.

en: Global Voices visited major hospitals such Muhimbili, the government referral hospital in Dar es Salaam, the cultural capital, as well as Benjamin Mkapa Hospital in Dodoma, the political capital, and witnessed very few measures taken to stop the spread of the coronavirus disease.
swa: Global Voices ilitembelea hospitali kadhaa ikiwemo Muhimbili, hospitali ya rufaa ya serikali iliyoko jijini Dar es Salaam, mji mkuu wa kiutamaduni nchini humo, pamoja na Hospitali ya  Benjamin Mkapa jijini Dodoma, mji mkuu wa kisiasa, na kushuhudia tahadhari chache zikichukuliwa kukabiliana na kuenea kwa virusi vya ugonjwa wa korona.
mt0: Global Voices ilikuwa katika hospitali kuu kama Muhimbili, hospitali ya serikali iliyo katika Dar es Salaam, mji mkuu wa kihistoria, na Benjamin Mkapa Hospital katika Dodoma, mji mkuu wa kisiasa, na ilikuwa na uonaji wa uamuzi wa chini wa kudhibiti ueneaji wa virusi vya corona.

en: People are allowed to enter hospital premises without wearing masks, there are few working hygiene and washing facilities and those that do exist lack water or are broken, which was witnessed, for example, in the pregnant mothers clinic at Muhimbili.
swa: Watu wanaruhusiwa kuingia kwenye maeneo ya hospitali bila kuvaa barakoa, kuna vifaa vichache vya usafi na kunawa mikono na vile vilivyopo havina maji au vimevunjika, hali iliyoshuhudiwa, kwa mfano, kwenye wodi ya wanawake wajawazito Muhimbili.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa, watu wanaweza kuingia kwenye hospitali bila kuweka masker, kuna vituo vichache vya usalama na uongeleshaji na vituo vilivyopo huwa na ukosefu wa maji au kuvunjwa, kama vile katika kliniki ya mama wenye mimba katika Muhimbili.

en: While the Magufuli administration has shown little concern about the impact of the virus on everyday citizens, many government ministries and departments acknowledge that COVID-19 still exists.
swa: Wakati utawala wa Magufuli haujaonesha kujali madhara ya virusi hivi kwa maisha ya kila siku ya wananchi, mawaziri wengi wa serikali yake na idara zake wanakubali kwamba UVIKO-19 upo.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa maana ya virusi kwa wananchi wa kawaida, serikali nyingi na idara nyingi zinakubali kwamba COVID-19 bado inapatikana.

en: Tanzania's minister of finance urges ministry staff to take all precautions against the coronavirus, while also saying COVID-19 is not an issue in Tanzania.

mt0: Tanzania's minister of finance urges ministry staff to take all precautions against the coronavirus, while also saying COVID-19 is not an issue in Tanzania.

en: For example, when Magufuli was sworn in for the second time last year, authorities did practice COVID-19 prevention measures, requiring all attendees to have their temperatures taken and wash their hands at hygiene stations with hand sanitizer provided.
swa: Kwa mfano, Magufuli alipoapishwa kwa mara ya pili mwaka jana, mamlaka za serikali zilichukua tahadhari nyingi dhidi ya UVIKO-19, wakiwalazimisha wahudhuriaji wote kupima joto la mwili na kuosha mikono yao kwenye sehemu maalumu zenye maji na vipupushi.
mt0: Kwa mfano, wakati Magufuli alipojiuzulu kwa mara ya pili mwaka jana, serikali ilifanya jitihada za kuzuia COVID-19, wakilazimisha watu wote waliohudhuria kuchukuliwa na joto la mwili na kuosha mikono katika vituo vya usalama na kupewa sakramenti ya usalama.

en: On January 25, Tanzania's Minister of Finance Dr. Philip Mpango urged his staff to take precautions against COVID-19 while at the same denying its existence in Tanzania, during a meeting in Dodoma, the capital.

en: This article is part of a series of posts examining interference with digital rights under lockdowns and beyond during the COVID-19 pandemic in nine African countries: Uganda, Zimbabwe, Mozambique, Algeria, Nigeria, Namibia, Tunisia, Tanzania and Ethiopia.
swa: Makala haya ni sehemu ya mfululizo wa makala zinazochunguza kuingiliwa kwa haki za kidijitali wakati wa hatua za kuwafungia watu ndani kudhibiti kusambaa kwa UVIKO-19 katika nchi tisa za Afrika: Uganda, Zimbabwe, Msumbiji, Aljeria, Naijeria, Namibia, Tunisia, Tanzania na Ethiopia.
mt0: Inaonekana kwamba ukiweza kutafsiri swali hapo chini, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).

mt0: Photo showing the completion of the police training course in Mozambique | screen shot, 19 August, STV Youtube, taken by the author.

en: A document from the Mozambican Police (PRM) that has leaked in local media in early August revealed that 15 students had become pregnant at a police training school in Matalane, a district of Maputo province.
swa: Nyaraka  za jeshi la polisi  la Msumbiji zilizovujishwa katika vyombo vya habari mapema mwezi Agosti zilidhihirisha kwamba wanafunzi 15 walipata ujauzito wakiwa katika shule ya mafunzo ya polisi huko Matalane, wilaya ya  jimbo la Maputo.
mt0: Document from the Mozambican Police (PRM) which has leaked in local media in early August revealed that 15 students had become pregnant at a police training school in Matalane, a district of Maputo province.

en: The document states that the pregnancies resulted from the students sexual relations with their instructors, without specifying whether these relations were consensual.
swa: Nyaraka hizo zinasema  kuwa mimba hizo ni matokeo ya uhusiano wa kingono uliopo baina ya wanafunzi na wakufunzi bila kufafanua kama mahusiano hayo yalikuwa ya hiari.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba uzazi huo ulisababishwa na uhusiano wa kingono kati ya wanafunzi na wasimamizi, bila kutaja ikiwa uhusiano huo ulifanyika kwa ukubali.

en: Moreover, it states that pregnant students will not be able to complete the course at present, and will have their trips back to their home provinces paid for by the police.
swa: Hata hivyo imeelezwa kwamba wanafunzi wajawazito hawataweza kumaliza mafunzo kwa sasa, na watasafiri kurudi makwao wakilipiwa usafiri na polisi.
mt0: Inasema kwamba wanafunzi walio na ujauzito hawawezi kumaliza masomo sasa, na watapewa usafiri wa kurudi nyumbani kwao na polisi.

en: Finally, it says that the instructors involved will be suspended.
swa: Mwisho taarifa hiyo ikasema kuwa wakufunzi waliohusika watasimamishwa kazi.
mt0: Finally, it says that the instructors involved will be suspended.

en: When asked about the case by the newspaper O Pas on August 8, Police Commander General Bernardino Rafael said that those involved would face disciplinary proceedings.
swa: Alipoulizwa na gazeti la O Pas hapo Agosti 8, Kamanda wa Jeshi la Polisi Jenerali Bernardino Rafael alisema kuwa wahusika wote watakutana na taratibu za kinidhamu.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kutafsiri angalia chini. Wakati gazeti la O Pas lilipouliza kuhusu kesi hiyo mnamo Agosti 8, Mkuu wa polisi Bernardino Rafael alisema kwamba wale waliohusika watachukuliwa hatua za kisheria.

en: It did not take long before the case was widely condemned on social media.

en: In the midst of it all, we at Global Voices have continued to publish nuanced stories from the four corners of the globe, bringing our readers unique global perspectives on issues such as the COVID-19 pandemic, the movement for racial justice, protests in countries such as Belarus and Thailand, and much, much more.
