en: African leaders have taken decisive, early actions to curb the spread of COVID-19.
swa: Viongozi wa Afrika wamechukua uamuzi wa haraka kukabiliana na UVIKO-19.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: In fact, the Africa Centers for Disease Control (ACDC) created its COVID-19 task force on February 5, before the continent had a single case.
swa: Kituo cha Afrika cha Kudhibiti Magonjwa (ACDC) kiliunda kikosi kazi ya UVIKO-19 Februari 5 , kabla ya bara hili halijashuhudia hata mgonjwa mmoja.
mt0: In fact, the Africa Centers for Disease Control (ACDC) created its COVID-19 task force on February 5, before the continent had a single case.

en: Today, Africa is currently the least impacted region in the world, with 1,293,048 confirmed COVID-19 cases so far and a remarkable 1,031,905 recoveries, according to the Africa CDCP.
swa: Leo hii, Afrika ambalo kwa sasa ndilo eneo lililoathirika kidogo sana duniani likiwa na wangonjwa wapato 1,293,048 waliothibitishwa wenye UVIKO-19 na kinachovutia zaidi ni wagonjwa 1,031,905 wakiripoti kupona, kwa mujibu wa Afrika CDCP.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, ulisema kwamba haujui. Leo, Afrika ni eneo la chini zaidi kuathiriwa duniani, na 1,293,048 wagonjwa wa COVID-19 waliothibitishwa hadi sasa na idadi kubwa ya wagonjwa waliopona, kulingana na ripoti ya CDC ya Afrika.

en: The continent has less than 5 percent of reported cases and less than 1 percent of all deaths.
swa: Bara hili lina chini ya asilimia 5 ya wagonjwa walioripotiwa duniani kote na chini ya asilimia 1 ya vifo vyote vilivyotokea duniani kote.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Now, as African countries  led by the African Union   ease COVID-19 restrictions and prepare to reopen their economies and borders, many governments are employing innovative technologies.
swa: Sasa, kama nchi za Kiafrika  ikiongozwa na Umoja wa Afrika   wanalegeza vikwazo za COVID-19 na kujiandaa kufungua tena uchumi na mipaka yao, serikali nyingi wanatumia teknolojia bunifu.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Sasa, katika nchi za Afrika zinazoongozwa na Umoja wa Afrika kuanza kuweka vikwazo kuhusu COVID-19 na kuanza kufungua uchumi na uhamiaji, serikali nyingi zinatumia teknolojia mpya.

en: A need for a unified, pan-African technology that can track the spread and connect COVID-19 testing centers across the continent has led to the use of PanaBIOS, an African Union-backed biosurveillance technology.
swa: Utaji wa umoja, wa teknolojia ya Kiafrika inayoweza fuatilia usambaa na kukutanisha vituo ya kupima COVID-19 kote bara umepelekea utumizi wa PanaBIOS, teknolojia wa uangalizi wa kibiolojia unaoungwa mkono na Umoja wa Afrika.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri kabisa, angalia chini. Mahitaji ya teknolojia ya umoja wa Afrika ambayo inaweza kufuatilia ueneaji na kuunganishwa kwa vituo vya ukaguzi wa COVID-19 katika nchi zote za Afrika imepelekea kutumia PanaBIOS, teknolojia inayofadhiliwa na Umoja wa Afrika.

en: PanaBIOS provides a mobile and web-based app that uses algorithms to track and trace persons facing potential health threats and track and keep records of test samples from their origin to in-country labs.
swa: PanaBIOS umetoa programu inayotegema rununu na wavuti na kutumia algorithimu kufuata watu walio hatarini kiafya na kuweka rekodi ya vipimo vya sampuli toka asili hadi maabara..
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hapo chini, angalia chini. PanaBIOS inatoa app ya mkononi na wa mtandao inayotumia algorithms kufuatilia na kufuatilia watu wanaokabiliwa na hatari ya afya na kufuatilia na kuweka records za samples za majaribio kutoka kwao hadi katika nchi za nje.

en: The technology was developed by Koldchain, a Kenyan startup, and funded by AfroChampions, a public-private partnership designed to galvanize African resources and institutions to support the emergence and success of the African private sector.
swa: Huu teknolojia umeundwa na Koldchain, taasisi chipukizi ya Kenya, na kufadhiliwa na AfroChampions, ushirikiano wa umma na binafsi uliobuniwa kuleta pamoja rasilimali ya Afrika na taasisi kusaidia ubuzi na mafanikio ya sekta binafsi Afrika.
mt0: Lakini hiyo teknolojia iliundwa na Koldchain, shirika la ubunifu la Kenya, na kufadhiliwa na AfroChampions, shirika la umma-wastajiri ambalo linalenga kuunganishwa kwa rasilimali na shirika ili kusaidia uendelezaji na mafanikio ya sekta ya kibinafsi ya Afrika.

en: Ghana is currently the only African country using PanaBIOS technology as it reopens its borders.
swa: Ghana ndio nchi pekee kwa saa hii inayotumia teknolojia ya PanaBIOS wakati inafungua mipaka yake.
mt0: Return only. Kama hauwezi kutafsiri Ghana ni nchi pekee ya Afrika inayotumia teknolojia ya PanaBIOS wakati inafungua mipaka yake.

en: PanaBIOS ensures that travelers are able to use test results from one country to satisfy port clearance requirements in another country through their personal PanaBios app or by adding a system-generated SMS/USSD passcode to another travel document.
swa: PanaBIOS  kuhakikisha wasafiri wanaweza tumia matokeo ya vipimo toka nchi nyingine kuridhisha mahitaji ya idhini ya bandari kwa nchi wanayosafiria kupitia programu-tumizi ya PanaBios au kwa kuongezea nywila unaozalishwa na mfumo kwa hati za usafiri.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hapo chini, uthibitishe tu kwamba PanaBIOS inahakikisha kwamba wasafiri wanaweza kutumia matokeo ya ujio kutoka nchi moja kutimiza mahitaji ya ukaguzi wa bandari katika nchi nyingine kwa kutumia app yao ya PanaBios au kuongeza funguo la SMS/USSD la serikali kwenye idhini ya safari nyingine.

en: Port health officials use the enterprise version of the app to validate health declarations in a uniform manner across countries.
swa: Maafisa wa afya bandarini wanatumia programu-tumizi toleo la biashara kudhibitisha hati za afya kwa namna sawa kwa nchi zote.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Comprehensive data protection and privacy laws
swa: Sheria kamili za kulinda data na ufaragha
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Comprehensive data protection and privacy laws.

en: The African Union and the Africa CDCP are encouraging member states to integrate the mobile-based PanaBIOS platform that would allow results from facilities across the continent to be centralized.
swa: Muungano wa Afrika na Afrika CDCP wanahimiza mataifa wanachama  kushirikisha jukwaa wenye msingi wa rununu, PanaBIOS  utakao wezesha matokeo kote barani kuwekwa pamoja.

en: However, digital health interventions have raised a lot of questions regarding data access and data privacy.
swa: Lakini,tarakimu kuingilia kati afya kumezua maswali mengi kuhusu ufikavu na ufaragha wa data.
mt0: Hata hivyo, shughuli za afya za digitali zimepelekea maswali mengi kuhusu ufikiaji wa data na usalama wa data.

en: Government-implemented surveillance and control can instill fear and threaten civil liberties, especially in a continent where only 27 countries out of 54 in Africa have fully functioning data protection and privacy laws.
swa: Ufuatiliaji unaoendeshwa na serikali  na udhibati unaweza nuiza hofu na kutishia huru uraia, hasa katika bara ambapo  nchi 27 tu kati ya 54  wanayo sheria kamilifu ya ulinzi na ufaragha wa data.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo, uthibitishe tu kwamba sheria hiyo inaweza kuweka uogopa na kutishia haki za kibinadamu, hasa katika eneo ambalo nchi 27 kati ya 54 katika Afrika zina sheria za usalama wa data na uhuru wa kibinadamu.

en: Some African countries, such as Ghana, have triggered new legislation giving the president emergency powers to fight the pandemic by ordering telecom companies to provide it with personal customer details such as subscriber database, subscriber cell reference data, uncashed subscriber mobile money transfer data, mobile money merchant codes, and addresses.
swa: Nchi nyingine Afrika, kama Ghana yamebadili sheria kuipa rais mamlaka ya dharura kukabiliana na janga kwa kuamrisha kampuni ya mawasiliano ya simu kuipa maelezo ya kibinafsi ya wateja kama vile hifadhidata ya mteja, kumbukumbu ya simu ya mteja, data ya pesa uliohamishwa kutumia simu na haujatumika, misimbo ya wafanyabiashara wa miamala , na anwani.
mt0: Kama Ghana, nchi kadhaa zimeanzisha sheria mpya ambayo inamlazimisha rais kutumia uwezo wa dharura wa kupambana na janga la corona kwa kulazimisha kampuni za simu kuweka ndani habari za wateja wake kama vile daftari la watumiaji, data ya simu ya mlango wa mlango, data ya simu ya mlango wa mlango, codes za mlango wa mlango, na addresses.

en: To ensure data protection and privacy, all machine learning techniques used by PanaBIOS are on aggregated data.
swa: Kuhakiki ulinzi na ufaragha wa data, mbinu zote za masomo ya mashine inayotumiwa na PanaBIOS ziko katika data ya jumla.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know To ensure data protection and privacy, all machine learning techniques used by PanaBIOS are on aggregated data.

en: That is  data gathered is summarized for statistical analysis  not personal data used to target individuals  unless its for contact tracing purposes, where it would be required to reach out to suspected or infected people.
swa: Hio ni  data iliokusanywa inahaririwa kwa ajili ya uchambuzi wa takwimu  sio data binafsi ya kulenga watu  isipokua kwa ajili ya kufuatilia mwasiliwa, ambapo itatakikana kufikia washukiwa ama waathiriwa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa hiyo data kusanywa inajumuishwa kwa utafiti wa kistatistiki na si data ya kibinafsi inayotumiwa kulenga watu binafsi isipokuwa kwa lengo la kufuatilia uwezekano wa kuambukizwa au kuambukizwa.

en: To ensure the prevention of privacy infringement, the African Union, PanaBIOS, and its partners must propose how it will comply with various country-based data protection laws to protect privacy, ensure data consent and avoid data sharing for commercial use.
swa: Kuhakikisha uzuizi wa kuingilia ufaragha, Muungano wa Afrika, PanBIOS, na washirika wake lazima wapendekeze namna watakavyo zingatia sheria za ulinzi wa data za nchi tofauti tofauti kulinda ufaragha,hakikisha idhini ya data na kuepuka kushiriki data kibiashara.
mt0: Kama unaweza kusema kwamba haujui, angalia chini. Ili kuhakikisha usalama wa habari, shirika la umoja wa Afrika, PanaBIOS, na washirika wake wanapaswa kupendekeza jinsi ya kutekeleza sheria za usalama wa data katika nchi mbalimbali ili kulinda usalama, kuhakikisha ukubali wa data, na kuepuka kushiriki data kwa matumizi ya kibiashara.

en: The app currently does not have a privacy policy available to the public, in which it explains to users its data collection and sharing practices.
swa: Kwa sasa, huu pragramu-tumizi hauna sera ya faragha inayopatikana kwa umma, ambapo inaelezea watumiaji kanuni za kukusanya na kushiriki data.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali ulisema kwamba haujui. App bado haina sera ya usalama iliyopatikana kwa umma, ambayo inaeleza kwa watumiaji utaratibu wake wa kukusanya data na kushiriki data.

en: The challenge is how such data privacy policy will meet the various, continental, national, and regional data protection laws such as the African Unions Convention on Cybersecurity and Personal Data Protection, the Southern African Development Communitys (SADC) model law on data protection, Economic Community of West African States (ECOWAS) Supplementary Act A/SA.1/01/10 on Personal Data Protection Within ECOWAS and the East African Communitys Framework for Cyberlaws.
swa: Changamoto ni jinsi huo sera faragha utatimiza malengo mbalimbali, kibara, kitaifa, na kikanda ya sheria za kulinda data kama vile ya Muungano wa Afrika Mkataba juu ya Usalama wa Mtandao na Ulinzi wa Takwimu za Kibinafsi,ya Jumuiya ya Maendeleo Kusini mwa Afrika (SADC) sheria kielezo juu ya ulinzi wa data, Jumuiya ya Kiuchumi ya Mataifa ya Afrika Magharibi (ECOWAS) Sheria ya nyongeza A / SA.1 / 01/10 juu ya Ulinzi wa Takwimu Binafsi Ndani ya ECOWAS na Jumuiya ya Afrika Mashariki Kiunzi cha Kanuni za mtandao.
mt0: Lazima tuwe na uhakika kwamba sheria hiyo ya usalama wa data itatimiza sheria mbalimbali za usalama wa data, continental, nchi, na mikoa, kama vile Convention on Cybersecurity and Personal Data Protection, Sheria ya Southern African Development Community (SADC) ya usalama wa data, Sheria ya Sekondari ya Afrika Mashariki (ECOWAS) ya usalama wa data, na Sheria ya East African Community Framework for Cyberlaws.

en: Tech-based solutions contribute to Africas COVID-19 success
swa: Suluhu za kiteknolojia zimechangia ufanisi kukabiliana na COVID-19 Afrika
mt0: - Teknolojia-kutegemea suluhisho hutoa msaada mkubwa kwa ushindi wa Afrika dhidi ya COVID-19 ikiwa teknolojia-kutegemea suluhisho hutoa msaada mkubwa kwa ushindi wa Afrika dhidi ya COVID-19.

en: In addition to PanaBIOS, various African nations have activated tech-based responses to the COVID-19 crisis to mitigate its spread.
swa: Pamoja na PanaBIOS, baadhi ya mataifa ya Afika wameamilisha itikio inayoegemea teknolojia kupambana na uenevu wa janga la COVID-19.
mt0: Inawezekana kabisa kwamba nchi kadhaa za Afrika zimeanzisha shughuli za uokoaji wa virusi vya COVID-19 kupitia teknolojia.

en: For example, scientists from Senegal developed a $1 COVID-19 test kit and 3D ventilators for patients.
swa: Kwa mfano, wanasayansi toka Sengali wametengeneza kifaa cha kupima COVID-19 inayogharimu $1 na Vipumuaji vya 3D ya wagonjwa.
mt0: Kwa mfano, wataalamu kutoka Senegali wameunda kit cha kupima COVID-19 cha $1 na ventilatori za 3D kwa watu walioambukizwa.

en: Wellvis, a Nigerian startup, created the COVID-19 Triage Tool, a free online tool to help users self-assess their coronavirus risk category based on their symptoms and their exposure history.
swa: Wellvis, taasisi chipukizi ya Nijeria, walibuni chombo cha kupima COVID-19 , chombo huru ya mtandao kusaidia watumizi kujipima kiwango cha hatari ya kuambukizwa virusi vya korona kulingana na dalili na historia ya kuwemo hatarini..
mt0: - 'Wellvis, a Nigerian startup, ilikuwa imeunda mfumo wa ufuatiliaji wa COVID-19, mfumo wa bure wa mtandaoni unaosaidia watumiaji kujitolea kuamua uwezekano wao wa kukabiliwa na virusi vya corona kulingana na dalili zao na historia ya ushirikiano wao.

en: The South African government used Whatsapp to provide an interactive chatbot that can answer common queries about COVID-19 myths, symptoms, and treatment.
swa: Serikali ya Afrika Kusini ilitumia mtandao wa ujumbe mfupi Whatsapp kutoa mazungumuzo ya mwingiliano kujibu maswali ya kawaida kuhusu hadithi za uongo, dalili na tiba ya COVID-19.
mt0: - Whatsapp ilikuwa imetumia Whatsapp kusaidia kutoa chatbot inayoweza kujibu maswali ya kawaida kuhusu COVID-19, myths, symptoms, na tiba.

en: And in Uganda, market women used the Market Garden app to sell their goods from their homes through the app, and then motorcycle taxis deliver the goods to customers.
swa: Na Uganda,  wanawake wa soko walitumia programu-tumizi ya Soko Bustani kuuza bidhaa yao wakiwa nyumbani kutumia hii programu, kisha teksi ya pikipiki kumchukulia mnunuzi bidhaa.
mt0: In Uganda, wanawake wasoko walitumia app ya Market Garden kuuza bidhaa zao kutoka kwa nyumba zao kwa njia ya app, na kisha teksi za pikipiki zilileta bidhaa kwa wateja.

en: Africas successful control and management of the spread of COVID-19 has been attributed to its younger population, limited testing capacity and mortality tracking, and the possible presence of SARS-CoV-2 antibodies found in some Africans.
swa: Afrika kufanikiwa kudhibiti na kusimamia uenevu wa COVID-19 umehusishwa na  umma changa, uwezo kadiri wa kupima na kufuatilia waliofariki, na uwezekano wa kuwepo na  kingamwili za SARS-CoV-2  miongoni Waafrika wengine .
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uwezo wa kukabiliana na usimamizi wa ueneaji wa COVID-19 katika Afrika umehusishwa na idadi ndogo ya watu, uwezo mfupi wa kufanya uchunguzi na kufuatilia vifo, na uwezekano wa kuwepo kwa antibodies za SARS-CoV-2 katika baadhi ya watu wa Afrika.

en: However, it is clear that Africas tech-based innovations are a major contributing factor to its success in controlling COVID-19, in addition to decisive leadership early on in the pandemic.
swa: Lakini, ni bayana kwamba uvumbuzi zinazoegemea teknolojia zimechangia pakubwa kufanikisha uthibati wa COVID-19, pamoja na uongozi amuzi mwanzoni mwa janga.
mt0: Hata hivyo, ni wazi kwamba teknolojia inayotegemea Afrika ni sehemu muhimu ya ushindi wake wa kukabiliana na COVID-19, pamoja na uamuzi wa awali wa utawala.

en: Solomon Zewdu, deputy doctor with the Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation summarized how, in January, even as many Western nations hesitated, Ethiopia began intensive screening at Addis Ababa airport.
swa: Solomon Zewdu, naibu daktari na shirika la Bill na Melinda  alifupisha jinsi, mnamo Januari, wakati mataifa mengi ya magharibi yakisita , Ethiopia ilianza kichujio kabambe uwanja wa ngege wa AddisAbaba.
mt0: Solomon Zewdu, mkurugenzi wa afya wa Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation, alieleza jinsi, mnamo Januari, Ethiopia ilianza uchunguzi mkubwa katika uwanja wa ndege wa Addis Ababa, licha ya usumbufu uliosababishwa na nchi nyingi za Ulaya.

en: Rwanda became the first African nation to lock down on March 21, and many other African countries soon followed: South Africa implemented its comprehensive lockdown when it had only 400 cases and two fatalities.
swa: Rwanda ikawa nchi ya kwanza Afrika kusitisha katikhuli za kawaida mnamo Machi 21,na nchi kadhaa Afrika kufuatilia hivo karibuni: Afrika kusini ikatekeleza sitisho katikhuli za kawaida kabambe wakati ilikua na kesi 400 na vifo mbili.
mt0: Rwanda ilikuwa nchi ya kwanza ya Afrika kufunga karantini mnamo Machi 21, na nchi nyingi za Afrika zikafuata: South Africa ilifanya karantini kamili katika wakati ambapo ilikuwa na wagonjwa 400 na vifo viwili.

en: (With a similar-sized population, Italy had more than 9,000 cases and 400 deaths when it acted.)

en: Since September 22, news reports and social media posts circulating on the Chinese-speaking internet inaccurately claim that World Health Organization (WHO) Chief Scientist, Dr. Soumya Swaminathan, said Chinas COVID-19 vaccines have proved to have an effect.
swa: Tokea Septemba 22, taarifa za habari na machapisho ya mtandao ya kijamii inayoenea katika mitandao ya Kichina ilinukuu sivyo kuwa mwanasayansi mkuu wa Shirika la Afya Duniani (SAD), Dkt. Soumya Swaminathan, alisema chanjo za Uchina dhidi ya COVID-19 zimethibitishwa kuwa na athari.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, kisha ulisema kwamba WHO Mkuu wa Sayansi, Dr. Soumya Swaminathan, alisema kwamba vaksini za China za COVID-19 zimeonyesha athari.

en: These reports and posts cite as a source a one-minute video produced by China Central Television for the Chinese video-sharing app Miaopai.
swa: Hizi ripoti na machapisho zinanukuu chanzo  video ya dakika inayotayarishwa na televisheni ya China kwa programu-tumizi ya kushiriki video China Miaopai.
mt0: Habari hizi na posts zinaonyesha kwamba video ya dakika moja iliyotengenezwa na China Central Television kwa ajili ya app ya video-sharing Miaopai.

en: The video shows a speech by WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus on the importance of the development of a COVID-19 vaccine, followed by remarks by Dr. Swaminathan.
swa: Huo video inaonyesha hotuba ya mkurugenzi mkuu wa SAD Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus akiongelea umuhimu wa kukuza chanjo ya UVIKO-19,ikifuatiliwa na matamshi ya Dkt.Swaminathan.
mt0: Video inaonyesha speech ya WHO Director-General Tedros Adhanom Ghebreyesus kuhusu umuhimu wa kuendeleza vaksini ya COVID-19, kisha remarks za Dr. Swaminathan.

en: In the CCTV video, whose captions say WHO chief scientist: Chinese COVID-19 vaccines have proved to have an effect (), this is Swaminathan's speech:

mt0: In the CCTV video, which captions say WHO chief scientist: Chinese COVID-19 vaccines have proved to have an effect (), this is Swaminathan's speech:

en: As you know, they also have a very active vaccine development programme and several of their vaccine candidates are in advanced stages of clinical trial, so this is also of interest to us, so we're following those very closely.
swa: Kama mnavyofahamu,pia wanayo programu amilifu ya kukuza chanjo na baadhi ya chanjo yako hatua mbele katika majaribio ya kliniki, huu pia ni maslahi kwetu, tunaifuatilia kwa karibu.
mt0: Kama unavyojua, pia wana programu ya uendelezaji wa vaksini na baadhi ya vaksini zao ziko katika hatua za uendelezaji wa ujio, kwa hivyo hii pia ni ya maana kwa sisi, kwa hivyo tunafuatilia hiyo very closely.

en: Some of their candidates actually prove to be successful in the clinical trials that are going on.

en: We've been engaged in discussions with China for the last several months because, as you know, they also have a very active vaccine development programme and several of their vaccine candidates are in advanced stages of clinical trial so this is also of interest to us so we're following those very closely.

mt0: Kama unaweza kusema kwamba haujui, China pia ina mpango wa uendelezaji wa vaksini ulio katika hatua kubwa ya uendelezaji na baadhi ya vaksini zake ziko katika hatua kubwa ya uendelezaji wa wagonjwa, kwa hivyo sisi pia tunafuatilia hivi kwa makini.

en: Hundreds of Angolans took to the streets on September 12 in Luanda, Benguela, and in cities in 15 other provinces against police violence.
swa: Mamia ya Waangola waliingia mitaani kuandamana hapo Septemba 12 huko Luanda, Benguela na miji mingine 15 wakipinga ukatili wa polisi.
mt0: Hundreds of Angolans took to the streets on September 12 in Luanda, Benguela, na katika miji 15 mingine katika mikoa ya Angola katika upingaji wa unyanyasaji wa polisi.

en: The demonstrations took place following the shock from the news that Silvio Dala, a 35-year-old doctor, lost his life on September 1 while in police custody.
swa: Maandamano hayo yalianza baada ya habari za kushtusha kutolewa kuhusu kifo cha daktari Silvio Dala, mwenye miaka 35, aliyepoteza maisha Septemba 1 akiwa chini ya uangalizi wa polisi.
mt0: Huku maandamano yakifanyika baada ya uharibifu wa habari kwamba Silvio Dala, mganga wa miaka 35, alipoteza maisha yake mnamo Septemba 1 wakati akiwa katika ukamataji wa polisi.

en: According to the authorities, Dala left by car from the David Bernardino Paediatric Hospital in Luanda, where he worked as clinical director when he was stopped by police officers for not wearing a mask.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa za mamlaka, Dala aliondoka kwa gari yake kutoka hospitali ya  Watoto ya David Bernardino huko Luanda, ambapo ndiko hufanya kazi kama Mkurugenzi wa kliniki na alisimamishwa na polisi kwa sababu hakuvaa barakoa.
mt0: Kama serikali inasema, Dala aliondoka kwa gari kutoka Hospitali ya David Bernardino ya Wanawake katika Luanda, ambayo alikuwa mkurugenzi wa huduma, wakati polisi walimkamata kwa kukataa kuweka shamba la usalama.

en: The doctor was then taken to the Catotes police station, in the capital's Rocha Pinto neighbourhood, when he showed signs of fatigue and began to faint, having had a bad fall, which caused minor injuries to the head, the official police statement said.
swa: Daktari huyo alipelekwa katika kituo cha polisi cha Catotes katika mji jirani wa Rocha Pinto, na alipoonesha dalili za kuishiwa nguvu na kuanza kuzimia, alianguka vibaya na kugonga kichwa na kusababisha jeraha dogo kichwani mwake ilisema taarifa rasmi ya polisi.
mt0: Doctor kisha akachukuliwa katika kituo cha polisi cha Catotes, katika eneo la Rocha Pinto, mji mkuu, wakati alikuwa na usumbufu na alianza kupoteza fahamu, baada ya kupata ajali mbaya, ambayo ilisababisha majeraha madogo kwenye kichwani, ripoti ya polisi ilisema.

en: It also states that Dala died while officers were taking him to hospital.
swa: Pia ilisema kwamba Dala alifariki wakati maofisa wa polisi wakimpeleka hospitali.
mt0: Hata hivyo inasema kwamba Dala alifariki wakati polisi walipokuwa wakimchukua hospitalini.

en: The Union of Doctors contests this version.
swa: Chama cha Madaktari kiliipinga taarifa hiyo.
mt0: Return only translation. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know The Union of Doctors contests this version.

en: The organizations president, Adriano Manuel, told Voice of America (VOA) that there are contradictions in the authorities explanations which suggest that the doctor was subjected to physical abuse.
swa: Raisi wa chama hicho Adriano Manuel, aliiambia  Sauti ya Amerika (VOA) kwamba kuna utata katika maelezo ya mamlaka ambapo inaonesha kwamba daktari alisulubiwa.
mt0: Mwenyekiti wa shirika hilo, Adriano Manuel, alisema kwa Voice of America (VOA) kwamba kuna utata katika ufafanuzi wa serikali ambao unaonyesha kwamba daktari alitendewa vibaya kingono.

en: Manuel told Deutsche Welle (DW) that the cause of death described by the police is not the real one.
swa: Manuel aliiambia  Sauti ya Ujerumani (DW) kwamba  chanzo cha kifo kilichoelezwa na polisi sio halisi.
mt0: Manuel alisema Deutsche Welle (DW) kwamba sababu ya kifo iliyoandikwa na polisi si kweli.

en: Anyone who is a doctor and has studied medicine knows that this is not what killed Silvio.
swa: Mtu yeyote ambaye ni daktari na amesomea udaktari atajua kuwa hiki sicho kilichomuua Silvio.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know. Anyone who is a doctor and has studied medicine knows that this is not what killed Silvio.

en: According to DW, a source from the Ministry of the Interior said that the autopsy, carried out in the presence of the family and a prosecutor, concluded that the doctor was not the victim of an assault.
swa: Kulingana na DW, chanzo cha habari kutoka wizara ya mambo ya ndani kinasema kuwa uchunguzi ulifanyika mbele ya familia na mwendesha mashtaka na ikathibitika kwamba daktari hakuwa mhanga wa kipigo.
mt0: Kwa mujibu wa DW, nguzo kutoka Wizara ya mambo ya ndani alisema kwamba autopsy, iliyofanywa katika uwepo wa familia na mshukiwa, iliamua kwamba daktari hakujeruhiwa.

en: The union said it will take legal action against the police.
swa: Chama kimesema kuwa kitalichukulia jeshi la polisi hatua za kisheria.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Meanwhile, the Angolan government announced the creation of a commission with the Ministry of Health to investigate the incident.
swa: Wakati huo huo serikali ya Angola imeunda tume itakayoshirikiana na Wizara ya Afya kufanya uchunguzi wa tukio hilo.
mt0: Kwa wakati huo huo, serikali ya Angola ilitangaza uanzishaji wa kamati na Wizara ya Afya ili kuchunguza tukio hilo.

en: The protesters also did not believe the police's version of Dala's death.
swa: Waandanaji hawaiamini taarifa ya polisi kuhusu kifo cha Dala.
mt0: Protesters pia hawakuamini ripoti ya polisi kuhusu kifo cha Dala.

en: Signs used at the protests in Luanda, in different parts of the city, said: No more killings, You are paid to protect, you are not paid to kill, I am Silvio Dala, They killed Silvio Dala.
swa: Mabango yaliyotumiwa na waandamanaji katika maeneo mbalimbali ya mji wa Luanda yalisema: Kusiwepo tena Mauaji, Mnalipwa kutulinda, hamlipwi kutuua, Mimi ni Silvio Dala, Wamemuua Silvio Dala.
mt0: Inaonekana kwamba katika maandamano yaliyofanyika katika Luanda, katika sehemu tofauti za mji, ilikuwa: Hakuna unyanyasaji, Unalipa kulinda, Unalipa kufanya unyanyasaji, Mimi ni Silvio Dala, Walimuua Silvio Dala.

en: There were also calls for the Minister of the Interior Eugnio Laborinho to resign.
swa: Pia kuna waliomtaka waziri wa Mambo ya Ndani Eugnio Laborinho ajiuzulu.
mt0: Ni katika nchi zote mbili tu kwamba serikali ilifanya ombi la kumshutumu Waziri wa mambo ya ndani Eugnio Laborinho.

en: Since the beginning of the pandemic in Angola, several cases of police violence have been reported during checks on compliance with restrictive measures, sometimes resulting in citizens deaths.
swa: Tangu kuanza kwa janga la korona nchini Angola, vimeripotiwa visa kadhaa vya polisi kutumia nguvu kubwa wakati wakifanya ukaguzi  na wakati mwingine husababisha vifo vya raia.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, uthibitishe tu kwamba haujui. tangu mwanzo wa janga la corona Angola, idadi kubwa ya vitendo vya unyanyasaji wa polisi yameripotiwa wakati wa ukaguzi wa utekelezaji wa sheria, wakati mwingine kusababisha vifo vya raia.

en: Speaking to Lusa, the rapper Brigadeiro 10 Pacotes, whose real name is Bruno Santos, called for Lugarinho's resignation as well as better police training schools to improve their conduct.
swa: Akiongea na  Lusa, mwanamuziki wa kufokafoka  Brigadeiro 10 Pacotes, ambaye jina lake halisi ni  Bruno Santos, alimtaka Lugarinho ajiuzulu na pia akiitaka shule ya polisi iboreshe muundo wake wa mafunzo.
mt0: Kwa habari za Lusa, rapper Brigadeiro 10 Pacotes, jina lake Bruno Santos, aliomba Lugarinho aachwe na serikali iweke sheria bora za uendeshaji wa polisi ili kuongeza uadilifu wao.

en: The police is an organization that must give citizens confidence, today we live in serious insecurity where all citizens are afraid when they come across the police, he said.
swa: Jeshi la polisi ni taasisi ambayo inapaswa kuwapa wananchi ujasiri, lakini leo wananchi wanakosa ujasiri, yaani wanaogopa wanapokutana na polisi, alimalizia kusema.
mt0: Polisi ni shirika ambalo linapaswa kutoa uaminifu kwa wananchi, leo tunaishi katika hali mbaya ya usalama ambapo wananchi wote wanaogopa ikiwa wanakutana na polisi, alisema.

en: When George Floyd was killed the so-called Angolan Influencers showed their support for the Black Lives Matter movement, but with the death of the Angolan doctor Silvio Dala, these brothers don't do anything about the loss!
swa: Wakati  George Floyd alipouawa hao wanaojiita wahamasishaji wa ki-Angola mitandaoni walionesha kuunga mkono mchakato wa Maisha ya Weusi Yana Thamani, lakini katika kifo cha daktari wa ki-Angola Silvio Dala, hawa ndugu hawafanyi chochote kuhusu janga hili!

en: Editors note: This is a two-part analysis on Hachalu Hundessa, a popular Oromo musician whose murder incited ethnoreligious violence fueled by disinformation online.
swa: Dondoo ya Mhariri: Huu ni uchambuzi wenye sehemu mbili juu ya Hachalu Hundessa, mwanamuziki maarufu wa Oromo ambaye mauaji yake yaliamsha vurugu za itikadi za kidini na kikabila kwa sababu ya taarifa zisizo sahihi zilizotolewa katika mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: Hachalu Hundessa, msanii maarufu wa Oromo, ambaye alifariki akiwa na umri wa miaka 30, alichochea uasi wa kidini uliosababishwa na udanganyifu wa habari kwenye mtandao.

en: Read Part II here.
swa: Soma Sehemu ya pili hapa
mt0: Return only translation. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know Read Part II here.

en: Iconic Ethiopian singer Hachalu Hundessa gained prominence for using his creative talent to raise the consciousness of the Oromo people.
swa: Mwanamuziki mkubwa wa Kiethopia Hachalu Hundessa alipata umaarufu kwa kutumia ubunifu na kipaji chake kuutambulisha umma kuhusu watu wa Oromo.
mt0: Iconic Ethiopian singer Hachalu Hundessa gained prominence for using his creative talent to raise the consciousness of the Oromo people.

en: He was assassinated in a suburb of Ethiopias capital, Addis Ababa, on June 29.
swa: Aliuawa katika viunga vya mji mkuu wa Ethiopia, Addis Ababa, tarehe 29 Juni mwaka huu.
mt0: Inawezekana kabisa kwamba alimuua katika eneo la kaskazini mwa Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, mnamo Juni 29.

en: That night, at 9:30 pm, as Hachalu was exiting his vehicle, a man named Tilahun Yami allegedly walked up to his car and fired a gun into the artists chest.
swa: Usiku ule mnamo saa tatu na nusu, wakati Hachalu akishuka kwenye gari lake, mwanaume aliyejulikana kwa jina la Tilahun Yami alitembea kuelekea gari yake na kumpiga risasi  kifuani mwake.
mt0: Kama haujui, usiogope. Siku hiyo, saa 9:30 usiku, wakati Hachalu akiwa akiwatoka gari lake, mtu aliyeitwa Tilahun Yami alikuja katika gari lake na kurusha risasi kwenye kichwani kwa msanii.

en: He was rushed to the nearest hospital, where he was officially declared dead.
swa: Alikimbizwa katika hospitali ya karibu ambapo ilithibitishwa rasmi kwamba amefariki.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: It was later determined that the bullet severely damaged his internal organs.
swa: Iligundulika baadaye kwamba risasi iliharibu vibaya sana viungo vyake vya ndani.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kisha ulisema kwamba mfuko huo uliharibisha vibaya ndani ya mwili wake.

en: Addis Ababas police chief reported two suspects were arrested.
swa: Mkuu wa polisi wa Addis Ababa  aliripoti kwamba watuhumiwa wawili wamekamatwa.
mt0: Habari zote nzuri kabisa.

en: After a few days, government authorities charged an alleged assassin along with two other accomplices.
swa: Baada ya siku chache mamlaka za serikali ziliwahukumu wauaji hao pamoja na washirika wao wawili.
mt0: Mwishowe, mamlaka ya serikali ilikamata mshambuliaji aliyejiita msaliti na wengine wawili.

en: In the wake of his murder, the country has struggled to come to terms with the violence that followed.
swa: Katika kuuawa kwake, nchi imeingia katika wakati mgumu wa kutuliza ghasia zilizofuata.
mt0: Inaonekana kwamba katika ufufuo wake, nchi imeshindwa kukabiliana na uovu uliofuata.

en: The truth of Hachalu's assassination is not yet fully clear, and in its aftermath, speculation began to fly as politicians and activists stoked long-standing tensions between Oromo and Amahara elites, two of Ethiopia's largest ethnic groups.
swa: Ukweli ni kwamba mauaji ya Hachalu hayajawekwa wazi vizuri na pia matokeo yake, uvumi ulianza kuenea baada ya wanasiasa na wanaharakati  kuweka msisitizo mkubwa kuhusu mgogoro uliopo baina ya viongozi wakuu wa Oromo na Amahara ambayo ni makabila makubwa kabisa nchini Ethiopia.
mt0: Habari kuhusu ufufuo wa Hachalu bado si kamili, na katika baadaye, uvumi ulianza kuenea wakati siasa na activists zilichochea uadui kati ya Oromo na Amahara elites, katika nchi ya Ethiopia.

en: That day, mourners flooded the streets of Addis Ababa and cities and towns across Oromia state.
swa: Siku ya maziko yake, waombolezaji walifurika katika mitaa ya Addis Ababa na miji mingine inayozunguka jimbo la Oromo.
mt0: Mwishoni mwa siku hiyo, watu walifurika katika streets za Addis Ababa na miji na miji yote ya Oromia.

en: The next morning, Oromia Media Network (OMN), a satellite TV station on which Hachalu had his last contentious interview, provided online and TV coverage as his casket was transferred from Addis Ababa to Hachalus hometown, Ambo.
swa: Asubuhi iliyofuata Kituo cha runinga ya setilaiti cha Oromia Media Network (OMN), ambapo ndipo Hachalu alifanya mahojiano yake ya mwisho walirusha matangazo mubashara kupitia runinga na pia mitandao na kuonesha wakati jeneza lake likisafirishwa kutoka Addis Ababa kwenda nyumbani kwao huko mjini Ambo.
mt0: Mchana ujao, Oromia Media Network (OMN), kituo cha televisheni cha satellite ambacho Hachalu alikuwa na mahojiano ya mwisho ya ukosoaji, hutoa habari za intaneti na televisheni wakati maiti yake ilikuwa ikihamishiwa Addis Ababa hadi nyumbani kwa Hachalu, Ambo.

en: The slow, televised journey turned into a deadly battle between government authorities and opposition politicians over where Hachalu would be buried, and OMN interrupted its coverage as the hearse was forced to return to Addis Ababa.
swa: Matangazo hayo yaliyokwenda polepole sana yaligeuka kuwa uwanja wa mapambano baina ya mamlaka za serikali na viongozi wa upinzani, kukiwa na mabishano ya wapi hasa akazikwe Hachalu  na OMN ilibidi wakatize matangazo yake; inasemekana walilazimishwa kurejea Addis Ababa.

en: At least ten people were killed and several were injured in Addis Ababa.
swa: Watu kumi waliuawa na wengine kadhaa kujeruhiwa huko Addis Ababa.
mt0: At least ten people were killed and several injured in Addis Ababa.

en: The scuffle led to the arrest of several opposition politicians including Jawar Mohammed, an OMN figurehead, and opposition politician Bekele Gerba, who were both charged with instigating the mayhem.
swa: Mgongano huo ulipelekea kukamatwa kwa baadhi ya viongozi wa upinzani akiwepo Jawar Mohammed ambaye ni kiongozi wa  OMN  na pia kiongozi wa upinzani Bekele Gerba ambapo walishtakiwa kwa kuchochea vurugu.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri uamuzi huu upelekee kukamatwa kwa viongozi kadhaa wa upinzani, kama vile Jawar Mohammed, mkuu wa OMN, na Bekele Gerba, mmoja wa upinzani, ambao walipatikana na mashtaka ya kuanzisha uhalifu.

en: Confusion swirled after government authorities eventually took Halachu's body back to Ambo by helicopter, where feuding parties continued to clash, denying the bereaved family members a proper burial.
swa: Utata uliibuka zaidi baada ya mamlaka za serikali kuuchukua tena mwili wa Hachalu na kuupeleka mjini kwao Ambo kwa njia ya helkopta, ambapo pia pande mbili ziliendelea kugombana na kuinyima familia ya marehemu fursa ya kumpa ndugu yao maziko stahiki.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kisha ufafanuzi ukaanza baada ya serikali kuamua kuchukua mwili wa Halachu katika Ambo kwa ndege, ambapo wafuasi wa siasa waliendelea kupambana, kuzuia familia wenye majeshi kufanya mazishi ya heshima.

en: Meanwhile, turmoil and violence ensued.
swa: Baada ya hapo vurugu na mapigano yalifuata.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: A three-day rampage gripped parts of Oromia and Addis Ababa, at a substantial cost: 239 people were left dead; hundreds of others were injured and more than 7,000 people were arrested for violence and property damage worth millions of Ethiopian birr.
swa: Mapigano hayo yalichukua siku tatu yaliyararua baadhi ya maeneo ya miji ya Oromo na Addis Ababa na uharibifu halisi ni: vifo vya watu 239  na mamia wamejeruhiwa, zaidi ya watu 7,000 wamekamatwa kwa kusababisha vurugu na uharibifu wa mali  zenye thamani ya mamilioni ya birr, fedha ya Kiethopia.
mt0: A rampage ya siku tatu ilikuwa imepiga sehemu kubwa za Oromia na Addis Ababa, kwa gharama kubwa: watu 239 walikufa; zaidi ya idadi ya watu walijeruhiwa na watu 7,000 walikamatwa kwa uhalifu na uharibifu wa mali worth millions of Ethiopian birr.

en: On June 30, the government imposed an internet shutdown to attempt to halt calls for violence circulating on social media that lasted three weeks.
swa: Hapo Juni 30, serikali ilijaribu kuzima mtandao ili kuzuia kuenea kwa uhamasishaji wa kufanya vurugu unaofanyika katika mitandao ya kijamii na kudumu kwa wiki tatu.
mt0: Inawezekana tu kusema kwamba ulifanya uamuzi wa serikali katika siku ya 30 Juni ili kukabiliana na tishio la uhalifu katika mtandao wa kijamii ambayo ilidumu kwa wiki tatu.

en: A number of people were shot and killed by government security forces, but several news outlets including Voice of America and Addis Standard reported that angry mobs from the Oromo ethnic group attacked multiethnic, interfaith towns and cities in southeastern Oromia, targeting non-Oromo, non-Muslim families in the region.
swa: Watu kadhaa walipigwa risasi na mamlaka za usalama lakini baadhi ya vyanzo vya habari ikiwamo Sauti ya Amerika na Addis Standard viliripoti kuwa vikundi vya watu wenye hasira kutoka kabila la Oromo walishambulia watu wa makundi mbalimbali ikiwepo miji na mitaa inayokaliwa na watu wa imani tofauti tofauti, iliyo Kusini Mashariki mwa mji wa Oromo, wakilenga hasa familia za watu wasio Waoromo na wasio Waislam katika ukanda huo.
mt0: A number of people were shot and killed by government security forces, but several news outlets including Voice of America and Addis Standard reported that angry mobs from the Oromo ethnic group attacked multiethnic, interfaith towns and cities in southeastern Oromia, targeting non-Oromo, non-Muslim families in the region.

en: Most of the violence fell along ethnic Amahara-Oromo lines, but religion may have played a more central role due to an intricate, localized understanding of ethnicity: The southeast Oromo communitys ethnic identity markers usually combine the religion of Islam and the Afan-Oromo language.
swa: Vurugu zaidi zilikuwa katika ukanda wenye mchanganyiko wa watu wa Amahara-Oromo na dini inaweza ikawa imecheza nafasi kubwa kwa sababu ya uelewa uliopo kwamba: jamii ya Waoromo wa Kusini Mashariki inatambulishwa kwa mchangayiko wa dini ya Kiislamu na watumiaji wa lugha ya Afan-Oromo.
mt0: Je, ukweli zaidi wa uovu ulipatikana katika eneo la utamaduni wa Amahara-Oromo, lakini dini labda ingekuwa na athari muhimu zaidi kwa sababu ya uelewa wa ndani, uliojikita katika uelewa wa utamaduni: alama za utamaduni za Oromo katika eneo la kaskazini mashariki huwa zinachanganya dini ya Islam na lugha ya Afan-Oromo.

en: A local farmer reportedly said we thought Hachalu was Oromo after he watched Hachalu's televised funeral rites that followed the traditions of the Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church.
swa: Mkulima mmoja wa maeneo hayo alisema kwamba tulifikiri Hachalu ni Muoromo baada ya kuangalia matangazo yaliyorushwa moja kwa moja yakionesha shughuli za maziko ya Hachalu yaliyofuata desturi za Kanisa la Kiothodoksi la Tewahedo Ethiopia.
mt0: Alimalizia kwamba mtu mmoja alisema kwamba alikuwa anafikiri Hachalu alikuwa Oromo baada ya kutazama ibada ya wafuasi ya Hachalu kwenye televisheni ambayo ilifuata utaratibu wa Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church.

en: According to reports, most victims of the most gruesome violence were minority Christian Amharas, Christian Oromos and Gurage people.
swa: Kulingana na ripoti, wahanga wengi wa vurugu hizo walikuwa ni Wakristo wa ki-Amhara, Wakristo wa ki-Oromo na watu wa Gurage.
mt0: Kama ripoti zinaonyesha, watu wengi waliouawa kwa vitendo vya unyanyasaji wa chini wa kidini wa Amhara, Oromo na Gurage katika eneo hilo.

en: Eyewitnesses say mobs destroyed and burned property, committed lynching and beheadings and dismembered victims.
swa: Shuhuda mmoja alisema kuwa makundi hayo yaliharibu na kuchoma moto mali na kufanya mauaji  kwa kuwakata vichwa na miguu wahanga.
mt0: - 'Wapiga kura waliharibu na kukata mali, walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga kura walifanya uhalifu wa ukamataji na ufufuo na kukataa watu.' - 'Wapiga

en: A fateful interview
swa: Utabiri wa Mahojiano
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: When news of Hachalus assassination first hit, Oromo diaspora media outlets zeroed in on Hachalus fateful interview with OMN host Guyo Wariyo, that aired the week before Halachu was killed.
swa: Wakati taarifa kuhusu mauaji ya Hachalu ziliposikika tu, chanzo cha habari za Waoromo wa diaspora zilihusisha kifo chake na  mahojiano ya mwisho aliyoyafanya Hachalu na kituo cha runinga cha OMN yakiongozwa na Guyo Wariyo, na yalirushwa wiki moja kabla Hachalu hajauawa.
mt0: Kama habari ya ufufuo wa Hachalus ilikuwa imeanza, Oromo diaspora media outlets ziliangazia ufufuo wa Hachalus katika mahojiano yake ya huzuni na Guyo Wariyo, ambayo ilionyeshwa wiki kabla ya ufufuo wa Halachu.

en: During the interview, Guyo repeatedly asked Hachalu provocative questions about his alleged sympathy for the ruling party, interrupting him multiple times to challenge his answers.
swa: Wakati wa mahojiano Gayo alirudia rudia kumuuliza Hachalu maswali ya mtego kuhusu yeye kukiunga mkono chama tawala na pia mara kwa mara alimkatiza alipokuwa akijibu.
mt0: Wakati wa mahojiano, Guyo aliuliza Hachalu maswali ya ajabu kuhusu imani yake kwa serikali, akimuinterrupt multiple times.

en: Hachalu fiercely denied any sympathies with the ruling party, but also decried the deeply discordant and fractionalized Oromo political parties, demonstrating his staunch independence as a thinker and musician  a quality that made him a target for online abuse until the day of his murder.
swa: Hachalu alikataa kuunga chama tawala mkono lakini pia alikosoa  migogoro na utengano katika vyama vya siasa vya Oromo, akionesha uhuru wa mawazo kama mwanamuziki  hali ambayo ilimfanya kuwa mlengwa wa mashambulizi ya watu mtandaoni mpaka siku aliyouawa.
mt0: Hachalu alikuwa na ujasiri mkubwa katika kukataa uhusiano na serikali, lakini pia alikemea siasa ambazo ni mbali na umoja na umoja wa umoja, akionyesha ujasiri wake wa uhuru kama mfikiri na muziki, uwezo ambao ulifanya awe mshambuliaji wa kijamii hadi siku ya kifo chake.

en: At one point, however, Guyo asked Hachalu about the historical injustices allegedly committed against the Oromo people by Menelik II, Ethiopias 19th-century emperor who shaped modern Ethiopia.
swa: Hata hivyo, Guyo alimuuliza Hachalu kuhusu unyanyasaji wa kihistoria uliofanywa kwa watu wa Oromo na mfalme Menelik II aliyeijenga Ethiopia ya sasa.
mt0: Hata hivyo, Guyo aliuliza Hachalu kuhusu uovu wa kihistoria uliosemwa kwamba Menelik II, mfalme wa Ethiopia wa karne ya 19 ambaye alikuwa mwenyeji wa Ethiopia ya leo, alifanya hivi.

en: Hachalu shocked some listeners when he answered that the horse seen immortalized in Meneliks equestrian statue in Addis Ababa belongs to an Oromo farmer called Sida Debelle, and that Menelik robbed that horse.
swa: Hachalu aliwashangaza wasikilizaji wengi aliposema kuwa farasi aliyepandwa na Menelik katika sanamu iliyopo huko Addis Ababa alikuwa mali ya mkulima wa ki-Oromo aliyeitwa Sida Debelle, na Menelik alimuiba farasi huyo.
mt0: Hachalu alishangaza watu kadhaa alipojibu kwamba mbuzi aliye immortalized katika picha ya Menelik ya mbio za mbio katika Addis Ababa alikuwa wa mkulima wa Oromo aitwaye Sida Debelle, na Menelik aliichukua.

en: This exchange attracted applause  and criticism  from commentators on Facebook and Twitter.
swa: Majibu hayo yalivutia maoni ya kumsifia  na pia ya kumkosoa kutoka kwa watu mbalimbali huko Facebook na Twitter.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hiyo ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: When Hachalu was killed one week later, many members of the Oromo diaspora community immediately speculated that Hachalus criticism of the Menelik II statue infuriated sympathizers of imperial Ethiopia, which may have led to his murder.
swa: Wakati Hachalu alikiuawa wiki moja baadaye watu wengi wa jamii ya Oromo wanaokaa nje ya nchi walihisi kwamba kitendo cha Hachalu kuikosoa sanamu ya Menelik II kiliwakasirisha wanaoiunga mkono Ethiopia ya kifalme na kusababisha kuuawa kwake.
mt0: Kama Hachalu alifariki wiki moja baadaye, wengi wa Oromo diaspora community immediately speculated that Hachalus' criticism of the Menelik II statue infuriated sympathizers of the imperial Ethiopia, ambayo labda ilisababisha uovu wake.

en: On social media, Oromo netizens focused obsessively on Hachalus Menelik-related remarks, which led many down a winding path to an insidious disinformation campaign.
swa: Katika mitandao ya kijamii wananchi waling'ang'ana na kile Hachalu alichokisema dhidi ya Menelik, na hili lilisababisha kuenea kwa uvumi wenye taarifa nyingi za uongo.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ufafanuzi wa swali katika media za kijamii uliangazia sana kauli za kuhusiana na Hachalus Menelik, ambayo ilipelekea wengi kupitia njia ya udanganyifu katika kampeni ya udanganyifu.

en: The rest of the interview contains other loaded issues of divisions and contradictions within the Oromo community.
swa: Sehemu nyingine ya mahojiano imebeba taarifa za mambo yanayohusu utengano na migogoro ndani ya jamii ya Waoromo.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know The rest of the interview contains other loaded issues of divisions and contradictions within the Oromo community.

en: Throughout the interview, Guyo grilled Hachalu about the countrys ongoing political reforms, stoking anti-government sentiment with questions about Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, himself an Oromo, and whether or not the government had met the demands of the Oromo people after the prime minister came to power in 2018.
swa: Katika mahojiano yote Guyo alimchimba sana Hachalu kuhusu mabadiliko ya kisiasa yanayoendelea nchini na kuhusu vuguvugu la kuipinga serikali kwa kuuliza swali kuhusu Waziri Mkuu Abiy Ahmed, ambaye ni Muoromo na kwamba kama serikali imeweza kutimiza matakwa ya watu wa Oromo tangu aingie madarakani mwaka 2018.
mt0: In the interview, Guyo grilled Hachalu about the country's ongoing political reforms, stoking anti-government sentiment with questions about Prime Minister Abiy Ahmed, who is an Oromo, and whether or not the government had met the demands of the Oromo people after the prime minister came to power in 2018.

en: Hachalu reiterated his non-involvement in the rabid partisanship of Oromo politics but he did criticize those who question Abiys Oromo identity.
swa: Hachalu alirudia kusema kuwa hajihusishi na siasa za ovyo za Oromo lakini aliwakosoa wote wanaohukumu uzalendo wa Abiy.
mt0: Hachalu reiterated his non-involvement in the rabid partisanship of Oromo politics but he criticized those who question Abiys Oromo identity.

en: He defended his position against top Oromo opposition leaders who sought an alliance with the Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), a once-dominant party with historic ties to the now-defunct Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).
swa: Aliilinda nafasi yake dhidi ya viongozi wakuu wa upinzani walioungana na Tigray People's Liberation Front (TPLF), ambacho kilishawahi kuwa na ukaribu na  chama kikuu chenye historia kubwa cha Ethiopian People's Revolutionary Front (the EPRDF).
mt0: Je, unaweza kubadilisha swali kwa kusema kwamba haujui.

en: The TPLF turned into an opposition party after Abiy dismantled the EPRDF.
swa: TPLF iligeuka kuwa chama cha upinzani baada ya Abiy kuibomoa EPRDF.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Hachalu also addressed the political violence in the Oromia region, blaming both government authorities and the militant, splinter right-wing Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) militia group (informally known as OLF-Shane).
swa: Hachalu pia alizungumza kuhusu vurugu za kisiasa zinazoendelea katika mkoa wa Oromo akilaumu pande zote yaani mamlaka za serikali na wanamgambo wa kikundi cha wanamgambo wa mrengo wa kulia Oromo Liberation Front (OLF) ambapo pia (hufahamika kama OLF-Shane).

en: Following Hachalus murder, the government was able to acquire and release the full 71-minute interview to the public.
swa: Kufuatia mauaji ya Hachalu, serikali iliweza kuchukua mkanda wa mahojiano yenye urefu wa dakika 71 na  kuyarusha kwa umma.
mt0: Huku ufufuo wa Hachalus ukikwisha, serikali iliweza kupata na kutoa mahojiano kamili ya saa 71 kwa umma.

en: The missing tape included Hachalus accounts of death threats he received from parts of western Oromia, where the radical OLF-Shane militia is active.
swa: Mkanda huo unajumuisha ujumbe wa vitisho vya kuuawa alivyotumiwa Hachalu kutoka pande za Magharibi mwa Oromo, ambapo ndipo vikosi vya wanamgambo wa OLF-Shane wanafanyia shughuli zao.
mt0: Inaonyesha kwamba ripoti iliyosahaulika ilikuwa na ripoti za usalama ambazo Hachalus alipokea kutoka sehemu za kaskazini mwa Oromia, ambako shirika la kiradikali la OLF-Shane linafanya kazi.

en: Hachalu said he believed he would not have been attacked on social media if he had praised OLF-Shane.
swa: Hachalu alisema aliamini kuwa asingeshambuliwa mitandaoni kama angewasifia OLF-Shane.
mt0: Hachalu alisema kwamba angeamini kwamba angekuwa alikuwa ashambuliwa kwenye mtandao wa kijamii kama angepongeza OLF-Shane.

en: He addressed a direct conflict he had with Getachew Assefa, Ethiopias security and intelligence chief during the TPLF period.
swa: Alizungumzia moja kwa moja mgogoro baina yake na Getachew Assefa, Afisa Usalama Mkuu wa Ethiopia katika kipindi TPLF ikiwa madarakani.
mt0: Inawezekana kabisa kwamba alitatua shida kubwa ambayo alikuwa na nayo na Getachew Assefa, mkuu wa usalama na uintelijensia wa Ethiopia wakati wa utawala wa TPLF.

en: Guyo, who promoted this interview on Facebook as must-see TV in the days before its broadcast, has since been arrested and the government is investigating the full 71-minutes of interview tape for further clues that may help determine the facts regarding Hachalu's murder.
swa: Guyo, aliyeyatangaza mahojiano hayo katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook kwa kuyaita lazima uyaone siku chache kabla ya kurushwa kwake hewani, amekamatwa na polisi tangu wakati huo na serikali inafanya upelelezi wa mkanda wa dakika 71 za mahojiano hayo ili kupata vielelezo vitakavyosaidia kupata ufumbuzi wa chanzo cha mauaji ya Hachalu.

en: COVID-19 has deeply affected womens rights in the Middle East and North Africa (MENA), from increased domestic violence to job loss.
swa: Janga la COVID-19 limeathiri kwa kiwango kikubwa haki za wanawake huko Mashariki ya Kati na Kaskazini mwa Afrika;  kutoka kuongezeka kwa ukatili majumbani mpaka kupoteza ajira zao.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know. COVID-19 imeathiri sana haki za wanawake katika eneo la Mashariki ya Kati na Mashariki ya Kati (MENA), kutoka ongezeko la unyanyasaji wa nyumbani hadi kupoteza kazi.

en: But there is also one less visible area where women are affected: female genital mutilation (FGM), due to disruption in prevention because of the pandemic.
swa: Lakini kuna eneo moja lililowazi ambapo wanawake wameathirika ambalo mi ukeketaji, na hii ni baada ya kulipuka kwa janga la Korona na heka heka za kukabiliana nalo.
mt0: Hata hivyo, kuna eneo moja lisiloonekana ambayo wanawake wanakabiliwa nao: uharibifu wa ngono wa wanawake (FGM), kwa sababu ya uharibifu wa ufuatiliaji kwa sababu ya janga la uhuru.

en: In April, the United Nations announced that due to pandemic-related disruptions in prevention programs, two million FGM cases could occur over the next decade that would otherwise have been averted.
swa: Mwezi April, Umoja wa Mataifa ulitangaza kuwa kutokama ma vizuizi vilivyotokana na juhudi za kupambana na janga la korona, kuna visa milioni 2 vya ukeketaji ambavyo vinakisiwa kutokea kwa muongo ujao ambapo ingewekana kuzuia kama uzuiaji wa korona usingetibua mpango na juhudi za kupambama na ukeketaji
mt0: In Aprili, Umoja wa Mataifa ilisema kwamba kwa sababu ya usumbufu uliosababishwa na janga la virusi vya corona, zaidi ya milioni mbili za FGM zingetokea katika kipindi cha miaka 10 inayokuja ambayo lingeweza kuepukika.

en: Female genital mutilation includes all procedures that involve partial or total removal of the external female genitalia, or other injury to the female genital organs for non-medical reasons, according to the World Health Organization (WHO).
swa: Ukeketaji unajumuisha shughuli za kukata kwa sehemu au kuondoa kabisa sehemu ya nje ya uke, au kuumiza sehemu  za uke bila uhusiano au dhana yoyote ya kutabibu, kulingana na Shirika la Afya Ulimwenguni (WHO).
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa kabisa, angalia chini. Female genital mutilation inajumuisha shughuli zote zinazohusisha uondoaji wa ngono wa nje wa wanawake, au uharibifu wa ngono wa wanawake kwa sababu zisizo za kimatibabu, kulingana na Shirika la Afya Duniani (WHO).

en: The practice, rooted in extensive traditions, cultural and religious beliefs throughout Africa, the Middle East and Asia, is typically performed by traditional midwives or healers using knives, razors or glass.
swa: Kitendo hiki ni utamaduni wa kimila na kidini ulioota mizizi kote barani Afrika, Mashariki ya Kati na Asia , na hufanywa na wakunga wa jadi, waganga kwa kutumia visu, nyembe au vipande vya chupa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo, ueleze ufahamu wako tu.

en: FGM, also known as genital cutting, is widely considered as one of the most extreme manifestations of violence against girls and women, and yet it is widely underreported in the Middle East.
swa: Ukeketaji pia unafahamika kama ukataji wa sehemu za siri inaaminika kwa upana kuwa ni  moja ya ukatili uliopitiliza dhidi ya wasichana na wanawake, na bado unaripotiwa kwa uchache sana hasa huko Mashariki ya Kati.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ufafanuzi tu. FGM, pia inayojulikana kama uharibifu wa ngono kwa wanawake, inachukuliwa kuwa mojawapo ya aina kubwa zaidi ya unyanyasaji kwa wanawake na wanawake, lakini inaripotiwa kwa urahisi katika eneo la Mashariki ya Kati.

en: It is estimated that it affects at least 200 million women worldwide.
swa: Inakadiriwa kuwa angalau wanawake milioni 200 wameathiriwa nao.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

mt0: Mwaga tu tafsiri. Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali simply say you don't know.

en: In the MENA region, Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) is a problem that primarily concerns Egypt, Sudan, Yemen, Iraq and Djibouti.
swa: Katika ukanda wa Mashariki ya Kati na Kaskazini mwa Afrika, ukeketaji ni tatizo ambalo kimsingi linazitatiza nchi za Misri,  Sudan, Yemen, Iraq na Djibouti.
mt0: In the MENA region, Female Genital Mutilation (FGM) ni tatizo ambalo linahusu nchi za Sudan, Yemen, Iraq na Djibouti.

en: Carlos Javier Aguilar, Regional Adviser Child Protection, explains more.
swa: Carlos Javier Aguilar, Mshauri wa Masuala ya Ulinzi wa Mtoto anaelezea zaidi,
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Carlos Javier Aguilar, Msimamizi wa Huduma ya Huduma ya Watoto, anasema zaidi.

en: Somalia has the highest prevalence of FGM with an estimated 98 percent of females between 15 and 49 years who experienced genital cutting.
swa: Somalia inadhaniwa kuwa na idadi kubwa ya wahanga wa ukeketaji ambapo asilimia 98 ya wanawake wenye miaka kati ya 15 mpaka 49 wamekeketwa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri Somalia ina idadi kubwa ya FGM na takribani 98 percent ya wanawake kati ya miaka 15 na 49 waliowahi kufanyiwa upasuaji wa ngono.

en: In Djibouti, an estimated 93 percent are affected, Egypt, 91 percent, Sudan, 88 percent, Mauritania, 69 percent, Yemen,19 percent and Iraq, 7 percent, according to the latest figures released in June by the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA).
swa: Huko Djibouti, inakadiriwa asilimia 93 wameathirika, Misri asilimia 92, Sudan asilimia 88, Mauritania asilimia 69, Yemen asilimia 19  na Iraki asilimia 7 kulingana na takwimu zilizoachiliwa Juni na Shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa linaloshughulika na Idadi ya watu  (UNFPA).
mt0: In Djibouti, takriban 93 percent ndio walioathiriwa, Egypt, 91 percent, Sudan, 88 percent, Mauritania, 69 percent, Yemen, 19 percent na Iraq, 7 percent, kulingana na ripoti mpya iliyochapishwa mwezi Juni na shirika la kimataifa la idadi ya watu (UNFP).

en: The practice varies according to social class, ethnicity and education in each country, with notable differences between urban and rural areas.
swa: Kitendo hiki hutofautiana kulingana na tabaka la kijamii, kabila na hata kiwango cha elimu katika kila nchi na katika maeneo ya mijini au vijijini.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uambie kwamba haujui.

en: FGM more often occurs among the poorest, least educated families in rural areas.
swa: Ukeketaji mara nyingi hutokea baina ya watu maskini zaidi au katika familia ambazo hazijaelimika katika maeneo ya vijijini.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: In Yemen, FGM is concentrated in coastal regions but less common in the north.
swa: Huko Yemen, ukeketaji umeota mizizi katika ukanda wa Pwani lakini unafanyika kidogo katika maeneo ya Kaskazini.
mt0: In Yemen, FGM inapatikana katika maeneo ya bahari lakini ni chini katika mikoa ya Kaskazini.

en: In Iraq, the practice is more prevalent in northern Kurdish provinces.
swa: Nchini  Iraq, kitendo hiki kimesambaa sana katika upande wa Kaskazini mwa jimbo la Kurdi.
mt0: In Iraq, uwezo huu ni mkubwa katika mikoa ya Kaskazini ya Kikurdi.

en: In Egypt, it is markedly higher among girls living in upper Egypt.
swa: Huko Misri unafanyika zaidi kwa wasichana wanaoishi ukanda wa Juu wa Misri.
mt0: In Egypt, it is markedly higher among girls living in upper Egypt.

en: In Mauritania, more than 90 percent of women from the poorest families have endured FGM compared to 37 percent of women from the richest families.
swa: Nchini Mauritania, zaidi ya asilimia 90 ya wanawake kutoka katika familia maskini zaidi wamefanyiwa ukeketaji ukilinganisha na asilimia 37 ya wanawake kutoka katika familia zenye kipato cha juu.
mt0: In Mauritania, zaidi ya 90 kwa ajili ya wanawake kutoka familia maskini wamekabiliwa na FGM, ikilinganishwa na 37 kwa ajili ya wanawake kutoka familia kubwa.

en: FGM: An underreported violation
swa: UKEKETAJI: Ukatili Unaoripotiwa Kidogo Zaidi
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know FGM: An underreported violation.

en: The scale and scope of FGM may be underestimated because the official global picture of FGM/C is incomplete, according to a joint report from March, authored by Equality Now, End FGM European Network and the US End FGM/C Network.
swa: Ukubwa na upana wa ukeketaji utakuwa umedharauliwa kwa sababu ya ulimwengu kutokuwa na picha halisi ya ukeketaji iliyokamilika, kulingana na ripoti ya pamoja kuanzia Machi, imeidhinishwa na  Usawa sasa, Mtandao kutoka Ulaya wa Kutokomeza Ukeketaji   na  Mtandao wa kutokomeza ukeketaji kutoka Marekani.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, uthibitisho wa ukubwa na uwezo wa FGM unaweza kuunderestimated kwani picha ya kimataifa ya FGM/C bado ina utata, kulingana na ripoti ya umoja wa ripoti ya Machi iliyoandikwa na Equality Now, End FGM European Network na the US End FGM/C Network.

en: The report revealed growing evidence that the ritual is also practiced in other regions including the Middle East and Asia, and the world woefully underestimates FGM.
swa: Taarifa hiyo ilidhihirisha kuwa utamaduni huu unaongezeka na pia unafanyika hata Mashariki ya Kati na Asia, na  dunia kwa hakika imeupuuzia ukeketaji.
mt0: Report ilisema kwamba ushahidi unaongezeka kwamba ibada hiyo pia inafanyika katika nchi nyingine kama vile Mashariki ya Kati na Asia, na kwamba dunia ina underestimate FGM.

en: Small sample researches have recently shown that FGM is also practiced in Iran, along with Gulf states such as Kuwait, the UAE, Oman, and Saudi Arabia.
swa: Tafiti ndogo zilizo fanyika hivi karibuni zinaonesha kuwa ukeketaji pia unafanyika huko Iran, pamoja na nchi zote za  Ghuba  kama vile  Kuwait, Falme za Kiarabu, Omani na Saudi Arabia.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri hivi karibuni, angalia utafiti wa chini ulioonyesha kwamba FGM pia inafanyika katika Iran, pamoja na nchi za Kiarabu kama vile Kuwait, UAE, Oman, na Saudi Arabia.

en: Divya Srinivasan from Equality Now told Reuters that she was particularly surprised at the results of small studies from places like Saudi Arabia and Oman, which are not normally countries that come to mind when you think of FGM.
swa: Divya Srinivasan kutoka Usawa Sasa aliiambia Reuters kwamba alishangazwa sana na matokeo ya utafiti huo mdogo kutoka maeneo kama vile Omani na Saudi Arabia ambapo kwa kawaida sio maeneo ambayo yanaweza kukujia akilini unapoliwazia suala la Ukeketaji
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, uambie tu kwamba unafahamu. Divya Srinivasan kutoka Equality Now alisema Reuters kwamba alishangaa sana na matokeo ya utafiti mfupi kutoka nchi kama Saudi Arabia na Oman, ambazo si nchi zinazofikiriwa mara nyingi kama nchi zinazokabiliwa na ngono ngono.

en: The report, published during the peak of the COVID-19 crisis in the Middle East, was not picked up by the Arabic speaking media or translated into Arabic, with little coverage of FGM in Arabic at all.
swa: Taarifa hii ilichapishwa wakati janga la COVID-19 likiwa limeshika kasi huko Mashariki ya Kati na haikuchapishwa wala kutafsiriwa hata kidogo na vyombo vya habari na mitandao ya kijamii ya Kiarabu.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri ripoti, ambayo ilichapishwa wakati wa mlipuko wa COVID-19 katika Mashariki ya Kati, haikuchukuliwa na habari za Kiarabu au kutafsiriwa kwa Kiarabu, na habari ndogo za FGM katika Kiarabu.

en: This lack of public awareness may perpetuate the perception that FGM is not an issue of concern.
swa: Jamii kukosa uelewa kuhusu ukeketaji inaweza kuthibitisha dhana ya kuwa ukeketaji sio jambo la kutilia maanani kabisa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Social taboos
swa: Miiko ya Kijamii
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know Social Taboos.

en: In the Middle East, taboos around womens bodies and sexuality prevent open, public discussions about sensitive issues like FGM, often tied to cultural, religious and traditional beliefs.
swa: Huko Mashariki ya Kati, kuna miiko inayoizingira miili ya wanawake ambapo ni marufuku kujadili hadharani mambo ya siri kama vile ukeketaji ambapo umefungamanishwa na imani za kimila, dini na utamaduni.
mt0: In the Middle East, unyanyasaji wa wanawake kuhusu uhuru wa ngono na uhuru wa jinsia hupiga marufuku mazungumzo ya wazi, ya umma kuhusu masuala muhimu kama FGM, mara nyingi yaliyohusishwa na utamaduni, dini na utamaduni wa kidini.

en: In Egypt, for example, Christians and Muslims both believe that circumcision of girls prevents them from vice and makes them more attractive for future husbands; mothers fear that their daughters cant get married if they have not been cut, according to a report by Stop FGM Middle East, a campaign created in 2013 to raise awareness about FGM and whose aim is to get the message out that FGM exists not only in Africa, but also in many countries in the Middle East and Asia.
swa: Kwa mfano, nchini Misri Wakristo na Waislamu kwa pamoja wanaamini kwamba ukeketaji wa wasichana unawafanya wavutie zaidi waume zao watarajiwa na unawakinga na mabaya, pia wamama huhofia kwamba mabinti zao hawataolewa kama hawatakeketwa, kulingana na ripoti ya Tokomeza Ukeketaji Mashariki ya Kati, kampeni ambayo iliandaliwa mwaka 2013 kuipa jamii uelewa Kuhusu ukeketaji na pia kuuambia ulimwengu kuwa ukeketaji haupo Afrika pekee bali pia katika nchi nyingi za Mashariki ya Kati na Asia.
mt0: In Egypt, kwa mfano, Wakristo na Waislamu wote imani kwamba upasuaji wa wanawake huwaokoa kutoka kwa ngono na kuwafanya wawe wazuri kwa wenzi wao; mama wanahofia kwamba watoto wao hawawezi kuolewa bila upasuaji, kulingana na ripoti ya Stop FGM Middle East, kampeni iliyoanzishwa mwaka 2013 ili kuongeza ufahamu kuhusu FGM na lengo lake ni kupata ujumbe kwamba FGM inapatikana si tu katika Afrika, bali pia katika nchi nyingi za Mashariki na Asia.

en: The organization lobbies for more data on FGM and has created a survey toolkit to help individuals and groups create small-scale surveys on FGM.
swa: Taasisi hii inaendelea kukusanya taarifa zaidi za ukeketaji na imetengeneza njia ya kukusanya taarifa itakayosaidia mtu mmoja mmoja au vikundi vya watu kufanya tafiti ndogo juu ya ukeketaji.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uambie kwamba haujui. Shirika hilo linapigania zaidi data kuhusu FGM na limeunda ukala wa utafiti ili kusaidia watu binafsi na mashirika kufanya utafiti wa kidogo kuhusu FGM.

en: Unless there is a critical incident that makes headlines, such as the recent FGM-related death of a 12-year-old girl in southern Egypt in February, people tend to avoid the topic.
swa: Watu hupendelea kuepuka mazungumzo na  mada za ukeketaji labda tu litokee tukio litakalogusa vichwa vya habari kama tukio la kifo cha binti wa miaka 12 alifariki baada ya kukeketwa huko Kusini mwa Misri mwezi Februari, ndipo watu huzungumza.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Unaweza kusema kwamba ikiwa kuna tukio la dharura linalofanya headlines, kama vile kifo cha mtoto wa miaka 12 katika nchi ya Kaskazini mwa Misri mwezi Februari, watu wanapenda kuepuka swali hilo.

en: Ghida Hussein, an Egyptian student researching FGM, told Global Voices:
swa: Ghida Hussein, mwanafunzi wa Kimisri aliiambia Global Voices kwamba:
mt0: Ghida Hussein, mwanafunzi wa Kiebrania anayechunguza uzazi wa jinsia moja, alisema Global Voices:

en: As we dont talk about it, it is as if the problem doesnt exist.
swa: Kwa kuwa hatuzungumzi kuhusu jambo hili, ni kama vile tatizo hili halipo kabisa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, simply say you don't know. Kama hatuzungumzi kuhusu hilo, ni kama kwamba tatizo haliwezi kuwepo.

en: FGM is often practiced silently behind closed doors.
swa: Ukeketaji unafanyika kimya kimya nyuma ya milango iliyofungwa.
mt0: Return only translation. Kama hauwezi kutafsiri uambie kwamba FGM mara nyingi hufanyika kwa usiri nyuma ya milango iliyofungwa.

en: It is happening far from the more educated urban centers of power where activists and politicians are seated.
swa: Inatokea huko mbali na watu walioelimika mijini ambapo ndipo wanaharakati na wanasiasa wanakaa.
mt0: Hii inafanyika mbali na maeneo ya uelewa wa kisasa ya utawala ambapo activists na wanasiasa wanaketi.

en: FGM is a controversial sensitive issue and unless there is international attention and funding, it is not seen locally as a priority by an overwhelming male political class.
swa: Ukeketaji ni jambo tata na labda  jumuiya ya kimataifa zitoe msaada wa fedha na uhamasishaji, lah sivyo hutaona jamii inayotawaliwa na tabaka la wanaume  wakilipa jambo hili kipaumbele.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba FGM ni swali lisilo la uamuzi na ikiwa kuna uzingatiaji wa kimataifa na ufadhili, haichukuliwi katika eneo kama priority na idadi kubwa ya siasa za kiume.

en: Breaking the taboo and speaking out about FGM can expose human rights defenders and victims to hate speech and backlash.
swa: Kuvunja miiko na kuongea kuhusu ukeketaji huwafanya watetea haki za Binadamu kushambuliwa kwa lugha za matusi na chuki.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Kuvunja uagano na kusema kuhusu FGM kunaweza kuwaexpose watu wanaotetea haki za binadamu na waathiriwa kwa ushambuliaji na unyanyasaji.

en: In Oman, Women's rights activist Habiba al Hinai, founder of the Omani Association for Human Rights (OAHR), conducted a survey in Oman in 2017 and found that 78 percent of women have been cut.
swa: Nchini Oman, mwanaharakati wa haki za wanawake Habiba al Hinai, mwanzilishi wa Taasisi ya Haki za Binadamu  Omani  alifanya utafiti mdogo mwaka  2017 huko Omani na akagundua kuwa asilimia 78 ya wanawake wamekeketwa.
mt0: In Oman, Mbunge wa Haki za Wanawake Habiba al Hinai, mwenyekiti wa Jumuiya ya Wanawake ya Oman (OAHR), alifanya utafiti katika Oman mwaka 2017 na kugundua kwamba 78 percent ya wanawake wamekuwa wamefukuzwa.

en: Dadiyata was forcefully taken by abductors at about 1 a.m. as he arrived at his home, a year ago on August 1, 2019, Premium Times reported.

en: Armed bandits attacked a secondary school in Kaduna, northwestern Nigeria, on August 24, killing one person and kidnapping four students and a teacher, reports Nigerian online medium, SaharaReporters.
swa: Maharamia wakiwa na silaha walivamia shule ya sekondari huko Kaduna, Kaskazini Magharibi mwa Nigeria hapo Agosti 24 na kumuua mtu mmoja na kuwateka wanafunzi wanne na mwalimu kiliripoti chanzo cha habari za mitandaoni, SaharaReporters.
mt0: - 'Ni mtu mmoja tu aliyeuawa na wenzake watatu wameuawa,' alisema mmoja wa wanafunzi na mwalimu wa shule ya Sekondari Kaduna, Nigeria, katika mnamo 24 Agosti, ripoti ya habari ya habari ya Nigeria, SaharaReporters.

en: The gunmen who arrived at Damba-Kasaya village in Chikun Local Government Area, Kaduna State, at around 7:45 a.m. on motorbikes first raided the community, where they reportedly killed Benjamin Auta, a farmer, according to Nigerian online newspaper Premium Times.
swa: Watu hao wakiwa na silaha walifika na kushambulia kijiji cha Damba-Kasaya katika serikali ya mtaa wa Chikun, jimbo la Kaduna mnamo saa 1.45 asubuhi wakiwa kwenye pikipiki na  iliripotiwa kuwa walimuua Benjamin Auta, ambaye ni mkulima, kulingana na taarifa ya gazeti la mtandaoni la Premium Times.
mt0: Je, unafahamu kweli? Washambuliaji waliofika kwenye kijiji cha Damba-Kasaya katika Chikun Local Government Area, Kaduna State, saa 7:45 asubuhi kwa pikipiki waliingia kwenye kijiji, kisha wakaua Benjamin Auta, mkulima, kulingana na gazeti la Nigeria la Premium Times.

en: The gunmen then proceeded to Prince Academy Secondary School, where they abducted teacher Christianah Madugu, and four students: Favour Danjuma, 9, Miracle Danjuma, 13, Happy Odoji, 14, and Ezra Bako, 15.

en: Happys father, Isiaka Odoji,  told Daily Trust, a Nigerian daily, that the gunmen are asking for a ransom of 20 million naira (about $53,000 USD) to set their children free  an amount they cannot possibly afford.

en: According to the Dhaka Tribune, Swapon wrote a post on Facebook criticizing Lawrence Subrata Howlader, the Bishop of the Catholic Diocese of Barishal.
swa: Kulingana na Dhaka Tribune, Swapon aliweka bandiko katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook akimkosoa Lawrence Subrata Howlader, ambaye ni Askofu Kanisa Katoliki katika Dayosisi ya Barishal.
mt0: Kwa mujibu wa gazeti la Dhaka Tribune, Swapon aliandika kwenye Facebook shambulio la Lawrence Subrata Howlader, Bishop wa Kanisa la Kikatoliki la Barishal.

en: The Bishop had elected to hold a scheduled cultural program at a local Catholic church on April 22, 2019, the day after the terror attacks in Sri Lanka.
swa: Askofu alichagua kufanya tukio la kiutamaduni katika moja ya makanisa ya Kikatoliki tarehe 22 Aprili 2019, ikiwa ni siku moja tu baada  shambulio la Kigaidi huko Sri Lanka.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri uendelee kusema kwamba haujui. Bishop alichagua kufanya mpango wa kijamii uliopangiwa katika kanisa la Kikatoliki katika eneo la eneo la nchi hiyo mnamo Aprili 22, 2019, siku ambayo ilikuwa siku ya shambulio la kigaidi nchini Sri Lanka.

en: Swapon felt the Bishop should have postponed the festivities out of respect for hundreds of people killed in the attacks.

mt0: Swapon walihisi kwamba Bishop angepaswa kuhairishwa kwa karamu kwa heshima ya watu wengi waliouawa katika mashambulizi.

en: On the morning of 15 May, police arrested supreme court lawyer and writer Imtiaz Mahmud in a case filed in 2017 under the country's now-defunct Information and Communication Technology Act, in which a private citizen, Shafiqul Islam, alleged that one of Mahmood's Facebook posts had hurt religious sentiments and incited communal violence in Bangladesh's southeastern Chittagong region.
swa: Asubuhi ya tarehe 15 Mei, polisi walimkamata Mwanasheria wa mahakama kuu  na mwandishi  Imtiaz Mahmud chini ya kifungu cha  sheria ya 2017 ambayo haitumika kwa sasa, sheria ya Habari, Mawasiliano na Teknolojia ambapo, raia mmoja, Shafiqul Islam, alilalamika kuwa mija ya machapisho ya Mahmood huko Facebook yameumiza hisia zake za kiimani na yalichochea uhalifu katika ukanda wa Kusini Mashariki mwa mkoa Chittagong, Bangladesh .
mt0: Inaripotiwa kwamba polisi walimkamata hakimu wa sheria na mwandishi Imtiaz Mahmud katika kesi iliyowasilishwa mwaka 2017 chini ya sheria ya sasa ya habari na mawasiliano ya kijamii, ambayo raia mmoja, Shafiqul Islam, alieleza kwamba mmoja wa Mamoud's Facebook posts ulisababisha uharibifu wa imani na uanzishaji wa uasi katika eneo la Kaskazini Mashariki mwa Bangladesh.

en: Imtiaz Mahmood secured an anticipatory bail when the case was originally brought, but a Khagrachhari court issued another arrest warrant against him in January 2019.
swa: Imtiaz Mahmood alipata alipata dhamana kwa muda kesi ilipoletwa kwa mara ya kwanza lakini mahakama ya Khagrachhari ilitoa amri ya kukamatwa tena kinyume na ile ya Januari 2019.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri basi ulisema kwamba haujui. Imtiaz Mahmood alipata hifadhi ya awali wakati kesi ilianzishwa, lakini Hakimu wa Khagrachhari aliweka ombi la ukamataji zaidi dhidi yake mnamo Januari 2019.

en: Mahmood had commented on ethnic tensions that arose after a Bengali motorcyclist was killed in Khagrachhari, prompting a group of Bengalis to torch a number of houses and shops of the indigenous people in the Rangamati area of Chittagong.
swa: Mahmood  alichangia maoni yake wakati wa  machafuko ya kikabila yaliyotokea baada ya mwendesha pikipiki wa  Bengali kuuwawa huko Khagrachhari, yakisababisha kikundi cha wa-Bengali kutia moto nyumba kadhaa na maduka ya wakazi wa eneo la Rangamati ndani ya Chittagong.
mt0: Mahmood alizungumzia umoja wa rangi uliotokea baada ya moto kuharibu moto moto katika Khagrachhari, ambayo ilisababisha idadi kubwa ya watu wa Kibengali kubomoa nyumba na maduka ya watu wa Kibengali katika eneo la Rangamati katika Chittagong.

en: Local sources told the Dhaka Tribune that police had taken no measures to control the situation.

mt0: Local sources told the Dhaka Tribune that police had taken no measures to control the situation.
