en: Despite concerns about its implications for freedom of expression, the Bangladeshi parliament approved the Digital Security Act in September 2018.
swa: Pamoja na kuonesha kuwa sheria hiyo ingebana uhuru wa kujieleza, bunge la Bangladeshi  iliipitisha sheria ya Usalama wa Mitandaoni hapo Septemba 2018.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo, uthibitishe tu kwamba haujui. Licha ya wasiwasi kuhusu athari zake kwa uhuru wa habari, Bunge la Bangladeshi lilipitisha sheria ya usalama wa kidijitali mnamo Septemba 2018.

en: The law replaced the notorious Information and  Technology Act, which had also been used as a tool for silencing critical speech online.
swa: Sheria hii ilichukua nafasi ya sheria nyingine kandamizi ya Habari na Teknolijia, ambayo pia ilikuwa ilitumika kama chombo cha  kuwanyamazisha wakosoaji Mitandaoni.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo ulisema kwamba haujui. Sheria hiyo ilichukua nafasi ya sheria maarufu ya Teknolojia na Huduma za Jamii, ambayo ilitumia kama njia ya kukataa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji wa ukosoaji

en: The Act criminalizes various types of online speech, ranging from defamatory messages to speech that injures religious values or sentiments introducing hefty fines.
swa: Sheria hii inahukumu baadhi ya mazungumzo mitandaoni kuanzia jumbe za kubeza mpaka  mazungumzo yenye kuumiza hisia na maadili ya  kidini ikiorodhesha pia faini kubwa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo, ueleze tu kwamba haujui. Sheria hiyo inapiga marufuku aina mbalimbali za uandishi wa kijamii, kutoka kwa uandishi wa udhalilishaji hadi uandishi unaoathiri imani au hisia, na kuweka ushuru mkubwa.

en: It also authorizes lengthy prison sentences for using the internet to create public unrest, and for gathering, sending or preserving classified government documents using a digital device.
swa: Pia inaruhusu vifungo vya muda mrefu kwa makosa ya  kutumia mitandao kusababisha vurugu katika jamii na kwa kukusanya, kutuma na kuhifadhi habari na nyaraka nyeti za serikali kupitia huduma za kidigitali.
mt0: Inapendekeza hukumu ndefu kwa kutumia mtandao kusababisha usumbufu wa umma, na kwa kukusanya, kuwasilisha au kuhifadhi habari za serikali zilizohifadhiwa kwa njia ya kidijitali.

en: The Editors Council of Bangladesh said that the Act is against the freedom guaranteed by the constitution, media freedom and freedom of speech.
swa: Baraza la Wahariri la Bangladeshi lilisema kuwa sheria hii ni kinyume na uhuru uliotolewa kikatiba, uhuru wa vyombo vya habari na uhuru wa kujieleza.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo ulisema kwamba sheria hiyo inapinga uhuru uliowekwa na katiba, uhuru wa habari na uhuru wa uhuru wa habari.

en: In the aftermath of the Sudanese revolution, transitional authorities of Sudan have signed a peace agreement with The Sudan Revolutionary Front  the main rebel group still active after former leader Omar al-Bashir was deposed last year.
swa: Baada ya mapinduzi ya Sudani, mamlaka za mpito za Sudani zimesaini makubaliano ya amani na The Sudan Revolutionary Front  kikundi kikuu cha waasi ambacho kimeendelea na utendaji wake hata baada ya kuondolewa kwa kiongozi wake wa zamani Omar al-Bashir, mwaka jana.
mt0: In the aftermath of the Sudanese revolution, transitional authorities of Sudan have signed a peace agreement with the main rebel group still active after former leader Omar al-Bashir was deposed last year.

en: The historic peace agreement, signed on August 31, in the city of Juba, South Sudan, found regional and international support from Troika countries, the European Union, Egypt and several Gulf countries.
swa: Makubaliano haya ya amani ya Kihistoria yalisainiwa hapo Agosti 31, katika mji wa Juba, Sudani Kusini ambapo yanaungwa mkono na jumuiya za Kikanda na zile za Kimataifa kama vile nchi za Kitroika, Umoja wa Ulaya, Misri na baadhi ya nchi za Ghuba.

en: But this exciting moment is also overshadowed by a period of historic flooding that has devastated parts of Sudan, causing a downward spiral in an already stressed economy.
swa: Pia jambo hili la kusisimua limegubikwa na kipindi cha mafuriko ya Kihistoria ambayo yameathiri baadhi ya maeneo ya Sudani, yakisababisha kuendelea kuporomoka kwa uchumi ambao tayari ulikuwa umeshadorora.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa, angalia uwezekano wa kuwepo kwa uharibifu wa kihistoria ulioua sehemu kubwa za Sudan, ambayo imesababisha uharibifu wa uchumi uliokwisha.

en: Still, Sudanese citizens on social media also welcomed the news.
swa: Hata hivyo bado raia wa Sudani mitandaoni walisherehekea habari hizo mitandaoni.
mt0: Hata hivyo, watu wa Sudani kwenye mitandao ya kijamii pia walikaribisha habari hiyo.

en: I dedicate the peace that we signed today in the brotherly State of South Sudan, to our children who were born in displacement and asylum camps, to mothers and fathers who long for their villages and cities, waiting for the glorious December revolution, the promise of return, the promise of justice, the promise of development, and the promise of safety.
swa: Ninaituma amani ambayo tumeitilia saini leo katika Taifa letu la Sudani kwa watoto wetu ambao wamezaliwa ukimbizini na katika makambi, kwa baba na mama ambao wanatamani vijiji na miji yao wakiyasubiri kwa hamu mapinduzi tukufu ya Disemba, ahadi ya kurejea, ahadi ya haki na ahadi ya maendeleo na usalama.
mt0: I dedicate the peace that we signed today in the brotherly State of South Sudan, to our children who were born in displacement and asylum camps, to mothers and fathers who long for their villages and cities, waiting for the glorious December revolution, the promise of return, the promise of justice, the promise of development, and the promise of safety.

en: The agreement guaranteed autonomy for rebel groups in their controlled areas under the supervision of the federal government.
swa: Makubaliano haya yanavihakikishia uhuru wa kujitawala wenyewe vikundi vya waasi katika maeneo wanayoyashikilia chini ya uangalizi wa serikali kuu.
mt0: Huku ukubali ukihakikisha uhuru wa vyama vya umoja wa nchi katika eneo lao la utawala wa serikali ya shirikisho.

en: It will guarantee one-third of parliament chairs for people from rebel areas in order to reflect their needs and issues.
swa: Makubaliano yatahakikisha kuwa theluthi moja ya viti vya ubunge ni vya watu kutoka katika maeneo ya waasi ili kuwasilisha mahitaji na masuala yao.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: The agreement will guarantee justice and equality for those who were persecuted by the former regime, often for being non-Muslim and non-Arab.
swa: Makubaliano pia yanahakikisha haki na usawa kwa wote ambao walishtakiwa na uongozi uliopita wengi wao wakiwa ni watu ambao sio Waislam au watu wasio na asili ya Kiarabu.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria na uhuru kwa wale waliokuwa wakiteseka na serikali ya zamani, mara nyingi kwa sababu ya uislamu na uarabu.

en: This is not the first peace agreement in Sudan history.
swa: Haya sio Makubaliano ya kwanza ya amani katika historia ya Sudani.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know This is not the first peace agreement in Sudan history.

en: Despite this exciting moment, two main rebel groups did not sign the agreement: The SLMA), led by Abdul Wahid al-Nur, and Sudan Peoples Liberation Movement-North (SPLM-N), led by Abdelaziz al-Hilu, both refrained due to lingering questions about the mechanisms for integrating armies and the country identity.
swa: Pamoja na uwepo wa tukio hili la kusisimua, makundi mawili ya waasi hayajatia saini makubaliano haya.Kikundi cha SLMA kiliongozwa na Abdul Wahid al-Nur, na Chama cha harakati za Uhuru wa Wasudani kaskazini  (SPLM-N), kinachoongozwa na Abdelaziz al-Hilu, wote walijitoa kwa sababu ya kutokujibiwa kwa baadhi ya maswali kuhusu mfumo wa uendeshaji wa jeshi la muungano na utambulisho wa nchi.
mt0: Hata hivyo, katika kipindi hiki cha uhuru, kambi mbili kuu za uhuru zilikataa kusaini mkataba: SLMA), inayoongozwa na Abdul Wahid al-Nur, na Sudan Peoples Liberation Movement-North (SPLM-N), inayoongozwa na Abdelaziz al-Hilu, zote zilikataa kwa sababu ya utata uliobaki kuhusu njia za kuunganishwa kwa majeshi na utambulisho wa nchi.

en: Three days after the peace signing, Sudan PM Abdalla Hamdok traveled to Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, to meet with al-Hilu to discuss points of contention, according to Sudan Tribune.
swa: Siku tatu baada ya kusainiwa kwa makubaliano ya amani Waziri Mkuu wa Sudani alisafiri kwenda Addis Ababa, Ethiopia, kuonana na al-Hilu kujadili kuhusu ya mgongano huo kulingana na Usuluhishi wa Sudani
mt0: - 'Wakati wa siku tatu baada ya uafikiano, PM wa Sudan Abdalla Hamdok alisafiri Ethiopia kuonana na al-Hilu kujadili masuala ya utata, Sudan Tribune ilisema.

en: Prime Minister Abdallah Hamdok on Wednesday held a secret meeting with Abdel Aziz al-Hilu in an effort to break the deadlock in the peace talks mediated by the South Sudanese government.https://t.co/IrNxxW9a0M pic.twitter.com/VgtyDZxfv3
swa: Hapo Jumatano, Waziri Mkuu Abdallah Hamdok alifanya mkutano wa siri na Abdel Aziz al-Hilu zikiwa ni jitihada za kuondoa vikwazo katika mazungumzo ya amani yaliyofanywa na serikali ya Sudani Kusini.
mt0: Mkuu wa nchi hiyo Abdallah Hamdok alifanya mazungumzo ya siri na Abdel Aziz al-Hilu katika jitihada za kuvunja ukimya katika mazungumzo ya amani yaliyosimamiwa na serikali ya Sudan Kusini.

en: The meeting resulted in the signing of a joint agreement of memorandum reinforcing the principles of the peace talks in Juba.
swa: Mkutano huu ulisababisha kusainiwa kwa mkataba utakaosimamia kuheshimiwa kwa makubaliano ya amani yaliyofanyika huko Juba.
mt0: Mkutano huo ulipelekea usaini wa mkataba wa mkataba wa umoja wa nchi katika Sudani, ambayo iliendeleza principles of the peace talks in Juba.

en: Sudan social media buzzed with a circulated copy of the agreement in English, with a particular focus on Article 3 on the subject of religion and state:
swa: Mitandao ya kijamii ya Sudan ilizizima kwa kusambazwa kwa nakala ya makubaliano hayo yaliyoandikwa kwa lugjs ya Kiingereza, mkazo ukiwa katika kipengele cha 3 kinachozungumzia masuala ya dini na utaifa:
mt0: Sudani ilikuwa ikishangaa na nakala ya sheria iliyochapishwa kwa Kiingereza, hususan kuhusu Article 3 kuhusu dini na serikali:

en: A democratic state must be established in Sudan.
swa: Taifa la kidemokrasia lazima lisimikwe Sudani.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know A democratic state must be established in Sudan.

en: For Sudan to become a democratic country where the rights of all citizens are enshrined, the constitution should be based on the principle of separation of religion and state in the absence of which the right to self-determination must be respected.
swa: Kwa Sudani kuwa Taifa la kidemokrasia ambapo haki za watu wote zinaheshimiwa, katiba lazima iwe na misingi ya kutenga udini na utaifa  ambapo haki za mtu binafsi lazima ziheshimiwe.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri sheria hiyo kabisa, sheria hiyo inapaswa kutegemea sheria ya separation of religion and state ambayo bila hiyo haki ya kujitolea inapaswa kuheshimiwa.

en: Freedom of belief and worship and religious practice shall be guaranteed in full to all Sudanese citizens.
swa: Uhuru wa kuamini na kuabudu na shughuli za kidini utolewe kwa  wananchi wote wa Sudani.

en: The state shall not establish an official religion.No citizen shall be discriminated against based on their religion.
swa: Serikali isiweke dini ya Taifa, asiwepo mwananchi atakayebaguliwa kwa sababu ya dini yake.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Sudanese people split into two camps on the matter: The first sees the separation of religion and state as a guarantee of fundamental human rights; the second says the transitional government does not have the right to decide this without authorization from citizens via democratic elections.
swa: Wananchi wa Sudani wamegawanyika katika makundi mawili katika suala hili: kundi la kwanza linaona kuwa kutenga uraia na dini ni jambo la msingi katika misingi haki za Binadamu; kundi la pili linaona kuwa serikali ya mpito haina mamlaka ya kufanya maamuzi juu ya jambo hilo bila ruhusa ya wananchi kupitia uchaguzi wa kidemokrasia.
mt0: Je, unafahamu Sudani imegawanyika katika makundi mawili kuhusu hili: Mmoja anaona uhuru wa dini na serikali kama uhakikisho wa haki za binadamu; mmoja akasema kwamba serikali ya transition haiwezi kuamua hili bila idhini ya raia kupitia uchaguzi wa demokrasia.

en: Following the meeting, the prime ministers Twitter account published an Arabic version of the agreement that differed from the English one, addressed as a joint press release.
swa: Baada ya mkutano huo, ukurasa wa Twitter wa Waziri Mkuu ulichapisha nakala ya mkataba huo kwa lugha ya Kiarabu  ambapo maudhui yake yalitofautiana na yale yaliyopo katika nakala iliyoandikwa kwa lugha ya Kiingereza.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, kisha ulisema kwamba haujui. Baada ya mkutano, akaunti ya Twitter ya PM ilichapisha nakala ya lugha ya Kiarabu ya sheria hiyo ambayo iliachana na sheria ya Kiingereza, iliyochapishwa kama tangazo la umoja wa habari.

en: While the English document emphasized the separation of religion from the state as an inevitability, the Arabic document only recommended discussion of the controversial issue.
swa: Wakati katika nakala ya Kiingereza msisitizo umewekwa kwa kuonesha kuwa haiwezekani kutenganisha dini na utaifa, katika nakala ya lugha ya Kiarabu inapendekeza majadiliano katika suala hili lenye utata.
mt0: Kama ulikuwa unaona kwamba separation ya dini na serikali ilikuwa inawezekana, lakini nakala ya Kiingereza ilikuwa inapendekeza kujadili swali controversial.

en: The differences between the two documents raise questions about the future of this agreement.
swa: Tofauti katika nakala hizi mbili umeibua maswali mengi kuhusu hatma ya makubaliano haya.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Historic peace, historic floods
swa: Amani Ya Kihistoria, Mafuriko Ya Kihistoria
mt0: Historia ya amani, historia ya mafuriko.

en: While peace has brought happy news to Sudan, the Nile River continues to flood, ushering in an unprecedented humanitarian disaster.
swa: Wakati amani ikileta furaha nchini Sudani, mto Nile unaendelea kufurika ukileta majanga yasiyotarajiwa kwa binadamu.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali hapo chini, uthibitisho wa amani umeleta habari njema kwa Sudan, lakini Nile River inaendelea kuongezeka, ikiwa ni uthibitisho wa uharibifu wa kibinadamu uliotarajiwa.

en: According to a Sudanese National Council for Civil Defense report on September 8, total losses due to the Nile flood amounted to 103 deaths, 50 injuries, 5,482 deaths of livestock, 27,341 complete house collapses, 42,210 cases of partial house collapse, damage to 179 government and private facilities, loss of 359 shops and stores and damage to 4,208 agricultural acres.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa ya Septemba 8  ya, baraza la Ulinzi wa Taifa, kutokana na mafuriko hayo vimetokea vifo vya watu 103, majeruhi 50, vifo vya mifugo 5,482, nyumba 27,341zimebomoka kabisa na nyumba 42,210 zimebomoka nusu,  majengo ya serikali na taasisi binafsi 179 yameharibiwa, maduka na maghala 359 yameharibiwa na hekari 4,208 za mazao zimeharibiwa na mafuriko hayo.
mt0: According to a Sudanese National Council for Civil Defense report on September 8, total losses due to the Nile flood amounted to 103 deaths, 50 injuries, 5,482 deaths of livestock, 27,341 complete house collapses, 42,210 cases of partial house collapse, damage to 179 government and private facilities, loss of 359 shops and stores and damage to 4,208 agricultural acres.

en: The levels of the Blue Nile this night witnessed a great rise accompanied by heavy rain, which led to the breaking of the covers and shields, a simple dam built by sacks of the soil, of the city of Singa and Umm Benin areas, and the water began to flood the city and its homes, as well as the neighbourhoods of Umm Benin.

en: Therefore, we launch a directive to all official bodies and an appeal to all civil authorities and organizations to come to the rescue of the citizens as soon as possible, and to provide shelter, medicines and food.

en: This article is from Prachatai, an independent news site in Thailand, edited and republished by Global Voices as part of a content-sharing agreement.
swa: Makala hii ni kutoka kwa Prachatai, chanzo huru cha habari huko Thailand, ikiwa imehaririwa na kuchapishwa na Global Voices kama sehemu ya makubaliano ya kushirikishana mahudhui.

en: Student Union of Thailand (SUT) president Jutatip Sirikhan has been arrested while on the way to university on September 1 for her participation in the July 18 mass protest.
swa: Raisi wa Umoja wa wanafunzi wa Thailand Jutatip Sirikhan amekamatwa akiwa njiani akielekea chuoni hapo Septemba 1, kwa sababu ya kushiriki katika maandamano makubwa ya Julai 18.
mt0: Je, unafahamu shirika la wanafunzi la Thai (SUT) nchini Thailand Jutatip Sirikhan amekamatwa wakati akielekea chuo kikuu Septemba 1 kwa kushiriki katika maandamano ya July 18.

en: Jutatip was arrested while in a taxi on her way to class at Thammasat Universitys Tha Prachan campus in Bangkok.
swa: Jutatip alikamatwa akiwa ndani ya gari akielekea darasani katika chuo kikuu cha Thammasat kampasi ya Tha Prachan huko Bangkok.
mt0: Jutatip alikamatwa wakati akienda shuleni katika Chuo cha Thammasat katika Tha Prachan, Bangkok.

en: She went live on Facebook at 12:50 pm on September 1 when plainclothes police officers stopped the taxi she was in and delivered an arrest warrant.
swa: Aliingia mubashara katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook mnamo saa 07:50 mchana hapo Septemba 1, wakati askari waliovalia kiraia waliposimamisha taksi aliyokuwa amepanda na wakamwonesha hati ya kumkamata.
mt0: Huku akiwa kwenye Facebook akiwa na saa 12:50 pm Septemba 1 wakati polisi waliokuwa wamevaa nguo wakasimama kwenye taxi ambayo alikuwa akiingia na kutoa hatiani.

en: Jutatip was taken to Samranrat Police Station.
swa: Jutatip alipelekwa kwenye kituo cha polisi cha  lSamranrat.
mt0: Jutatip alichukuliwa katika kituo cha polisi cha Samranrat.

en: An officer accompanied her in another taxi to the station, since she did not feel safe enough to travel in the private car the officers brought to arrest her.
swa: Afisa wa polisi aliambatana naye kuelekea kituoni akiwa kwenye taksi nyingine kwa sababu hakujisikia kuwa salama kupanda gari binafsi walilokuja nalo askari waliokuja kumkamata.
mt0: Mkuu alimfuata katika taxi nyingine hadi kituo, kwani hakujisikia salama enough kusafiri katika gari la kibinafsi ambalo polisi walimleta ili kumkamata.

en: She stayed live on Facebook and read out passages from the Thai translation of Thomas Paines Common Sense during the travel to the station.
swa: Aliendelea kuwa mubashara katika ukurasa wake wa Facebook, akisoma kifungu cha habari  Ufahamu wa Kawaida kilichotafsiriwa kwa Kithailand na Thomas Paine.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, kisha ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: She was then taken to the Bangkok Criminal Court and was granted bail and released at 5:20 pm in the custody of a lecturer at Thammasat University.
swa: Alipelekwa katika mahakama ya kihalifu ya Bangkok na alipewa dhamana na kuachiliwa saa 11.20 jioni akiwa chini ya uangalizi wa Mhadhiri kutoka chuo kikuu cha Thammasat.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, kisha uende katika Mahakama ya Haki ya Kibinadamu ya Bangkok na upatikana na dhamana na uachwe saa 5:20 usiku katika utawala wa profesa wa Chuo Kikuu cha Thammasat.

en: The Court did not require her to immediately pay the 100,000 baht (3,190 US dollars) bail but imposed the condition that she does not repeat the actions for which she was being charged  the same condition given to everyone else who has been arrested and released on the same charges.
swa: Mahakama haikumtaka alipe papo hapo kiasi cha baht 100,000  (sawa na dola za Marekani 3,190) kwa ajili ya dhamana, lakini aliwekewa masharti kwamba hatakiwi kurudia tena makosa aliyoshtakiwa kwayo  masharti hayo hayo yalitolewa kwa kila mmoja aliyekamatwa na kuachiliwa kwa mashtaka hayo.
mt0: Jeshi halikuhitaji yeye kufanya hivi haraka ili kupata 100,000 baht (US$ 3,190) ushuru lakini iliweka sheria ya kwamba asiyefanya hivi atahukumiwa kwa matendo ambayo alikuwa akikabiliwa na mashtaka ya uhalifu.

en: Jutatip is the 14th activist to be arrested for participating in the July 18 mass protest.
swa: Jutatip ni mwanaharakati wa 14 kukamatwa kwa kushiriki maandamano makubwa ya Julai 18.
mt0: Jutatip ni mmojawapo wa wanaharakati 14 waliokamatwa kwa kushiriki katika maandamano ya Julai 18.

en: Fifteen other participants at the protest have also received a summons and reported to Samranrat Police Station to hear the charges against them on August 28.

en: Jutatip was charged with sedition and violation of the Emergency Decree and the Communicable Diseases Act, among other charges.

mt0: Kama haujui ukweli uwezi kusema kwamba picha inaweza kuharibiwa, lakini hatuwezi kuharibiwa na uovu.

en: Jutatip then threw a bucket of white paint over herself while holding up her hand in the three-finger Hunger Games salute.

en: We can throw paint over those with power, because those with power throw legal charges over us, throw bullets at us without exception.
swa: Tunaweza kuwamwagia rangi hao walio na mamlaka kwa sababu wanatutia hatiani na kuturushia risasi saa yoyote bila kujali, kwa kuwa wana mamlaka.

en: Afterward, Jutatip thanked the lecturer who came to make bail for her and the people who came to support her and helped the crowd clean the paint off the sidewalk in front of the footpath in front of the Court.
swa: Baada ya hapo, Jutatip alimshukuru Mhadhiri ambaye alimuwekea dhamana na watu waliokuja kumuunga mkono na kusaidia umati kusafisha rangi iliyokuwa imetapakaa katika njia ya waenda kwa miguu mbele ya mahakama.
mt0: Jutatip alikuwa akishukuru profesa aliyekuja kuweka dhamana kwake na watu waliokuja kumsaidia na aliwasaidia watu kuondoa rangi ya uchoraji kutoka kwenye uchoraji uliokuwa mbele ya uchoraji mbele ya uchoraji mbele ya uchoraji.

en: While India is going through a major general election spread over seven phases from 11 April to 19 May 2019 in order to elect its 17th parliament (Lok Sabha), some Indian voters have taken the unusual step of boycotting the electoral process.
swa: Wakati India ikipitia kipindi cha uchaguzi mkuu uliogawanyika katika awamu saba zinazoanzia 11 April mpaka 19 Mei 2019 ili kuchagua bunge lake la saba (Lok Sabha), baadhi ya wapiga kura wa India wamechukua hatia isiyo ya kawaida kwa kugomea shughuli za uchaguzi.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri lakini ulisema kwamba haujui. Wakati India inapitia uchaguzi mkuu uliogawanyika katika ngazi saba kati ya Aprili 11 na Mei 19 2019 ili kuchagua bunge lake la 17 (Lok Sabha), baadhi ya raia wa India wamechukua hatua ya ajabu ya kukataa uchaguzi.

en: Read More: All you need to know about India's 2019 general elections
swa: Soma Zaidi: Yote unayotaka kufahamu kuhusu uchaguzi mkuu wa India 2019
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: In Goa, a southwestern state of India, residents of a tribal hamlet in Canacona block (district subdivision), Marlem Village refused to vote on 23 April during the third phase of the general election, alleging that the government had been oblivious to the problems of their village.
swa: Huko Goa, jimbo la Kusini mwa India, wakazi wa kijiji kidogo kilichopo kitongoji  cha Cancona (sehemu ya wilaya), kijiji cha Marlem walikataa kupiga kura tarehe 23 Aprili katika awamu ya tatu ya uchaguzi mkuu wakiwa na madai kwamba serikali imekuwa ndio tatizo kuwa katika kijiji chao.
mt0: In Goa, katika nchi ya kaskazini mwa India, wenyeji wa eneo la umoja wa nchi la Marlem Village (eneo la umoja wa nchi), Marlem Village, walikataa kushiriki katika mbio za uchaguzi wa urais mnamo Aprili 23, wakisema kwamba serikali ilikuwa imepuuza shida zao.

en: Their main grievance is that basic facilities, such as proper roads and water supply, have not been provided by the government.
swa: Malalamiko yao makubwa ni kwamba mahitaji na huduma muhimu kama vile barabara nzuri na huduma ya maji safi na salama hazijawahi kutolewa na serikali.
mt0: Habari kubwa kwao ni kwamba huduma muhimu, kama vile njia nzuri za barabara na maji, hazijavumwa na serikali.

en: A video by Community Correspondent Devidas Gaonkar, a member of the aboriginal shepherd tribe of Goa called Velip, documented the protests of the villagers:
swa: Video ya Mtangazaji wa masuala ya kijamii  Devidas Gaonkar, mzaliwa wa kabila la wafugaji la waGoa inayoitwa Velip, ikionesha maandano ya wanakijiji hao:
mt0: Video by Community Correspondent Devidas Gaonkar, a member of the aboriginal shepherd tribe of Goa called Velip, documented the protests of the villagers:

en: In this video, Pandurang Gaonkar, a resident from Marli village, states that:
swa: Katika video hii, Pandurang Gaonkar, mkazi wa kijiji cha Marli alisema kwamba:
mt0: In video hii, Pandurang Gaonkar, mmoja wa wenyeji wa Marli, anasema kwamba:

en: Tirwal to Marlem is a three-quilometres road stretch, which is incomplete.
swa: Kuanzia Tirwal mpaka Marlem ni kilomita tatu tu za barabara lakini hazijakamilika.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Tirwal to Marlem ni njia ya kilomita tatu, ambayo ni katika uharibifu.

en: To date, no action has been taken by the authorities.
swa: Mpaka leo hakuna hatua zozote zilizochukuliwa na mamlaka husika.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: They only make false promises, but no implementation.
swa: Wanatupa ahadi za uongo tu hakuna utekelezaji.
mt0: Return only translation. If you cannot translate the sentence simply say you don't know. They only make false promises, but no implementation.

en: For this reason, we havent cast our votes.
swa: Na kwa sababu hiyo basi, hatujapiga kura.
mt0: Kwa sababu hiyo, hatujapiga kura zetu.

en: The residents of Marlem have been living in this village for more than 20 years.
swa: Wakazi wa kijiji cha Marlem wamekuwa wakiishi katika kijiji hicho kwa zaidi ya miaka 20 sasa.

en: In 1968, the Forest Department declared Marlem village part of a wildlife sanctuary.
swa: Mwaka 1968, idara ya misitu ilitangaza kuwa kijiji cha Marlem kama  sehemu salama kwa wanyama wa mwituni.
mt0: In 1968, Wizara ya Mazingira ilitangaza Marlem kuwa sehemu ya sanctuary ya wanyamapori.

en: This makes the construction of roads, or any development work in this area, a rather complex issue.
swa: Hili linafanya ujenzi wa barabara au kazi yoyote ya maendeleo katika eneo hili kuwa na ugumu wa kutekeleza.
mt0: Hii inafanya ujengaji wa barabara, au kazi yoyote ya uendelezaji katika eneo hili kuwa tatizo la kiasi.

en: According to reports, an underground power cabling project for carrying electricity to the area had been initially approved, but when digging work commenced, it was soon halted following objections coming from the state Forest Department.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa,  ni kwamba mpango wa kupitisha mkongo wa umeme aridhini ili uweze kufika eneo hilo ulishapitishwa lakini ulizuiwa hivi karibuni kutokana na mapingamizi kutoka kwa Idara ya Misitu ya Taifa
mt0: Habari zinasema kwamba mradi wa uunganisho wa nguzo za umeme chini ya ardhi ili kusafirisha umeme kwa eneo hilo awali ulikubaliwa, lakini baada ya kuanza kazi, utekelezaji wake ukasimamishwa mara moja baada ya ukosoaji kutoka idara ya serikali ya uhifadhi.

en: Another source of frustration for the local population is the absence of proper roads.
swa: Chanzo kingine cha mahangaiko ya wakazi wa hapa ni ukosefu wa barabara nzuri.

en: One has to navigate a 2.8 km unpaved and broken road to reach the first household at Marlem from the main road.
swa: Mtu anatakiwa kusafiri  kutoka barabara kuu umbali wa kilomita 2.8 katika barabara mbaya na ambayo haijasafishwa vizuri ili aweze kukuta nyumba ya kwanza katika kijiji cha Marlem.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hapo chini, ueleze tu kwamba unapaswa kusafiri kwa njia ya 2.8 km iliyoharibiwa na yenye uharibifu ili kufika kwenye nyumba ya kwanza katika Marlem kutoka kwenye njia kuu.

en: Finally, the supply of electricity and safe drinking water remain a challenge for the villagers.
swa: Mwisho kabisa, usambazaji wa umeme na maji safi na salama kwa wanakijiji vimebaki kuwa changamoto kwa wanakijiji.
mt0: Finally, upatikanaji wa usalama wa usafiri na maji ya kunywa bado ni shida kwa wenyeji.

en: Having publicly and repeatedly voiced their complaints, but failing to get any answers, the residents of Marlem, as well as residents from two other villages decided not to vote in the elections in order to draw the attention of the authorities towards their issues.
swa: Pamoja na kuweka malalamiko yao hadharani mara kwa mara, lakini wameshindwa kupata majibu ya mahitaji yao, wakazi wa Marlem pamoja na wakazi kutoka katika vijiji vingine viwili waliamua kutokupiga kura ili kuvuta masikio ya mamlaka dhidi ya masuala yao wanayoyalalamikia.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kutafsiri swali, kisha ukashindwa kupata majibu, watu wa Marlem, pamoja na watu wa maeneo mengine mawili, waliamua kukataa kushiriki katika uchaguzi ili kuonyesha usumbufu wao.

en: Polling officials came to talk to us, but our decision of not to vote, still stands, added Pandurang.
swa: Wafanyakazi wa tume ya uchaguzi walikuja kuongea nasi kuhusu uamuzi wetu wa kutokupiga kura na msimamo wetu uko pale pale, aliongeza Pandurang.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Isidore Fernandes, an opposition (Indian National Congress) member of the legislative assembly of Cancona, also met the locals.
swa: Isidore Fernandes, kiongozi wa upinzani kutoka chama cha (Indian National Congress) ambaye ni mbunge katika bunge la Cancona, pia alikutana na wakazi wa eneo hilo.
mt0: Isidore Fernandes, mwanasiasa wa upinzani (Indian National Congress) katika bunge la Cancona, pia alikutana na watu wa ndani.

en: After hearing the grievances he assured his support in favour of their agitation.
swa: Baada ya kusikiliza kero zao alieahakikishia kuwa atawasaidia kushughulikia jamjo hilo.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kutafsiri angalia chini.

en: It is important for any government to provide road, water, and electricity to people.
swa: Ni muhimu kwa serikali yoyote kutengeneza barabara, kusambaza umeme na maji kwa ajili ya watu wao.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Till now, all government officials have neglected these facilities in Marlem Village, stated Fernandes.
swa: Mpaka sasa maafida wote wa serikali wamepuuza kutoa huduma hizi katika kijiji cha Marlem, alisema   Fernandes.
mt0: Kwa sasa, serikali zote zimepoteza uhuru wa hizi huduma katika Marlem Village, alisema Fernandes.

en: Boycotting elections is now becoming a way of protest, although voting is not mandatory in India.
swa: Kususia uchaguzi sasa imekuwa kama njia mojawapo ya mgomo, ingawa kupiga kura sio lazima katika nchi ya India.

en: Apart from Goa, villages in the central state of Madhya Pradesh, the western state of  Maharashtra, and the eastern state of Odisha are employing this method in order to get pressing issues addressed by the authorities in charge.
swa: Tofauti ya kijiji cha Goa, vijiji vilivyo katika jimbo la Kati Madhya Pradesh, Magharibi jimbo la Maharashtra, na Mashariki jimbo la Odisha wamekuwa wakitumia mbinu hii ili kuweza kufikisha mambo yao muhimu mbele ya viongozi wa mamlaka zinazohusika.
mt0: Kama haujui, isipokuwa kwa Goa, maeneo katika mikoa ya kati ya Madhya Pradesh, Maharashtra, na Odisha katika eneo la mashariki wanatumia njia hii ili kupata shida kubwa zinazoshughulikiwa na mamlaka wenye mamlaka.

en: So far, none of those boycotts seem to have translated into action on the side of government.
swa: Hata hivyo, hakuna mgomo wowowte kati ya hii ambao umechukuliwa hatua na serikali.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Ultimately, voters are adopting such tactics as a show of frustration towards officials and politicians who often reach out to neglected communities only before elections, in hope of securing their votes, but fail to deliver once the elections are over.
swa: Wapiga kura wengi wameanza kuzoea kutumia mbinu hii kama ishara ya kuonesha hasira zao kwa wanasiasa na maofisa wa serikali ambao huzigeukia jamii walizozitelekeza katika kipindi cha uchaguzi wakiwa ma matumaini ya kupata kura zao, huku wakishindwa kutekeleza ahadi zao baada ya uchaguzi.
mt0: Kwa kweli, wananchi wanachukulia njia hizi kama onyesho la usumbufu kwa serikali na siasa ambazo mara nyingi huwafikia watu walio katika eneo la unyanyasaji kabla ya uchaguzi, wakitarajia kupata kura zao, lakini huwakosa baada ya uchaguzi.

en: In the end, if boycotting elections does not heed changes in society, what else can members of neglected communities do to get the attention of those supposed to hear them and take proper action?
swa: Lakini mwishowe, kama Kugomea chaguzi haitaleta mabadiliko katika jamii, je ni kitu gani wanajamii wataamua kufanya ili kuvuta masikio ya wenye mamlaka ambao wanapaswa kusikia sauti zao na kuchukua hatua za utekelezaji?
mt0: In the end, kama kukataa uamuzi hauchukulii badiliko katika society, mambo gani mengine wanaweza kufanya wananchi wa nchi zilizoharibiwa kupata ufahamu wa serikali na kuchukua hatua nzuri?

en: Journalists Amade Abubacar and Germano Adriano, who were detained earlier this year while covering the military conflict in northern Mozambique, were released pending trial on 23 April, 2019.
swa: Waandishi wa Habari Amade Abubacar na  Germano Adriano, ambao waliokamatwa mapema mwaka huu wakati wakikusanya habari za mgogoro wa kijeshi  katika ukanda wa Kaskazini mwa Msumbiji, wameachiliwa huru bila kushtakiwa mnamo tarehe 23 April,  2019.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Amade, who contributes to various local media outlets including Zitamar News and A Carta, was detained on 5 January while he interviewed internally displaced people in the Macomia district of Cabo Delgado, a northern province of the country.
swa: Amade, ambaye amekuwa akichangia habari katika vyanzo mbali mbali vya habari vikiwamo Zitamar News na A Carta, aliwekwa kizuizini tarehe 5 Januari wakati akifanya mahojiano na wakimbizi wa ndani kutoka katika wilaya ya Macomia katika jimbo la Kaskazini mwa nchi, Cabo Delgado.
mt0: Amade, anayechangia katika habari mbalimbali za ndani kama vile Zitamar News na A Carta, alikamatwa mnamo Januari 5 wakati akihoji watu waliojitenga katika eneo la Macomia katika Cabo Delgado, eneo la Kaskazini mwa nchi.

en: Germano, a reporter for the local community radio Nacedje, disappeared on 6 February and was found to have been detained on 18 February.
swa: Germano, ambaye ni mwandishi wa habari wa kituo cha redio ya jamii cha Nacedje, alipotea tangu Februari 6 na alipatikana akiwa kizuizini tarehe 18, Februari.
mt0: Je, unafahamu Germano, mtangazaji wa radio ya eneo la Nacedje, alipotea mnamo Februari 6 na akapatikana akiwa amekamatwa mnamo Februari 18.

en: According to the Media Institute of Southern Africa (MISA), Amade and Germano were charged with spreading defamatory messages against members of the Mozambican Armed Defence Forces via a Facebook account that announced attacks which occurred in villages in the district of Macomia.
swa: Kulingana na taarifa kutoka kwa Shirikisho la Vyombo Vya Habari Kusini Mwa Afrika(MISA), Amade na Germano walishtakiwa kwa kueneza habari za kuwachafua baadhi ya viongozi wa Jeshi la Wananchi wa Msumbiji kupitia kurasa zao za Facebook ambapo walitangaza kuanza kwa mapigano yaliyotokea katika vijiji vya wilaya ya Macomia.
mt0: Kama inavyoripotiwa na shirika la habari la Southern Africa (MISA), Amade na Germano walipatikana na mashtaka ya kueneza habari za uongo kuhusu wanajeshi wa Mozambican kwa kutumia akaunti ya Facebook iliyotangaza shambulio ambalo lilitokea katika maeneo ya Macomia.

en: The journalists were released from the provincial jail of Mieze in Pemba, Cabo Delgados capital, and will be on probation as they await trial before the provincial judicial court of Cabo Delgado.
swa: Wanahabari hao waliachiliwa huru kutoka katika gereza la  Mieze huko Pemba, makao makuu ya Cabo Delgado na wapo katika kipindi cha uangalizi wakati wakisubiri kushtakiwa katika mahakama ya hakimu mkazi huko Cabo Delgado.
mt0: Habari zote hizi ziko katika eneo la Mieze, katika eneo la Pemba, mji mkuu wa Cabo Delgado, na zitachukuliwa katika uhuru katika kesi yao kabla ya kuanza kesi yao katika mahakama ya serikali ya Cabo Delgado.

en: Their first hearing is scheduled for 17 May.
swa: Kesi imepangwa kusikilizwa kwa mara ya kwanza hapo Mei 17.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Since 2017, groups armed with knives have carried out attacks on villages in Cabo Delgado, burning houses and decapitating residents.
swa: Tangu mwaka 2017, makundi ya watu wenye silaha kama vile visu wamekuwa wakifanya mashambulizi katika vijiji vya Cabo Delgado, wakichoma nyumba  na kuwachinja wakazi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Since 2017, vikundi vilivyo na vipande vya chuma vimefanya shambulio kwenye pueblos katika Cabo Delgado, kukataa nyumba na kukataa watu.

en: More than 90 people have died since the attacks began, according to the police.
swa: Zaidi ya watu 90 wameshauwa tangu kuanza kwa mashambulio hayo kulingana na taarifa za polisi.
mt0: Je, unaweza kusema kwamba zaidi ya 90 wamekufa tangu shambulio lilipoanza, kulingana na polisi.

en: To date, no group has publicly claimed responsibility for the attacks.
swa: Mpaka leo hakuna kikundi ambacho kimejitokeza hadharani kukiri kuhusika na mashambulio hayo.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri ulisema kwamba haujui. Kwa sasa, hakuna shirika lililojitangaza rasmi kwamba limehusika na mashambulizi hayo.

en: In December 2018, the newspaper A Carta de Moambique revealed the existence of a Facebook page, run under a name that appears to have been falsified, that praised the armed groups attacks in Cabo Delgado.
swa: Hapo Disemba 2018 gazeti la  A Carta de Moambique lilidhihirisha uwepo wa ukurasa wa Facebook, yenye jina ambalo inaonekana ni la kughushi ambapo ukurasa huo unasifu mashambulio ya vikundi vya watu wenye silaha huko Cabo Delgado
mt0: In December 2018, gazeti la A Carta de Moambique lilionyesha uwepo wa ukurasa wa Facebook, ulioendeshwa kwa jina ambalo linaonekana kuwa la uongo, uliopongeza vitendo vya uhalifu vya umoja wa nchi katika Cabo Delgado.

en: It unknown whether or not the accusations against Amade and Germano are concerning this same page.
swa: Haifahamiki kama mashtaka dhidi ya Amade na Germano yanahusishwa na ukurasa huo.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: The journalists defence team says there is no connection between them and any illegal activity via Facebook.

en: He was put in a military prison, where he spent 12 days incommunicado before being transferred to a civilian prison.
swa: Aliwekwa katika gereza la Kijeshi ambapo alikaa siku 12 bila kufanya mawasiliano yoyote na kisha kuhamishiwa katika gereza la kiraia.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, kisha ulisema kwamba haujui. Alifungwa katika jela ya kijeshi, ambayo aliishi hapo kwa siku 12 bila kusema jambo lolote kabla ya kuhamishiwa jela ya kibinadamu.

en: The journalists were only charged on 16 April, violating the deadline of 90 days set out in the Mozambican Law of Pre-trial Detention in the case of Abubacar.
swa: Wanahabari hawa walishtakiwa tu ilipofika tarehe 16 Aprili, ikiwa ni ukiukwaji wa utaratibu wa mwisho wa siku 90, kinyume na sheria ya ukamataji na kuwekwa kizuizini ya Msumbiji, katika kesi ya Abubacar.
mt0: Je, unaposhindwa kutafsiri, ulisema kwamba haujui. Wandishi walichukuliwa tu mnamo Aprili 16, wakivunja deadline ya siku 90 iliyowekwa katika Sheria ya Msumbiji ya Kukamata Wakati wa Mahakama katika kesi ya Abubacar.

en: In court proceedings during their pre-trial detention, both journalists were accused of crimes of violating state secrets through digital means and public incitement to a crime using digital means.
swa: Katika muendelezo wa kesi katika kipindi chao cha kuwa kizuizini wandishi wote kwa pamoja walituhumiwa kwa makosa ya uhalifu wa kuvujisha siri za serikali kupitia mitandao ya kijamii na kuchochea jamii kwa kutumia njia za kidigitali.
mt0: In court proceedings during their pre-trial detention, both journalists were accused of crimes of violating state secrets through digital means and public incitement to a crime using digital means.

en: These accusations differ from the formal charges that have now been filed against them, which MISA described as spreading defamatory messages against members of the Mozambican Armed Defence Forces via a Facebook account that announced attacks which occurred in villages in the district of Macomia.
swa: Mashtaka haya yanapishana na mashtaka ya awali yaliyotolewa dhidi yao, ambapo MISA waliyatafsiri kama  kueneza ujumbe wa kuchafua baadhi ya viongozi wa jeshi la wananchi wa Msumbiji kupitia ukurasa wa Facebook ambao ulingaza mashambulio ya watu katika vijiji vya wilaya ya Macomia.

en: During the 106 days he spent in prison, Abubacar faced a lack of food and refusal of medical assistance, according to Amnesty International.
swa: Katika kipindi cha siku 106 alizokaa gerezani, Abubacar alikumbana na ukosefu wa chakula na kunyimwa huduma za matibabu, kulingana na taarifa ya Shirika la Haki za Binadamu (Amnesty International).
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri hivi hivi, jibu tu kwamba haujui. Wakati wa siku 106 ambazo aliishi gerezani, Abubacar alikabiliwa na ukosefu wa chakula na uamuzi wa kutoa huduma ya afya, kulingana na Amnesty International.

en: Global Voices co-founder Ethan Zuckerman defines bridge figures as people who are passionate about explaining their home cultures to people from other societies.
swa: Muanzishaji mwenza wa Global Voices  Ethan Zuckerman amewaelezea kuwa mfano wa daraja watu ambao wanapenda kuelezea utamaduni wa nyumbani kwao kwa watu wanaotoka katika jamii nyingine.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uambie tu kwamba haujui. Mkurugenzi wa Global Voices Ethan Zuckerman anafafanua watu wanaopenda kueleza tamaduni zao kwa watu kutoka nchi nyingine.

en: The concept was developed through the deep roots it has in Global Voices, and defines much of the work and ethos of the community.
swa: Wazo hiki lilitengenezwa kupitia mfumo ulioota mizizi ndani ya Global voices na unaelezea kazi kubwa na utamaduni wa jamii.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, uelezee tu kwamba wazo hilo liliundwa kutokana na urefu wake ulio ndani ya Global Voices, na linafafanua kazi nyingi na utamaduni wa umoja.

en: Since our Iran coverage aims to bridge the divide that exists between external perspectives on Iran and the actual country itself, Global Voices Iran has started a series of interviews with various Iranian journalists and writers who practice this role.
swa: Kwa kuwa kazi yetu imelenga kuunga utengano uliopo kati ya mitazamo ya nje juu ya Irani na ile halisi ndani ya nchi yenyewe,  Global Voices Iran imeanza mfululizo wa mahojiani na mwanadishi wa Kiirani na waandishi ambao watafanya hivyo.
mt0: Kama habari zetu za Iran hutoa lengo la kutatua umbali uliopo kati ya uoni wa nje wa Iran na ukweli wa nchi hiyo, Global Voices Iran imeanza kufanya mahojiano na waandishi wa habari na waandishi wa habari wa Iran ambao hufanya kazi katika eneo hilo.

en: These interviews are done to understand how and why these figures, who make a career out of communicating the intricacies and complexities of a country riddled with contradictions, explain Iran to non-Iranians.
swa: Mahojiano haya yatafanyika ili kuelewa kwa jinsi gani na kwa namna gani watu hawa waliofanya kazi zao kupitia kuielezea jamii iliyo nje ya Irani kuhusu Irani pamoja na ugumu na utata uliopo katika kuelezea.
mt0: Interviews hizi zinafanyika ili kuelewa jinsi na kwa nini hizi watu, ambao wanafanya kazi ya kueleza usanii na ugumu wa nchi iliyo na utata, wanaeleza Iran kwa watu wasio Irani.

en: Golnaz Esfandiari: I think the use of social media in Iran and its significance is increasing
swa: Golnaz Esfandiari: Nafikiri matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii nchini Irani na manufaa yake yanaongezeka
mt0: Golnaz Esfandiari: Nafikiri matumizi ya mtandao wa kijamii katika Iran na umuhimu wake unaongezeka.

en: Golnaz Esfandiari is a senior correspondent at Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, and one of the few journalists based outside of Iran writing in English about the nuances and intricacies of Iranian society and politics.
swa: Golnaz Esfandiari ni mtangazaji mwandamizi katika  Redio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, na mmoja wa waandishi wa habari wachache ambao wamejikita nje ya Irani wakiandika kwa lugha ya Kiingereza kuhusu usumbufu na changamoto za jamii na siasa za Wairani.
mt0: Golnaz Esfandiari ni mkurugenzi mkuu wa Radio Free Europe/Radio Liberty, na mmojawapo wa waandishi wachache wanaoishi nje ya Iran ambao wanaandika Kiingereza kuhusu nuances na intricacies za jamii na siasa ya Iran.

en: I think the use of social media in Iran and its significance is increasing.
swa: Nafikiri matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii nchini Irani yameongezeka na manufaa yake pia yameongezeka.
mt0: Ikiwa unaweza kutafsiri swali kabisa, kisha ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Government officials admit that and I also see more people inside the country using social media sites and apps.
swa: Maafisa wa serikali wanakiri hilo nami pia ninaona watu wengi ndani ya nchi wakitumia mitandao ya jamii.
mt0: Huku serikali ikikubali hilo, na pia naona watu wengi ndani ya nchi wakitumia mitandao ya kijamii na app.

en: I actually think that since 2009, the use of social media has increased considerably.
swa: Ninafikiri kuwa tangu mwaka 2009, matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii imeongezeka kwa kiwango kikubwa.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri kisha ulisema kwamba tangu 2009, matumizi ya media ya kijamii yameongezeka sana.

en: Some Iranians told me they joined Twitter after reading about the allegations about a Twitter Revolution in Iran.
swa: Baadhi ya Wairani wameniambia kuwa wamejiunga na mtandao wa Twitter baada ya kusoma kuhusu yale madai ya Mapinduzi ya Twitter nchini Irani.
mt0: Mwenyezi Mungu alikuwa anataka kuniambia kwamba baadhi ya Wairani walijiunga na Twitter baada ya kusoma kuhusu uvumi kuhusu uhuru wa Twitter nchini Iran.

en: Social networking sites have facilitated conversation and the sharing of content that is banned or considered sensitive, people can discuss taboo subjects relatively openly.
swa: Mitandao ya kijamii inasaidia mazungumzo na kushirikishana maudhui ambayo yamekatazwa au yanayoonekana kama ya aibu na watu wanajadiliana kwa uwazi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali ulisema kwamba haujui. Jamii za kijamii zimewezesha mazungumzo na kushiriki habari ambazo zimekatazwa au zinazochukuliwa kuwa sensitive, watu wanaweza kujadili masuala ya kijamii kwa urahisi.

en: They also challenge state policies and stances on social media quite regularly.
swa: Pia mara nyingi watu wanakosoa sera na mitazamo ya serikali katika mitandao ya jamii.
mt0: Hata hivyo, huwa wanapinga sheria na uamuzi wa serikali kwenye mitandao ya kijamii mara nyingi.

en: Kelly Golnoush Niknejad: You have to be a journalist, but a psychiatrist, professor, and mind reader as well
swa: Kelly Golnoush Niknejad: Unapaswa kuwa mwandishi wa habari,  mwanasaikolojia, profesa na msoma mawazo ya watu kwa wakati mmoja
mt0: Je, unapaswa kuwa mwandishi, lakini pia psychiatrist, profesa, na msomi wa akili.

en: Iranian media entrepreneur Kelly Golnoush Niknejad is the founder of Tehran Bureau, a news agency hosted by The Guardian that covers Iran and the Iranian diaspora.
swa: Mwekezaji katika tasnia ya habari nchini Irani Kelly Golnoush Niknejad, ni mwanzilishi wa Taasisi ya Tehran chanzo cha habari kinachosaidizana na The Guardian ambapo huandika kuhusu Irani na Wairani walio ughaibuni.
mt0: Je, unajua kweli? Mwekezaji wa media wa Iran Kelly Golnoush Niknejad ni mkurugenzi wa Tehran Bureau, shirika la habari linaloendeshwa na The Guardian linalohusu Iran na diaspora ya Iran.

en: When it comes to Iran, I often find myself having to go all the way back to 1979, then explaining the transformations that took place decade-by-decade, just to make sense of the present.
swa: Linapokuja suala la Irani, huwa ninajikuta mara zote nikirudi nyuma mpaka mwaka 1979 kisha naelezea mabadiliko yaliyofanyika muongo baada ya muongo ili kuleta maana ya wakati huu wa sasa.
mt0: Kama unazungumzia Iran, mara nyingi huwa nahitaji kurejea nyuma kabisa katika 1979, na kueleza mabadiliko yaliyotokea kila decade, ili kuelewa sasa.

en: Its sometimes even hard for Iranians themselves to believe what goes on in Iran, let alone non-Iranians.
swa: Mara nyingine inakuwa vigumu sana hata kwa wa-Irani wenyewe kuelewa kinachoendelea Irani kwa sasa sembuse wasio wa-Irani.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: This explains why its vital to cover Iran from the bottom up, chronicling the lives of ordinary people.

mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba ni muhimu kuangalia Iran kutoka chini kabisa, kufuatilia maisha ya watu wa kawaida.

en: Covering a country by reporting on the pronouncements of the ruling elite is probably the least interesting or informative kind of journalism.

mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Thats why even very sophisticated people who follow the news on Iran have no idea what goes on there.

mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sentensi hiyo ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Nina Ansary is the author of Jewels of Allah: The Untold Story of Women in Iran, the first book to cover the leading feminist political movements from the end of the 19th century to the present.

en: The book explains how women have shaped Irans recent history, and continue to do so, while working to establish their rights and equality in a society that has traditionally marginalized them.

en: There were, and still are, people in Iran who believe that by empowering civil society organizations, political parties and independent media, the Islamic Republic might change gradually from within.

en: On May 15, thousands of Brazilians took to the streets in all 26 states and the Federal District against the Bolsonaro government's slashing of federal funds to education that will affect dozens of universities and schools.
swa: Hapo Mei 15, maelfu ya Wabrazili waliingia mitaani katika majimbo yote 26 wakiandamana kuipinga serikali ya Bolsonaro kukata fedha za elimu ambapo itaathiri mamia ya shule na vyuo.
mt0: Inaonekana kwamba idadi kubwa ya watu wa Brazil waliandamana katika mikoa 26 na katika eneo la Federali katika Mei 15 katika upingaji wa serikali ya Bolsonaro kwa slashing ya fedha za serikali kwa elimu ambayo itaathiri dozeni ya universities na shule.

en: At the end of April, Brazil's government announced cuts of 30 percent on a so-called discretionary budget, which goes towards expenses such as electricity, water, general maintenance, and research.
swa: Mwishoni mwa mwezi Aprili, serikali ya Brazili ilitangaza kukata kiasi cha asilimia 30 ya kile kinachosemekana ni bajeti ambayo ilikuwa kwa ajili ya gharama za maji, umeme, uendeshaji wa jumla pamoja na tafiti.
mt0: Kwa mwisho wa Aprili, serikali ya Brazil ilitangaza upunguaji wa 30% kwenye bajeti ya huru, ambayo inaenda kwa gharama kama vile usafiri, maji, usimamizi wa kawaida, na utafiti.

en: When considering the total federal budget for higher education, the cuts would amount to around 3,5 percent.
swa: Wakati ukifiria kuwa jumla ya bajeti kuu ya serikali kwa ajili ya elimu ya juu, makato hayo yanaweza kufikia mpaka asilimia tatu au 5.
mt0: Kama unashindwa kutafsiri, ueleze tu kwamba haujui. Kama unashindwa kutafsiri, ueleze kwamba haujui.

en: Besides, the government has suspended funds for 3,500 publicly-funded postgraduate scholarships.
swa: Hata hivyo, serikali imefuta udhamini kwa wanafunzi wa elimu za juu wapatao 3,500 waliokuwa wakidhaminiwa na serikali..
mt0: Kwa zaidi, serikali imesimamisha fadhila kwa 3,500 zawadi za ufadhili wa ualimu za umma.

en: From Paulista Avenue in So Paulo, a traditional gathering spot for protests, to far away indigenous lands in Alto Rio Negro, near the border with Colombia, people went out to defend their public education.
swa: Kuanzia mtaa wa Paulista huko So Paulo, kituo cha makutano ya maandamano cha kimila mpaka kwenye mashamba ya asili huko Alto Rio Negro, karibu ma mpaka wa Colombia, watu walitoka kwenda kutetea elimu ya umma.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know. From Paulista Avenue in So Paulo, a traditional gathering spot for protests, to far away indigenous lands in Alto Rio Negro, near the border with Colombia, people went out to defend their public education.

en: In Viosa, Minas Gerais, a crowd of around 5,000 people marched with umbrellas under heavy rain.
swa: Huko Viosa, Minas Gerais, kundi la watu wapatao 5,000 waliandamana wakiwa na miamvuli huku mvua kubwa ikinywesha.
mt0: In Viosa, Minas Gerais, idadi ya watu takriban 5,000 waliandamana na umbrellas chini ya mvua kubwa.

en: Brazil has 69 federal universities and a large number of state universities, all offering undergraduate and postgraduate education completely free of tuition, and several community-oriented services such as extension courses, legal assistance offices, and hospitals.
swa: Brazili inayo vyuo vya umma 69 na idadi kubwa ya vyuo vikuu vya serikali na vyote vinatoa shahada ya kwanza na shahada ya uzamili bure kabisa bila kulipia ada na baadhi ya huduma za kijamii kama vile ofisi za ushauri wa kisheria na hospitali.
mt0: - 'Walikuwa na umoja wa serikali zote 69 na idadi kubwa ya serikali zote, zote hutoa elimu ya sekondari na ya chuo kikuu bila malipo, na huduma mbalimbali za kijamii kama vile kozi za uendelezaji, ofisi za ushauri wa kisheria, na hospitali.

en: Initially, the cuts would apply to only three federal universities, but they were later extended to the entire federal network.
swa: Awali, makato hayo yalikuwa yafanyike katika vyuo vitatu lakini baadayr yaliendelezwa kwa vyuo vingine vyote.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali angalia swali la chini.

en: Bolsonaro's Education Minister Abraham Weintraub says that they're not cuts but a contingency of expenses.
swa: Waziri wa elimu wa Bolsonaro, Abraham Weintraub alisema kuwa hayo sio makato bali ni kubana matumizi.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Weintraub has justified the cuts because public universities are places of mayhem.
swa: Weintraub alieleza kuwa kuna makato kwa sababu vyuo vya umma ni kama sehemu ya uharibifu.
mt0: Je, unajua kwamba Weintraub ame justified uamuzi huo kwa sababu shule za umma ni mahali pa mapambano.

en: When asked by reporters to name examples of such mayhem, he mentioned the presence of social movements in campuses, and parties with naked people.
swa: Alipoulizwa na wanahabari aleleze mifano ya huo uharibifuWhen alitaja uwepo wa mikusanyiko mikubwa ya kijamii vyuoni na pia uwepo wa sherehe za watu walio uchi.
mt0: Kama aliwauliza waandishi kutaja mifano ya uovu kama huo, aliwataja uwepo wa shughuli za kijamii katika shule, na uwepo wa parties za watu waliojificha.

en: Weintraub was appointed as minister in early April after his short-lived predecessor's administration became involved in a series of controversies.
swa: Weintraub aliteuliwa kuwa waziri mapema mwezi Aprili baada ya aliyemtangulia kukaa kwa muda kidogo kuondolewa kwa sababu ya kuhusishwa na baadhi ya migogoro.
mt0: Weintraub alikuwa nafasi ya urais mnamo Aprili katikati baada ya utawala wake uliodumu kwa muda mfupi kuhusishwa na uwezekano wa uanzishaji wa uhalifu.

en: The new minister often voices rightwing conspiracy theories, such as that crack cocaine was introduced in Brazil as part of a communist plot, and that he wants to erase cultural Marxism from universities.
swa: Waziri huyu mpya mara zote amekuwa akitoa maoni yanayowiana na sera za mrengo wa kulia kama vile madawa ya kulevya yalitambulishwa Brazili kama mkakati wa wakomunisti, na anataka kufuta utamaduni wa U-Marx vyuoni..
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, uambie tu kwamba serikali mpya mara nyingi hutumia dhana za uovu, kama vile kwamba heroin ilianzishwa katika Brazil kama sehemu ya mpango wa kikomunisti, na kwamba anataka kuondoa Marxism ya kifalsafa kutoka shuleni.

en: Some university deans have said that the cuts might impede them from opening their doors as early as the second semester of 2019.
swa: Baadhi ya wakuu wa vyuouni wamesema kuwa makato hayo yanaweza kuwazuia milango yao kufunguka mapema mwanzoni wa muhula wa pili wa 2019.
mt0: Mkuu wa chuo kikuu kadhaa wamesema kwamba uamuzi huo unaweza kuwazuia kufungua dirisha zao mapema katika kipindi cha pili cha 2019 .

en: The Federal Prosecutor's Office has sent a report to the attorney general claiming the cuts violate Brazil's Constitution.
swa: Ofisi ya mwendesha mashataka wa serikali imetuma taarifa kwa mwanasheria mkuu akilalamikia makato ya kuwa ni ukiukwaji wa katiba ya Brazili.

en: Researchers at the Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG) who study WhatsApp groups in Brazil have detected conversations around universities on that messaging app in the days following the budget cut's announcement.
swa: Watafiti kutoka chuo kikuu cha Minas Gerais (UFMG) ambao wanatafiti makundi ya WhatsApp huko Brazili wamegundua kuna mazungumzo mengi kupitia app hiyo hasa baada ya kutangazwa kukatwa kwa bajeti.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uambie tu kwamba haujui. Wanasayansi kutoka Chuo Kikuu cha Minas Gerais (UFMG) wanaochunguza WhatsApp groups katika Brazil wamegundua mazungumzo kuhusu universities kwenye app hiyo katika siku kadhaa baada ya tangazo la utawala wa chini.

en: The study has developed a tool that monitors WhatsApp groups and is widely used by fact-checking agencies in Brazil.
swa: Utafiti umetengeneza kitumizi ambacho kitafuatilia kwa upana makundi ya WhatsApp na kitatumiwa kwa upana na shirika linalojihusisha na kuuchimbua ukweli nchini Brazili.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri uendelee kusema kwamba haujui. Utafiti umeendeleza mbinu ambayo inafuatilia timu za WhatsApp na inajulikana sana na shirika la uhakiki wa habari nchini Brazil.

en: Ugandan journalist Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime has experienced the double burden of working as a woman journalist in Uganda.
swa: Mwandishi wa habari wa Uganda Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime ameonja matukio ya mzigo maradufu wakati akifanya kazi kama mwandishi wa habari mwanamke nchini Uganda.
mt0: Ugandan journalist Gertrude Uwitware Tumusiime has experienced the double burden of working as a woman journalist in Uganda.

en: In Uganda, female journalists who embrace digital tools to report, share views and access information face attacks and harassment for investigating and publishing sensitive political content.
swa: Nchini Uganda, waandishi wa habari wanawake wanaotumia vifaa vya kidijitali kuripoti, kutoa maoni na kupata habari hukabiliwa na mashambulizi na udhalilishwaji kwa sababu wanachunguza na kuchapisha maudhui nyeti ya kisiasa.
mt0: In Uganda, wanawake waandishi ambao wanatumia teknolojia ya kidijitali kuonyesha, kushiriki maoni na kupata habari wanakabiliwa na shambulio na unyanyasaji kwa kuchunguza na kuchapisha habari sensitive ya kisiasa.

en: Online harassment has become a new form of censorship.
swa: Dhuluma za mtandaoni zimekuwa mbinu mpya ya udhibiti.
mt0: Return only translation. Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali simply say you don't know.

en: Women journalists carry the double burden of gender-based abuse online in addition to potential threats related to political reporting.
swa: Waandishi wa habari wanawake wanaubeba mzigo maradufu wa dhuluma inayotokana na jinsia mtandaoni ikiwa ni pamoja na vitisho vinavyohusiana na kuandika habari za kisiasa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: These ongoing threats have led women journos to withdraw from public discourse  leaving the journalism profession dominated by men.
swa: Vitisho hivi vinavyoendelea vimesababisha waandishi wa habari wanawake kujiondoa kwenye  mijadala ya masuala ya umma  na kuacha taaluma ya uandishi wa habari kutawaliwa zaidi na wanaume
mt0: Huku usalama ukizidi kuwa chini, wanawake wanahabari wameamua kuondoka katika siasa za umma, wakiacha kazi ya habari ikiwa imetawala kwa ujumla.

en: In November 2016, Ugandan journalist Joy Doreen Biira, who was working at the privately-owned Kenya Television Network (KTN) in Kenya, returned home to Uganda for a traditional ceremony.
swa: Mnamo Novemba 2016, mwandishi wa habari wa Uganda, Joy Doreen Biira, aliyekuwa akifanya kazi katika televisheni binafsi ya Kenya Television Network (KTN) nchini Kenya, alirejea nyumbani Uganda kwa ajili ya sherehe ya kitamaduni.
mt0: In November 2016, Joy Doreen Biira, Ugandan journalist, ambaye alikuwa akifanya kazi kwenye Kenyan Television Network (KTN), alikuwa akirejea nyumbani kwa Uganda kwa ajili ya shughuli za utamaduni.

en: While Biira was home, Ugandan security forces clashed with members of the traditional Rwenzururu kingdom in the Rwenzori region of western Uganda, and their palace was burned to the ground.
swa: Wakati Biira akiwa kwao, vikosi vya usalama vya Uganda vilipambana na walinzi wa ufalme wa Rwenzururu katika mkoa wa Rwenzori magharibi mwa Uganda, na ikulu yao ikateketezwa kwa moto.
mt0: Kama wewe hujui, Ugandan security forces clashed with members of the traditional Rwenzururu kingdom in the Rwenzori region of western Uganda, and their palace was burned to the ground.

en: The gunbattle resulted in 62 deaths, including 16 policemen.
swa: Mapambano hayo ya kufyatuliana risasi yalisababisha vifo vya watu 62, wakiwemo polisi 16.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri uambie kwamba haujui.

en: Biira reacted to the military raid by posting her thoughts on Facebook on November 27:
swa: Biira aliandika hisia zake kuhusiana na tukio hilo la shambulizi la kijeshi kwa kuchapisha maoni yake kwenye Facebook mnamo Novemba 27:
mt0: Biira alijibu kuhusu shambulio la kijeshi kwa kuweka maoni yake kwenye Facebook mnamo Novemba 27:

en: Its so sad what Ive witnessed today with my own eyes  part of the palace of the kingdom Im from, the Rwenzururu Kingdom, burning down.
swa: Inasikitisha sana kile nilichokishuhudia leo kwa macho yangu mwenyewe  sehemu ya jumba la ufalme huko nitokako, Ufalme wa Rwenzururu, likiteketea kwa moto.
mt0: Ilikuwa huzuni sana kwamba leo nimeona kwa macho yangu mwenyewe sehemu ya palace ya nchi ambayo mimi nitoka, nchi ya Rwenzururu, ikianguka.

en: It felt like watching your heritage deplete before my eyes.
swa: Nilijihisi kana kwamba nilikuwa nikitizama urithi ukiangamizwa mbele ya macho yangu.
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri kisha ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: That same day, Biira was arrested and accused of circulating graphic photos of the aftermath of a deadly battle between security forces and the regional kings royal guard of the Rwenzururu kingdom  to a widely subscribed WhatsApp group, according to the Committee to Protect Journalists (CPJ).
swa: Siku hiyo hiyo, Biira alikamatwa na kutuhumiwa kusambaza picha tata za matukio hayo ya kutisha ya mapigano kati ya vikosi vya usalama na walinzi wa mfalme wa Rwenzururu  kwa kundi la WhatsApp lenye wanachama wengi, kwa mujibu wa Committee to Protect Journalists (CPIJ).
mt0: Kama unaweza kutafsiri picha hizi usiseme kwamba haujui. Biira alikamatwa siku hiyo hiyo na alitiwa hatiani kwa kusambaza picha za graphic za baada ya uhondo uliosababisha kifo cha raia wa nchi ya Rwenzururu katika eneo la Rwenzururu, katika eneo la WhatsApp kubwa, kulingana na shirika la uhuru wa habari (CPJ).

en: She also posted an Instagram video of the king's palace burning and wrote about it on Facebook, CPJ reported.

mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kisha ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: Uganda security officers allegedly forced Biira to delete social media posts and her digital tools were also confiscated,  according to a 2018 Freedom House report.

mt0: Uganda security officers allegedly forced Biira to delete social media posts and her digital tools were also confiscated, according to a 2018 Freedom House report.

en: Opiyo told Global Voices that Biiras case was dropped and closed in March 2017 after authorities investigated it and found no evidence to charge her in a court of law.
swa: Opiyo aliiambia Global Voices kuwa kesi ya Biira ilitupiliwa mbali na kufutwa mnamo Machi 2017 baada ya utawala kufanya uchunguzi na kukosa ushahidi wa kumfungulia mashtaka mahakamani.
mt0: Opiyo alisema Global Voices kwamba kesi ya Biiras ilifutwa na kufunguliwa katika Machi 2017 baada ya serikali kuchunguza ilikuwa na ushahidi usio na uwezo wa kumshtaki katika mahakama ya sheria.

en: Like many such cases, one is reviewed to be free but left with a sense of unfairness, injustice, and pain, said Opiyo, who is also the executive director of Chapter Four Uganda, a human rights organization.
swa: Sawa na kesi nyinginezo kama hizi, mtu hutua mzigo kwenye nafsi lakini hubaki na hisia ya uonevu, ukosefu wa haki, na maumivu, alisema Opiyo, ambaye pia ni mkurugenzi mtendaji wa Chapter Four Uganda, ambalo ni shirika la haki za binadamu.
mt0: Kama katika kesi nyingi, mtu anachukuliwa kuwa huru lakini anaondoka na ufahamu wa ubaya, unyanyasaji, na mateso, alisema Opiyo, ambaye pia ni msimamizi wa Chapter Four Uganda, shirika la haki za binadamu.

en: Opiyo added that spending a few days in jail and enduring the pain of being locked up never leaves you.

en: Political journalists  especially those who cover opposition politics  often experience threats more than any other kind of journalism.

en: But women journalists have it worse because the government believes they are weaker and easily intimidated, according to Mukose Arnold Anthony, Secretary for Media Safety and Human Rights of the Uganda Journalists Association (UJA), who spoke to Global Voices via WhatsApp on April 3.

en: Women journalists may face extra psychological harm, breach of privacy, loss of identity, limitation of mobility, censorship, and loss of property as a result of their work, according to a UNESCO study on freedom of expression in Africa published in 2018.
swa: Hutokea kwa waandishi wa habari wanawake kukumbana na madhara zaidi ya kisaikolojia, ukiukwaji wa faragha yao, kuharibiwa utambulisho, upunguzaji fursa zao za kwenda huku na kule, udhibiti, na upotezaji wa mali kwa sababu ya kazi zao, kwa mujibu wa utafiti wa UNESCO kuhusu uhuru wa kujieleza barani Afrika uliochapishwa mnamo 2018.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: And, according to a Human Rights Network for Journalists-Uganda 2018 study, 12 percent of women journalists have suffered abuses and violations, including death threats and arrests.
swa: Na, kwa mujibu wa utafiti wa Mtandao wa Haki za Binadamu kwa Wanahabari-Uganda wa 2018, asilimia 12 ya wanahabari wanawake wamekumbana na dhuluma na ukiukwaji, vikiwemo vitisho vya vifo na kukamatwa.
mt0: Na, kulingana na utafiti wa 2018 wa Human Rights Network for Journalists-Uganda, 12 kwa ajili ya wanawake wanahabari wamekabiliwa na unyanyasaji na unyanyasaji, ikiwa ni pamoja na unyanyasaji na ukamataji.

en: Three-quarters of women journalists suffered violations at the hands of state agents such as the police, resident district commissioners and other security operatives.
swa: Robo tatu ya waandishi wa habari wanawake wamekumbana na ukiukwaji haki katika mikono ya maofisa wa serikali kama vile polisi, wakuu wa wilaya na maofisa wengine wa usalama.
mt0: - 'Watu wa tatu wa waandishi wa habari wanawake waliuawa na serikali katika unyanyasaji wao, kama vile polisi, wenyeji wa mikoa na wengine wa usalama.

en: Ugandan journalist Bahati Remmy has faced attacks and harassment on the job as a female reporter.
swa: Mwanahabari wa Uganda Bahati Remmy amekumbana na mashambulio na unyanyaswaji akiwa katika shughuli za kazi kama ripota mwanamke.
mt0: Ugandan journalist Bahati Remmy has faced attacks and harassment on the job as a female reporter.

en: Photo via Bahati Remmy Paydesk public account, used with permission.
swa: Picha kupitia akaunti ya Paydesk ya Bahati Remmy, imetumika kwa ruhusa.
mt0: Photo via Bahati Remmy Paydesk public account, used with permission.

en: Bahati Remmy, a Ugandan female journalist who now works in the United States, told Global Voices that she quit reporting news in Uganda because she felt jaded after her horrific ordeal while covering the elections in Uganda in 2016.
swa: Bahati Remmy, mwanahabari mwanamke wa Uganda ambaye kwa sasa anafanya kazi Marekani, aliiambia Global Voices kuwa aliacha kufanya kazi ya uandishi nchini Uganda kwa sababu alihisi kupoteza shauku baada ya tukio la kutisha alipokuwa anaangazia taarifa za uchaguzi nchini Uganda mnamo 2016.
mt0: Bahati Remmy, mwanahabari wa Uganda anayeishi Marekani, alisema Global Voices kwamba aliacha kuandika habari katika Uganda baada ya kukabiliwa na unyanyasaji baada ya kufuatilia uchaguzi wa Uganda 2016.

en: Ugandan police arrested Remmy while doing a live broadcast for the privately-owned NBS TV to cover the house arrest of opposition politician Dr. Kizza Besigye in the town of Kasangati.
swa: Polisi wa Uganda walimkamata Remmy wakati akifanya matangazo ya moja kwa moja kupitia runinga ya NBS inayomilikiwa na mtu binafsi ili kuangazia kuzuiliwa nyumbani kwa kiongozi mkuu wa upinzani Dk.Kizza Besigye katika mji wa Kasangati.
mt0: Ugandan police arrested Remmy while doing a live broadcast for the privately-owned NBS TV to cover the house arrest of opposition politician Dr. Kizza Besigye in the town of Kasangati.

en: The police engaged in a running battle not to allow any journalists to cover the story concerning Besigye.
swa: Polisi walizua hali ya taharuki wakati wa kuwazuia wanahabari kuangazia taarifa kumhusu Besigye.
mt0: Polisi walipigana kwa mbio ili kukataa habari kuhusu Besigye.

en: Police fondled her breasts in the police van, undressed her at the station and exposed her naked body to a camera, according to Remmy.
swa: Polisi walinipapasa matiti yangu kwenye gari lao, wakanivua nguo kituoni na kuniacha uchi mbele ya kamera, kwa mujibu wa Remmy.
mt0: Huku polisi wakimsogelea katika van ya polisi, wakamtoa katika kituo cha polisi na kumuonyesha mwili wake wenyewe kwa kamera, Remmy alisema.

en: She was also followed and harassed by a police officer on Facebook because the Ugandan government thought she had connived with Besigye to taint the countrys image.
swa: Pia alifuatiliwa na kunyanyaswa na ofisa wa polisi kwenye Facebook kwa sababu serikali ya Uganda ilidhani kwamba alikuwa ameshirikiana na Besigye kuichafulia nchi taswira.
mt0: Hata hivyo, alikuwa akifuatiliwa na kisha akiwashambuliwa na polisi kwenye Facebook kwa sababu serikali ya Uganda ilikuwa ikifikiria kwamba alikuwa ameshirikiana na Besigye ili kuharibisha urembo wa nchi.

en: She told Global Voices that anonymous notes left at her door threatened to kidnap her if she refused to reveal Besigyes exit route from his house.
swa: Aliiambia Global Voices kuwa ujumbe wa maandishi kutoka kwa watu wasiojulikana uliachwa mlangoni pake ukitoa vitisho vya kumteka iwapo angekataa kutoa siri ya njia atakayotumia Besigye kutoka nyumbani kwake.
mt0: alisema Global Voices kwamba barua zilizoandikwa kwenye dirisha lake zilitishia kumuua ikiwa angekataa kuonyesha njia ya uondokaji wa Besigyes kutoka nyumbani kwake.
