en: What bothers me most is that whoever tries to say something that is not in support of the current regime is taken to be a rebel so the Ugandan people must wake up.
swa: Kinachoniudhi ni kwamba yeyote anayejaribu kutamka jambo lisilounga mkono utawala uliopo anachukuliwa kana kwamba ni mwasi kwa hivyo ni sharti watu wa Uganda wazinduke.
mt0: Ni jambo ambalo linanisumbua zaidi ni kwamba mtu yeyote anayejaribu kusema kitu ambacho sio katika umoja wa serikali ya sasa anachukuliwa kuwa mmoja wa uasi, kwa hivyo watu wa Uganda wanapaswa kuamka.

en: Many women journalists in Uganda have stopped reporting stories that are critical of the government because they fear attacks and harassment by the state.
swa: Wanahabari wengi wanawake nchini Uganda wameacha kazi ya uandishi wa habari hasa zile zinazoikosoa serikali kwa hofu ya kushambuliwa na kudhulumiwa na utawala.
mt0: Return only. Many women journalists in Uganda have stopped reporting stories that are critical of the government because they fear attacks and harassment by the state.

en: Media practitioners have said that government and security agents occasionally call editors and instruct them to not to publish stories that negatively portray the government.
swa: Wataalamu wa habari wameelezea kuwa serikali na vyombo vya usalama huwapigia simu wahariri na kuwaagiza kutochapisha habari zinazoipa serikali mwonekano hasi.
mt0: Media practitioners wamesema kwamba mara nyingi serikali na maafisa wa usalama wanaita editors na kuwaambia wasichapuzi wasichapuze habari ambazo huwaonyesha serikali vibaya.

en: These attacks often go unreported  especially for women  which has also made it difficult to understand the full scope of this problem.
swa: Mashambulio haya huwa hayaripotiwi  haswa na wanawake  hali inayosababisha ugumu wa kuelewa kina halisi cha tatizo hili.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri shambulio hili huwa linaripotiwa tu, hasa kwa wanawake ambayo imefanya kuwa vigumu kuelewa ukubwa wa tatizo hili.

en: Remmy dragged the Ugandan government to the Uganda Human Rights Commission, but until today, there has been no update on her case.
swa: Remmy aliiburuta serikali ya Uganda kwenye Tume ya Haki za Binadamu ya Uganda, lakini hadi leo, hakuna lililojiri kuhusu kesi yake.
mt0: Return only. Kama hauwezi kutafsiri simply say you don't know Remmy aliipeleka serikali ya Uganda kwenye Uganda Human Rights Commission, lakini hadi leo, hakuna habari kuhusu kesi yake.

en: The commission lacks the required independence to rule in favor of those who submit complaints against the government.
swa: Tume inakosa uhuru unaotakiwa kufanya maamuzi kwa upande wa wale wanaowasilisha malalamiko dhidi ya serikali.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: Its seven members, including its chairperson, are appointed by the president, with the parliaments approval.
swa: Wajumbe wake saba, pamoja na mwenyekiti wake, wanateuliwa na rais, kwa idhini ya Bunge.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, uambie tu kwamba haujui.

en: They are biased, Remmy said, adding: They have a huge backlog and most of the cases they want to hear are cases brought in by the government.
swa: Wana upendeleo, Remmy alisema, huku akiongezea: Wana mrundikano wa kesi, na kesi nyingi wanazotaka kuzisikiliza ni zile zinazowasilishwa na serikali.
mt0: They are biased, Remmy said, adding: They have a huge backlog and most of the cases they want to hear are cases brought in by the government.

en: Many threats faced by women journalists online are closely linked to abuse offline.
swa: Vitisho vingi vinavyowakumba wanahabari wanawake mtandaoni vinahusiana kwa karibu na vile vya dhuluma dhidi yao nje ya mtandao.
mt0: Return only translation. Many threats faced by women journalists online are closely linked to abuse offline.

en: Remmy believes that the right, plight and dignity of female journalists should be upheld at all times because attacks on women silence the media as a whole.
swa: Remmy anaamini kuwa haki, hali na hadhi ya wanahabari wanawake zinapaswa kuzingatiwa nyakati zote kwa sababu mashambulio dhidi ya wanawake yanakandamiza sekta ya uwanahabari kwa jumla.
mt0: Remmy anaamini haki, uhitaji na heshima ya wanahabari wanawake inapaswa kuheshimiwa kila wakati kwani shambulio la wanawake linasitisha uhuru wa habari kwa ujumla.

en: As Uganda plans to hold presidential and parliamentary elections in 2021, attacks and harassment of women journalists by the state need to stop because it affects access to information, freedom of expression and democracy rights of Ugandan citizens.
swa: Uganda inapojiandaa kufanya uchaguzi wa urais na ubunge mnamo 2021, mashambulio na udhalalishwaji wa waandishi wa habari wanawake na serikali unapaswa kukomeshwa kwa sababu unaathiri ufikiaji wa habari, uhuru wa kujieleza na haki za demokrasia za raia wa Uganda.
mt0: Kama Uganda inapanga kufanya uchaguzi wa rais na bunge mwaka 2021, shambulio na unyanyasaji wa wanawake waandishi wa habari na serikali inahitaji kuepukika kwani inaathiri ufikiaji wa habari, uhuru wa kusema na haki za demokrasia za raia wa Uganda.

en: Press freedom remains an undermined child in the countrys system, Remmy told Global Voices.
swa: Uhuru wa waandishi wa habari unasalia kuwa mtoto anayepuuzwa katika mfumo wa nchi, Remmy aliiambia Global Voices.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Press freedom remains an undermined child in the country's system, Remmy told Global Voices.

en: This article is part of a series called The identity matrix: platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa.These posts interrogate identity-driven online hate speech or discrimination based on language or geographic origin, misinformation and harassment (particularly against female activists and journalists) prevalent in digital spaces of seven African countries: Algeria, Cameroon, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudan, Tunisia and Uganda.
swa: Makala haya ni sehemu ya mfululizo unaoitwa Jedwali la Utambulisho: Jukwaa la kudhibiti vitisho vya mtandaoni dhidi ya uhuru wa kujieleza barani Afrika, Machapisho haya yanahoji kauli za chuki zenye utambulisho au kubagua kwa misingi ya lugha au asili ya kijiografia, habari potovu na udhalilishwaji (haswa dhidi ya wanaharakati wanawake na waandishi wa habari) uliokithiri mtandaoni katika nchi saba za Kiafrika: Algeria, Kamerun, Ethiopia, Nigeria, Sudani, Tunisia na Uganda.
mt0: If you can't translate this sentence simply say you don't know

en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
swa: Mradi huu umefadhiliwa na Mfuko wa Haki za Kidijitali wa Afrika wa shirika la Ushirikiano wa Sera za kimataifa za TEHAMA kwa ajili ya Mashariki na Kusini mwa Afrika (CIPESA).

en: Tree roots cling to a 15th-century wall on Kilwa Kisiwani Island, Tanzania.
swa: Mizizi ya miti iliyojikita kwenye ukuta wa karne ya 15 uliopo kisiwa cha Kilwa Kisiwani, Tanzania.
mt0: Tree roots cling to a 15th-century wall on Kilwa Kisiwani Island, Tanzania.

en: In 1981, the ruins of the powerful Swahili sultanate on the island were declared a UNESCO World Heritage Site.
swa: Mnamo mwaka wa 1981, magofu ya sultani hodari wa Kiswahili kisiwani humo yalitangazwa kuwa eneo la UNESCO la urithi wa dunia.
mt0: In 1981, katika eneo la kisiwa, uharibifu wa utawala wa Swahili uliokuwa mkuu ulichukuliwa kuwa sehemu ya UNESCO ya Urithi wa Kitaifa.

en: Editors note: This personal essay was written following a Twitter campaign organized by Global Voices sub-Saharan Africa and Rising Voices where each week, a different language activist shared their perspectives on the intersection of digital rights and African Languages  as part of the project, The identity matrix: Platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa.
swa: Kidokezo cha mhariri: Makala haya ya kibinafsi yaliandikwa kufuatia kampeni ya Twitter iliyoandaliwa na Global Voices Ukanda wa Afrika Kusini mwa Jangwa la Sahara kwa ushirikiano wa Mradi wa Rising Voices pale kila wiki, mwanaharakati tofauti wa lugha alishiriki maoni yake kuhusu muingiliano wa haki za kidijitali na Lugha za Kiafrika kama sehemu ya mradi, Matriki utambulisho: Tishio la ukandamizaji wa uhuru wa kujieleza mtandaoni barani Afrika.
mt0: Mheshimiwa Mwenyekiti: Huu uandishi uliandaliwa baada ya kampeni ya Twitter iliyoandaliwa na Global Voices sub-Saharan Africa na Rising Voices ambayo kila wiki, activist mmoja wa lugha ilikuwa akishiriki maoni yake kuhusu uhusiano kati ya haki za digital na lugha za Kiafrika kama sehemu ya mradi, The identity matrix: Platform regulation of online threats to expression in Africa.

en: According to the United Nations Educational Scientific and Cultural Organisation (UNESCO), linguistic and cultural diversity are of strategic importance for people around the world to strengthen the unity and cohesion of societies.
swa: Kulingana na shirika la Umoja wa Mataifa la Elimu, Sayansi na Utamaduni (UNESCO), utofauti wa lugha na utamaduni una umuhimu kimkakati kwa watu ulimwenguni kote katika juhudi za kuimarisha umoja na mshikamano wa jamii.
mt0: Kama ulivyosema, lugha na utamaduni mbalimbali ni muhimu kwa watu katika nchi zote duniani ili kuendeleza umoja na umoja wa socits.

en: This linguistic and cultural diversity propelled the UNESCO general conference to proclaim International Mother Language Day (IMLD) in November 1999, to be commemorated annually on February 21 annually.
swa: Utofauti huu wa lugha na utamaduni ulishinikiza kongamano kuu la UNESCO kutangaza Siku ya Kimataifa ya Lugha ya Mama (IMLD) mnamo Novemba 1999, siku inayokumbukuwa mnamo Februari 21 kila mwaka.
mt0: Hii lugha na utamaduni mbalimbali ilipelekea UNESCO kutangaza siku ya lugha ya mama (IMLD) mnamo Novemba 1999, ili kuadhimisha kila mwaka tarehe 21 Februari.

en: To bolster IMLD, the United Nations (UN) declared the International Year of Indigenous Languages (IYIL 2019), to draw attention to the endangerment of the worlds indigenous languages.
swa: Kuimarisha IMLD, Umoja wa Mataifa (UN) ulitangaza Mwaka wa Kimataifa wa Lugha za Asili (IYIL 2019), ili kuzingatia hatari ya kuangamia kwa lugha za asili ulimwenguni.
mt0: Kwa kusaidia IMLD, Umoja wa Mataifa (UN) ilitangaza mwaka wa lugha za asili (IYIL 2019) ili kuonyesha uharibifu wa lugha za asili duniani.

en: Today, there are over 7,100 languages spoken around the world, 28 percent of which are spoken on the African continent alone.
swa: Hivi leo, kuna zaidi ya lugha 7,100 zinazozungumzwa kote duniani,asilimia 28 yazo zikizungumzwa barani Afrika pekee.
mt0: Sasa, kuna lugha zaidi ya 7,100 zinazozungumzwa duniani, 28 percent ya hizo zinazozungumzwa katika Afrika peke yake.

en: Despite this, English dominates online spaces in the region.
swa: Licha ya hili, Kiingereza kinaongoza mtandaoni katika eneo hili.
mt0: Hata hivyo, Kiingereza kinatawala katika eneo la mtandao.

en: Some twenty years ago, 80 percent of the worlds online content was English-centric.
swa: Miaka ishirini iliyopita, asilimia 80 ya maudhui ya dunia mtandaoni yalikuwa yanaegemea Kiingereza.
mt0: Return only translation. Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: Currently, however, English content online is said to have shrunk to between 51- 55 percent.
swa: Kwa sasa, hata hivyo, maudhui ya Kiingereza yanasemekana kupungua hadi kiwango cha kati ya asilimia 51 hadi 55.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ufafanuzi wa Kiingereza kwenye mtandao unaripotiwa kushuka hadi katika kiwango cha kati ya 51-55%.

en: The million-dollar question, therefore, is: Could this sharp drop be an indicator that people now favor their native languages online over English, considering that less than 15 percent of the world population speaks English as their first language?
swa: Swala kizushi, kwa hivyo, ni:je, kupungua huku kunaashiria kuwa sasa watu wanapendelea lugha zao za asilia kuliko Kiingereza, ukizingatia kuwa ni chini ya asilimia 15 tu ya idadi ya watu duniani inayozungumza Kiingereza kama lugha yao ya kwanza?
mt0: Mswali wa bilionea, kwa hivyo, ni: Je, upunguaji huu mkubwa unaweza kuonyesha kwamba watu sasa wanapenda lugha zao za asili kwenye mtandao kuliko Kiingereza, ukizingatia kwamba chini ya 15 kwa idadi ya watu duniani wanazungumza Kiingereza kama lugha ya kwanza?

en: Swahili: Coming to birth?
swa: Kiswahili: Ujio wa Uzao?
mt0: Je, unakuja kuzaliwa?

en: Swahili is recognized as one of the official languages of the African Union (AU), alongside English, Portuguese, French, Spanish and Arabic.
swa: Kiswahili kinatambuliwa kama mojawapo wa lugha rasmi za Umoja wa Afrika (AU), kando na Kiiengereza, Kireno, Kifaransa, Kihispania na Kiarabu.
mt0: Swahili inatambuliwa kama lugha ya rasmi ya Jumuiya ya Afrika (AU), pamoja na Kiingereza, Kifaransa, Kihispania, Kiarabu na Kihispania.

en: Swahili is also the lingua franca for East Africa Community (EAC) member states.
swa: Kiswahili pia ni lugha ya matumizi mapana ya mataifa wanachama wa Jumuiya ya Afrika mashariki (EAC).
mt0: Swahili pia ni lugha ya umoja wa Afrika (EAC) nchi zote.

en: Rwanda, an EAC member, saw its lower legislative house approve a law making Swahili an official language in 2017  in addition to Kinyarwanda, French and English.
swa: Rwanda, taifa mwanachama wa EAC, kupitia bunge lake la chini, ilipitisha msuada wa kukifanya Kiswahili kuwa lugha rasmi mnamo 2017  kando na Kinyarwanda, Kifaransa na Kiingereza.
mt0: Return only. Rwanda, ambayo ni mwanachama wa EAC, ilikuwa imekubali sheria ya chini ya bunge lake kufanya Swahili kuwa lugha ya rasmi mwaka 2017 pamoja na Kinyarwanda, Kifaransa na Kiingereza.

en: Besides being used for administrative purposes, Swahili will be incorporated into Rwandas school curriculum.
swa: Licha ya kutumiwa kwa madhumuni ya utawala, Kiswahili kitajumuishwa kwenye mtaala wa elimu wa nchi hiyo.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa, Swahili itajumuishwa katika curriculum ya shule ya Rwanda.

en: In Uganda, the government in September 2019 approved the establishment of the National Swahili Council.
swa: Nchini Uganda, mnamo Septemba 2019, serikali iliidhinisha uanzishaji wa Baraza la Kitaifa la Kiswahili.
mt0: In Uganda, serikali ilikubali kuanzishwa kwa shirika la Kitaifa la Kiswahili mnamo Septemba 2019.

en: Article 6 (2) of the Constitution of Uganda also spells out that Swahili shall be the second official language in Uganda to be used in such circumstances as Parliament may by law prescribe.
swa: Kifungu cha 6 (2) cha Katiba ya Uganda pia kimeelezea kuwa Kiswahili kitakuwa lugha rasmi ya pili nchini Uganda na kitatumika katika mazingira kadri Bunge litakavyoweza kuagiza kwa sheria.
mt0: If you can't translate simply say you don't know Article 6 (2) of the Constitution of Uganda also spells out that Swahili shall be the second official language in Uganda to be used in such circumstances as Parliament may by law prescribe.

en: In 2018, South Africa, which boasts 11 official languages, formalized Swahili as an optional subject in its curriculum, starting in 2020.
swa: Mnamo 2018, Afrika Kusini, nchi inayojivunia lugha rasmi 11, ilirasimisha Kiswahili kama somo la hiari katika mtaala wake, kuanzia mwaka wa 2020.
mt0: In 2018, South Africa, ambayo ina lugha 11 rasmi, formalized Swahili kama kozi ya ziada katika curriculum yake, ambayo itaanza mwaka 2020.

en: In 2019, the Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) adopted Swahili as its fourth official language.
swa: Mnamo mwaka wa 2019, Jumuiya ya Maendeleo Kusini mwa Afrika (SADC) ilipitisha Kiswahili kama lugha rasmi ya nne ya Jumuiya hiyo.
mt0: In 2019, Southern Africa Development Community (SADC) adopted Swahili as its fourth official language.

en: Despite Swahili being the most widely spoken African language, with approximately 150 million speakers  mostly in East Africa, the Great Lakes region, southern Somalia, and some parts of Southern Africa, its visibility online is dismal.
swa: Licha ya kuwa lugha ya Kiafrika inayozungumzwa sana, na takribani watu milioni 150  haswa katika Afrika Mashariki, kanda ya maziwa makuu, kusini mwa Somalia, na maeneo mengine ya kusini mwa Afrika, muonekano wa Kiswahili mtandaoni ni finyu.
mt0: Hata kama Swahili ni lugha inayozungumzwa sana katika Afrika, na zaidi ya watu milioni 150, katika eneo la Mashariki mwa Afrika, katika eneo la Great Lakes, katika Somalia ya Kaskazini, na katika sehemu kadhaa za Southern Africa, upatikanaji wake online ni mdogo.

en: John Walubengo, a lecturer at the Multimedia University of Kenya, states in an op-ed with the Nation, a Kenyan daily, that the absence of online linguistic and cultural diversity creates a society with a tunnel-vision view of the world.
swa: John Walubengo, mhadhiri wa Chuo Kikuu cha Multimedia cha Kenya, anachanganua kwenye makala yake katika Nation, jarida la kila siku nchini Kenya, kuwa ukosefu wa lugha na utamaduni mtandaoni unaunda jamii yenye mtazamo mdogo wa dunia.
mt0: John Walubengo, profesa wa lugha na utamaduni katika Chuo cha Multimedia cha Kenya, alisema katika op-ed iliyochapishwa na gazeti la Nation, kwamba ukosefu wa lugha na utamaduni wa kijamii unajenga nchi yenye utazamaji wa ulimwengu ulio katika uharibifu.

en: Walubengo predicts that most indigenous cultures end up surrendering their identities to the English way of doing things.
swa: Walubengo anaelezea kuwa tamaduni nyingi za kiasili huishia kusalimisha utambulisho wao kwa hali za Kiingereza za ufanyaji mambo.
mt0: Walubengo predicts that most indigenous cultures end up surrendering their identities to the English way of doing things.

en: This sad reality can only be reversed if indigenous civilizations fight to retain their identities both online and offline, he says.
swa: Ukweli huu wa kusikitisha hata hivyo unaweza kubadilishwa tu iwapo jamii asilia zitapigania kuhifadhi utambulisho wao mtandaoni na vile vile nje ya mtandao, anasema.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, simply say you don't know.

en: But all is not gloom and doom.
swa: Hata hivyo, yote si ya kutamausha.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: There are some dedicated organizations at the forefront of promoting and developing Swahili online.
swa: Kuna mashirika kadhaa yaliyojitolea katika mstari wa mbele kuendeleza na kukuza Kiswahili mtandaoni.
mt0: Kuna shirika fulani la umoja wa nchi ambalo linajihusisha na kuendeleza na kuendeleza Swahili online.

en: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers
swa: The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers.

en: (ICANN), a global multi-stakeholder organization that coordinates Internet Domain Name System (DNS), Internet Protocol (IP) addresses and autonomous system numbers, instituted the Internationalized Domain Names (IDNs) that enable people to use domain names in local languages and scripts.
swa: (ICANN),  shirika la kimataifa lenye wadau wengi linaloratibu Mfumo wa Majina ya Mtandao(DNS), Anwani za Mtandao (IP) na nambari za mfumo huru, lilianzisha Majina ya Kikoa ya Kimataifa (IDNs), yanayowezesha watu kutumia majina ya kikoa katika lugha na maandishi ya kiasili.Kiuhakika, huundwa kwa kutumia herufi kutoka maandishi tofauti, kama vile Kiarabu, Kichina, au Kisiriliki.
mt0: (ICANN), shirika la kimataifa la usimamizi wa jina la Internet (DNS), uendeshwaji wa IP na namba za uhuru za shirika, lilianzisha jina la kimataifa la jina la domain (IDN) ambalo linawezesha watu kutumia jina la domain katika lugha zao na scripts.

en: Ideally, they are formed using characters from different scripts, such as Arabic, Chinese, or Cyrillic.These are then encoded by the Unicode standard and used as allowed by relevant IDN protocols, a set of standards defined by the Internet Architecture Board (IAB), and its subsidiary groups; the Internet Engineering Task Force (IETF) and the Internet Research Task Force (IRTF).
swa: Herufi hizi kisha husimbwa na kiwango cha Unicode na kutumiwa kama inavyoruhusiwa na vikoa vya IDN, seti ya viwango vilivyoainishwa na Bodi ya Usanifu wa Mtandao (IAB), na vikundi vyake vya kampuni ndogo; Tume ya Kazi ya Uhandisi wa Mtandao (IETF) na Tume ya Utafiti wa Mtandao (IRTF).
mt0: Kama kweli, huundwa kwa kutumia lugha tofauti, kama vile Arabic, Chinese, au Cyrillic. Hapo huwa encoded na utumiaji wa IDN, ambayo ni sheria iliyowekwa na IAB, na timu zake; IETF na IRTF.

en: The Universal Acceptance Steering Group (UASG)
swa: The Universal Acceptance Steering Group (UASG)
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know The Universal Acceptance Steering Group (UASG)

en: UASG is a community-based team of industry leaders, supported by ICANN, that prepares online communities for the next billion internet users.
swa: UASG ni jamii ya viongozi wa tasnia, inayohimiliwa na ICANN, ambayo huandaa jamii mtandaoni kwa watumiaji bilioni moja wafuatao wa mtandao.
mt0: UASG ni timu ya umoja wa kitaifa ya wakurugenzi wa shirika, inayoendeshwa na ICANN, ambayo inaandaa katika umoja wa kijamii katika umoja wa kijamii kwa ajili ya watumiaji wa internet wa milioni ijayo.

en: This is achieved through a process known as Universal Acceptance (UA) that ensures that internet applications and systems treat all top-level domains (TLDs) and emails based on those domains in a consistent manner  including those in non-Latin-based languages and those that are more than three characters long.
swa: Huku kunafanikishwa kupitia mchakato unaojulikana kama Ukubalikaji Ulimwenguni (UA), ambao huhakikisha kwamba programu na mifumo ya mtandao inashughulikia vikoa vyote vya viwango cha juu (TLDs) na barua pepe kulingana na vikoa hivyo kwa njia thabiti  pamoja na vile vilivyoko kwenye maandishi yasiyo ya Kilatini na vile ambavyo ni zaidi ya herufi tatu.
mt0: Hii inafanyika kwa njia inayojulikana kama Ukubali wa Kitaifa (UA) ambayo hutoa uhakikisho kwamba programu za mtandao na mfumo wa uendeshaji wa intaneti hushughulikia majina ya ngazi ya juu (TLDs) na barua pepe zinazotokana na majina hayo kwa njia sawa, ikiwa ni pamoja na zile zinazotokana na lugha zisizo za Kilatini na zile zinazoweza kuzidi huru.

en: UA serves digital natives around the world in their local languages and with domain names that better align with their cultural identities.
swa: UA hutumikia wanamtandao ulimwenguni kote katika lugha zao asili na kwa majina ya vikoa ambayo yanatambulisha utamaduni wao.

en: Localization Lab
swa: Localization Lab
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Localization Lab.

en: Localization Lab is a global community of volunteer collaborators who support the translation and localization of digital safety tutorials and tools like TOR, Signal, OONI, Psiphon.
swa: Localization Lab, ni jamii ya kimataifa yenye washiriki wa kujitolea wanaohimili utafsiri na ujanibishaji wa miongozo ya utumiaji na vifaa vya kidijitali vya usalama kama vile TOR, Signal, OONI, Psiphon.
mt0: - Localization Lab ni timu ya umoja wa kimataifa ya washiriki wenye umoja ambao wanasaidia kutafsiri na kutafsiri tutorials za usalama wa digitali na vifaa kama TOR, Signal, OONI, Psiphon.

en: These technologies address security, privacy and anonymity online by ensuring that indigineous language activists have safe spaces for accessing information online.
swa: Teknolojia hizi zinaangazia usalama, faragha, na ufichojina kwa kuhakikisha kuwa wanaharakati wa lugha za kiasilia wana nyugha salama za kufikia taarifa mtandaoni.
mt0: Teknolojia hizi zinashughulikia usalama, uhuru na uandishi wa habari online kwa kuhakikisha kuwa wenyeji wa lugha wenyeji wana usalama wa ufikiaji wa habari online.

en: Localization Lab has translated more than 60 of these safety tools into over 180 different languages and dialects from around the world, among them Swahili.
swa: Localization Lab imetafsiri zaidi ya vifaa 60 kwenye lugha 180 tofauti kote duniani,
mt0: - 'Ikiwa unaweza kutafsiri sheria hizi zaidi ya 60, ulisema kwamba haujui. Localization Lab imetafsiri zaidi ya 60 ya sheria hizi katika lugha 180 tofauti na lugha za ndani, katika lugha zote hizi, ikiwa ni pamoja na Swahili.

en: Kondoa Community Network (KCN)
swa: Kondoa Community Network (KCN)
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Kondoa Community Network (KCN)

en: KCN is the first community network to pilot the use of television white space (TVWS), a wireless technology that employs unused parts of the radio spectrum in the 470 to 790 MHz frequency band  to address internet connectivity in rural Tanzania.
swa: KCN mtandao jamii wa kwanza kufanyia majaribio teknolojia ya mawimbi ya Televisheni almaarufu TVWS, teknolojia isiyounganisha na nyaya inayotumia mawimbi yasiyotumika ya redio yaliyopo ndani ya masafa ya mita bendi 470 hadi 790 MHz kutatua changamoto ya uunganishwaji mtandaoni vijijini nchini Tanzania.
mt0: KCN ni mtandao wa kwanza wa umoja wa kitaifa kusimamia matumizi ya televisheni ya rangi nyeusi (TVWS), teknolojia ya wireless inayotumia sehemu zisizohitajika za radio spectrum katika umbali wa 470 hadi 790 MHz kusaidia upatikanaji wa internet katika Tanzania ya chini.

en: KCN trains the rural populace to create and host local content thats befitting to their context.
swa: KCN inawafunza wanavijiji kuunda na kuwa wenyeji wa maudhui asilia yenye manufaa na muktadha wao.
mt0: KCN hufundisha watu wa eneo la mashambani kujenga na kuendesha matangazo ya ndani yaliyo na maana kwa eneo lao.

en: Matogoro Jabhera, KCN founder and lecturer at the University of Dodoma, Tanzania, told Global Voices in a Skype call, that he believes that local content provides an incentive for more [of the] offline population to get online because they can relate with their local news [] compared to the current situation where most contents are in the English language.
swa: Matogoro Jabhera, mwanzilishi wa KCN na mhadhiri msaidizi katika Chuo Kikuu cha Dodoma, Tanzania, aliliambia shirika la Global Voices kupitia simu ya Skype, kuwa anaamini maudhui asilia yanatoa motisha kwa watu zaidi waliopo nje ya mtandao kujiunga mtandaoni kwa sababu wanaweza wakaelewa taarifa zao asili [] ikilinganishwa na hali ya sasa pale maudhui mengi yapo kwenye lugha ya Kiingereza.
mt0: Matogoro Jabhera, KCN founder and lecturer at the University of Dodoma, Tanzania, told Global Voices in a Skype call, that he believes that local content provides an incentive for more [of the] offline population to get online because they can relate with their local news [] compared to the current situation where most contents are in English language.

en: The next billion multilingual users on the internet
swa: Watumiaji bilioni wafuatao mtandaoni
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know The next billion multilingual users on the internet.

en: The world anticipates connecting the next billion users of the internet and 17 million of these users are projected to get connected online using language as their digital identity.
swa: Ulimwengu unatarajia kuwaunganisha watumiaji bilioni wafuatao mtandaoni na milioni 17 ya watumiaji hawa wanakadiriwa kuunganishwa mtandaoni wakitumia lugha kama utambulisho wao wa kidijitali.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Dunia inatarajia kuunganishwa na watumiaji wa internet wa milioni 17 na zaidi, na zaidi ya milioni 17 wanatarajiwa kuunganishwa online kutumia lugha kama utambulisho wao wa digital.

en: Therefore, a lack of sufficient local content could have adverse effects as far as digital inclusion.
swa: Kwa hivyo, ukosekanaji wa maudhui asilia huenda ukawa na athari kubwa mno  ukizingatia ujumuishwaji kidijitali.
mt0: Kwa hiyo, ukosefu wa habari ya ndani ya ubora wa kiasi katika eneo lingeweza kusababisha madhara kwa ushirikiano wa digital.

en: This will outrightly affect digital rights  largely, internet access, right to access information online, and the right to use their own indigenous language to create, share and disseminate information and knowledge through the internet.
swa: Bayana, huku kutaathiri haki za kidijitali  haswa, ufikiaji mtandao, haki ya kufikia maelezo mtandaoni, na haki ya kutumia lugha zao asilia kutengeneza, kushiriki, na kusambaza taarifa na maarifa kupitia mtandao.
mt0: Hii itaathiri haki za kidijitali kubwa, ufikiaji wa intaneti, haki ya kupata habari kwenye intaneti, na haki ya kutumia lugha yao ya asili kuunda, kushiriki na kueneza habari na maarifa kwenye intaneti.

en: It is thus vital to put in place formidable action plans that will foster the development of ICT applications and services, as well as the use of local languages, to guarantee digital inclusion for all.
swa: Hivyo ni muhimu kuweka mikakati itakayoendeleza utengenezaji wa programu za TEHAMA na huduma, vile vile utumiaji wa lugha asilia, ili kuhakikisha ujumuishwaji wa kidijitali kwa wote.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kupata ufahamu, uweke katika uwezo mkubwa wa kuendeleza shughuli kubwa ambazo zitasaidia kuendeleza shughuli za ICT na huduma, pamoja na kutumia lugha za ndani, ili kuhakikisha ushirikiano wa kidigitali kwa wote.

en: This, complemented by actions such as localization of digital training and learning materials, and rural ICT literacy programs, is likely to spur a digital revolution, hence promoting digital rights of internet users and bridging the digital divide.
swa: Hatua hii, ikihimiliwa na juhudi zenginezo kama vile ujanibishaji wa vifaa vya kufunzia na kujifunzia, na mipango ya kusoma na kuandika ya TEHAMA vijijini, inaweza kuchochea mapinduzi ya kidijitali, na hivyo basi kukuza haki za kidijitali za watumizi wa mtandao na kuziba pengo la mgawanyiko wa kidijitali.
mt0: Hii, pamoja na shughuli kama vile upatikanaji wa rasilimali za mafunzo ya digitali na ujifunzaji, na mipango ya uelewa wa ICT katika nchi za mashambani, inaweza kusababisha ubadiliko wa kidigitali, hivyo kuendeleza haki za kidigitali za watumiaji wa internet na kuvunja umbali wa kidigitali.

en: Ultimately, this process will hasten the protection, respect and promotion of  all African and minority languages on the internet as enunciated in the principles of the African Declaration on Internet Rights and Freedom.
swa: Hatimaye, mchakato huu utaharakisha ulindwaji, uheshimiwaji na ukuzaji lugha zote za Kiafrika na lugha zingenezo ndogo mtandaoni kama inavyoafikiwa katika kanuni za Azimio la Afrika la Haki za mtandao na Uhuru.
mt0: Huku katika ukweli, utaratibu huu utasaidia kuendeleza, kuheshimu na kuendeleza lugha zote za Kiafrika na lugha za chini katika mtandao kama ilivyoandikwa katika principles of the African Declaration on Internet Rights and Freedom.

en: Building on Writing Toward Freedom: Politics and digital rights in Africa, this five-week social media outreach initiative will involve a curated dialogue on @GVSSAfrica featuring five African language activists who will focus on the intersection of language and digital rights.
swa: Kama mwendelezo wa Uandishi wa Kuelekea kwenye Uhuru: Siasa na haki za kidijitali barani Afrika , kampeni hii ya wiki tano ya mtandao wa kijamii kuhamasisha jamii itashirikisha mjadala ulioandaliwa na @GVSSAfrica ukiwashirikisha wanaharakati wa lugha tano za Kiafrika, ambao wataangazia uwiano wa lugha na haki za kidijitali.

en: The activists will tweet in African languages like Bambara, Igbo, Khoekhoe, N|uu, Swahili, Yorb, in addition to French and English.
swa: Wanaharakati hao watatwiti kwa lugha za ki-Afrika kama vile ki-Bambara, ki-Igbo, ki-Khoekhoe, ki-N|uu, ki-Swahili, ki-Yorb, sambamba na ki-Faransa na ki-Ingereza.

en: They will also share their personal experiences and insights using a language lens on challenges and threats to digital rights.
swa: Pia wataweza kutushirikisha uzoefu na uelewa wao binafsi kwa mtazamo wa lugha kuhusu changamoto zinazotishia haki za kidijitali.
mt0: - 'Wao pia watashiriki uzoefu wao na maoni yao kwa kutumia lugha ya uelewa kuhusu changamoto na tishio kwa haki za digitali.

en: The conversations will interrogate how threats to net neutrality marginalize digital content in African languages; the expansion of mis- and disinformation in African languages on various digital platforms and what companies or civil society are doing about it; the effects of a lack of affordable internet connectivity in places where there are large communities of speakers of an African language; the importance of and challenges for the right to access information in digital spaces in African languages.
swa: Mazungumzo hayo yatahoji namna gani tishio la kutoegemea upande wowote mtandaoni linavyoathiri maudhui ya mtandaoni kwenye lugha za Kiafrika; uenezaji wa taarifa potovu katika lugha za Kiafrika kwenye lugha tofauti mtandaoni na kile kinachofanywa na makampuni au mashirika ya kijamii kuhusiana na hili; athari za ukosekanaji wa mtandao wa bei nafuu katika maeneo yaliyo na jamii kubwa za wazungumzaji wa lugha ya Kiafrika; umuhimu wa na changamoto za haki ya kupata taarifa katika lugha za kidijitali a Kiafrika.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know The conversations will interrogate how threats to net neutrality marginalize digital content in African languages; the expansion of mis- and disinformation in African languages on various digital platforms and what companies or civil society are doing about it; the effects of a lack of affordable internet connectivity in places where there are large communities of speakers of an African language; the importance of and challenges for the right to access information in digital spaces in African languages.

en: They will also look at corporate policies, as well as ongoing challenges that may affect how citizens can freely express themselves in their language.
swa: Vile vile, wataangazia suala la sera za mashirika, na pia changamoto zinazoendelea kuwepo zenye uwezo wa kuathiri jinsi raia wanavyoweza kujielezea huru katika lugha yao.

en: Adn Ayni, otherwise known as m Yob, is a journalist and cultural advocate who took up the socialization function of the media through the preservation, dissemination and transmission of the Yorb cultural heritage both online and offline.
swa: Adn Ayni, ambaye pia anajulikana kama m Yob, ni mwandishi wa habari na mwanaharati wa utamaduni ambaye anatumia kazi yake ya uanahabari kuendeleza utunzaji, na usambazaji wa urithi wa utamaduni wa Kiyorb mtandaoni na nje ya mtandao.
mt0: - 'Adesina Ayeni, au 'Mwana Yoruba', ni mwanahabari na mtaalamu wa utamaduni ambaye alichukua jukumu la kuendeleza, kueneza na kueneza utamaduni wa Yoruba katika njia ya habari ya kijamii.

en: As a voice-over artist, he has produced countless Yorb advertisements for Nigeria radio campaigns and TVC.
swa: Kama msanii wa sauti, ametayarisha matangazo mengi ya Kiyorb ya kampeni za redio za Naijeria na TVC.
mt0: Kama msanii wa uandishi wa habari, amefanya matangazo mengi ya Yorb kwa ajili ya kampeni za radio na TVC za Nigeria.

en: He's the founder of Yobamoodua Cultural Heritage, a platform dedicated to the propagation of the Yorb language and culture.

mt0: He's the founder of Yobamoodua Cultural Heritage, a platform dedicated to the propagation of the Yorb language and culture.

en: m Yob is also the lngua manager for the Global Voices Yorb site.

mt0: Return only translation. If you cannot translate simply say you don't know

en: He is a Yorb language instructor on tribalingua.com where he tutors students from all over the world.

mt0: Ni mtaalamu wa lugha ya Yoruba kwenye TribaLingua.com ambapo hufundisha wanafunzi kutoka nchi zote duniani.

en: He has also worked with Localization Lab, an international community of volunteer translators and end-users, developers and intermediaries who work together to translate and localize digital security and circumvention tools.
swa: Pia amefanya kazi na Localization Lab, jamii ya kimataifa ya watafsiri wa kujitolea na watumiaji mtandao, watengenezaji programu za kompyuta, na wapatanishaji ambao wanafanya kazi kwa pamoja kutafsiri na kubinafsisha vifaa vya usalama vya kidijitali na ala za kukwepa ufungiwaji au uzimwaji mtandao.
mt0: He also worked with Localization Lab, a community of volunteer translators and end-users, developers and intermediaries who work together to translate and localize digital security and circumvention tools.

en: m Yob has written a book titled: y Ara d m nyn, a compilation of labeled diagrams of the anatomy and morphology of the human body and herbs that work wonders on each part of the body.
swa: m Yob ameandika kitabu kiitwacho: y Ara d m nyn, mkusanyiko wa michoro yenye majina ya anatomia na muundo wa mwili wa binadamu na mimea ambayo hufanya kazi ya kushangaza kwenye kila sehemu ya mwili.
mt0: Mwana Yoba ameandika kitabu kinachoitwa: Mwili wa Mwanadamu, compilation of labeled diagrams of the anatomy and morphology of the human body and herbs that work wonders on each part of the body.

en: Protesters demand the removal of then-President Robert Mugabe (now deceased) from power on November 18, 2017.
swa: Waandamanaji wakishinikiza kuondolewa kwa aliyekuwa rais Robert Mugabe (ambaye sasa ni marehemu) kutoka madarakani mnamo Novemba 18, 2017.
mt0: Protesters demand the removal of then-President Robert Mugabe (now deceased) from power on November 18, 2017.

en: In the early morning of November 15, 2017, Zimbabweans woke up to the news that former strongman, the late Robert Mugabe, had been deposed in a coup d'etat, and was under house arrest with his family at the presidential residence, State House.
swa: Mapema asubuhi ya Novemba 15, 2017, raia wa Zimbabwe waliamka na habari zilizoenea kwamba aliyekuwa mbabe, marehemu Robert Mugabe, alikuwa amengolewa madarakani katika mapinduzi ya serikali, na alikuwa nguvuni kwenye makazi yake, Ikulu, pamoja na familia yake.
mt0: In the early morning of November 15, 2017, Zimbabweans woke up to the news that former strongman, the late Robert Mugabe, had been deposed in a coup d'etat, and was under house arrest with his family at the presidential residence, State House.

en: Major General Sibusiso Moyo, now foreign affairs minister, announced on state television that the president was safe under state custody and that the situation has moved to another level.
swa: Meja Jenerali Sibusiso Moyo, ambaye kwa sasa ni waziri wa mambo ya nje, alitangaza kwenye runinga ya taifa kuwa rais huyo alikuwa salama chini ya ulinzi wa serikali na kwamba hali ya mambo iko katika ngazi nyingine.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, uambie tu kwamba Major General Sibusiso Moyo, sasa Wizara ya Mambo ya Nje, alisema kwenye televisheni ya serikali kwamba rais alikuwa salama chini ya utawala wa serikali na kwamba hali imebadilika.

en: Almost immediately following General Moyos announcement, Zimbabweans fervently took to social media  in particular, WhatsApp, Twitter and Facebook  to get updates on the situation.
swa: Mara tu baada ya tangazo hilo la Jenerali Moyo, raia wa Zimbabwe walimiminika kwa msisimko mkubwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii  hasa WhatsApp, Twitter na Facebook  ili kupata taarifa mpya kuhusu hali hiyo.
mt0: Almost immediately following General Moyos announcement, Zimbabweans fervently took to social media in particular, WhatsApp, Twitter and Facebook to get updates on the situation.

en: This newfound popularity of social media to access information and mobilise protests took root for the first time among Zimbabweans, when protesters took to the streets and helped push Mugabe out of office.
swa: Kwa mara ya kwanza, umaarufu mpya wa mitandao ya kijamii kuwezesha kupata habari na kuhamasisha maandamano ulimea mizizi miongoni mwa raia wa Zimbabwe, wakati waandamanaji walipoingia mitaani na kusaidia kushinikiza kuondolewa kwa Mugabe madarakani.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kuelewa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: The new government, led by Emmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa, took notice of social medias power.
swa: Serikali mpya, iliyoongozwa na Emmerson Dambudzo Mnangagwa,ilingamua mara nguvu ya  mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: As a former state security minister, Mnangagwa also appreciated the importance and value of disinformation in Zimbabwes political terrain.
swa: Kama waziri wa zamani wa usalama wa nchi, Mnangagwa pia alitambua umuhimu na nafasi ya  upotoshaji taarifa katika nyanja za kisiasa za Zimbabwe.
mt0: Kama mtu aliyekuwa serikalini, Mnangagwa pia alielewa umuhimu na umuhimu wa disinformation katika siasa za Zimbabwe.

en: In a calculated move to consolidate newfound political power and ensure an electoral victory during the presidential and legislative elections scheduled for next year, Mnangagwa instructed his ruling ZANU PF (Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front) party youth league to enter the social media and online firmament and batter the opponent, back in March 2018.
swa: Mnamo mwezi Machi, 2018, kwa kutambua mara na ili kujitwalia mamlaka ya kisiasa yaliyojianika mbele yake na ili kuhakikisha ushindi katika uchaguzi wa rais na wabunge katika mwaka uliofuatia, Mnangagwa aliamuru umoja wa vijana wa chama tawala cha  ZANU PF (Zimbabwe National Union-Patriotic Front) kujimwaga katika mitandao ya kijamii na mtandaoni na kuwachafua na kuwashambulia wapinzani.
mt0: In a calculated move to consolidate newfound political power and ensure an electoral victory during the presidential and legislative elections scheduled for next year, Mnangagwa instructed his ruling ZANU PF (Zimbabwe African National Union-Patriotic Front) party youth league to enter the social media and online firmament and batter the opponent, back in March 2018.

en: In post-Mugabe Zimbabwe, this has exacerbated a mis- and disinformation crisis, leaving Zimbabweans with few credible and accurate sources of information to stay informed about the countrys transition and and anti-government protests.
swa: Katika Zimbabwe baada ya Mugabe, mpango wake huu umeimarisha mgogoro wa upotoshaji na utoaji taarifa zisizo za kweli, na hivyo kuwaacha Wazimbabwe na vyanzo vichache tu vya kuaminika vya kupata habari na kujua kuhusu yanayoendelea katika kipindi cha mpito na maandamano ya kupinga serikali.
mt0: In Zimbabwe ya baada ya Mugabe, hii imepelekea uharibifu wa habari na udanganyifu, ikiwaacha Zimbabweans na habari ndogo ambazo ni kweli na ambazo ni sahihi ili kuendelea kuwa na habari kuhusu utawala na maandamano ya utawala.

en: While the new government decried fake news pertaining to any news circulated on social media that they perceived to threaten the countrys status quo, it also deployed tactics aimed at misleading the public about its handling of anti-government protests.
swa: Wakati ambapo serikali mpya ilijidai kulaani habari za uongo  kwa taarifa zilizosambazwa kwenye mitandao ya kijamii na ambazo waliziona kuwa tishio utawala ulio madarakani,  pia ilifanya hila ilikuupotosha umma kuhusu namna ilivyoshughulika na maandamano ya kuipinga serikali.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Wakati serikali mpya ilipinga habari za uongo zinazohusu habari zilizosambazwa kwenye mtandao wa kijamii ambazo waliona kwamba zilitishia usalama wa nchi, ilitumia njia za udanganyifu ili kudanganya umma kuhusu uendeshaji wake wa maandamano dhidi ya serikali.

en: The bane of online free expression
swa: Kero ya uhuru wa kujieleza mtandaoni
mt0: - Return only translation. - If you can't translate simply say you don't know

en: Zimbabwe has witnessed a significant rise in mobile internet and social media usage over the past few years.
swa: Zimbabwe imeshuhudia ongezeko kubwa la matumizi ya intaneti kwenye simu za mkononi na mitandao ya kijamii katika miaka michache iliyopita.
mt0: Return only. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Zimbabwe has witnessed a significant rise in mobile internet and social media usage over the past few years.

en: The internet penetration rate increased by 41.1 percent, from 11 percent of the population to 52.1 percent between 2010 and 2018, while mobile phone penetration increased by 43.8 percent from 58.8 percent to 102.7 percent over the same period.
swa: Kiwango cha kuenea kwa intaneti kiliongezeka kwa asilimia 41.1, kutoka asilimia 11 ya idadi ya watu hadi asilimia 52.1 kati ya 2010 na 2018, wakati kuenea kwa simu za mkononi kuliongezeka kwa asilimia 43.8 kutoka asilimia 58.8 hadi asilimia 102.7 kwa kipindi hicho hicho.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, uthibitishe tu kwamba unajua. Internet penetration rate iliongezeka kwa 41.1 per cent, kutoka 11 per cent ya watu hadi 52.1 per cent kati ya 2010 na 2018, na penetration ya simu za mkononi iliongezeka kwa 43.8 per cent kutoka 58.8 per cent to 102.7 per cent katika kipindi hicho.

en: This means that half the population is now connected to the internet, compared to only 11 percent in 2010.
swa: Hii inamaanisha kuwa nusu ya idadi ya watu sasa imeunganishwa na intaneti, ikilinganishwa na asilimia 11 tu katika mwaka 2010.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba nusu ya watu sasa wanaunganishwa na intaneti, kuliko 11% katika 2010.

en: However, mis- and disinformation have found fertile ground to flourish owing to a variety of factors: extreme polarisation in the media, proposed government controls over social media, poor official communication methods and low digital literacy among internet users.
swa: Hata hivyo, upotoshaji na utoaji taarifa za uongo nao vimepata mazingira ya kushamiri kwa sababu kadhaa: mgawanyiko mkubwa katika vyombo vya habari, mapendekezo ya serikali kudhibiti mitandao ya kijamii, njia hafifu za mawasiliano rasmi na na elimu duni miongoni mwa watumiaji wa intaneti.
mt0: Hata hivyo, udanganyifu na udanganyifu wamepata eneo la kuendeleza kwa sababu ya mambo mengi: ulinganifu mkubwa katika media, usimamizi wa serikali wa media za kijamii, njia mbaya za mawasiliano ya serikali, na uelewa mdogo wa digital kwa watumiaji wa internet.

en: During the anti-government protests of January 2019, when state security forces arrested and beat hundreds of protesters, news of these clampdowns competed with government claims of fake news or their absolute denial.
swa: Wakati wa maandamano dhidi ya serikali ya Januari 2019, kipindi vikosi vya usalama vya serikali vilipowakamata na kuwashambulia mamia ya waandamanaji, habari za ukandamizaji huu zilishindana na madai ya serikali kwamba zilikuwa habari za uongo au pale ilipokanusha kabisa kuwepo kwake.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, uthibitisho wa ukamataji wa serikali katika maandamano ya Januari 2019, wakati serikali ya serikali ilikamata na kukamata zaidi ya watu 100,000, uhabari wa ukamataji huo ulishindana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitisho wa serikali kwamba ukamataji huo ulifanana na uthibitish

en: The government restricted access to internet services to disrupt the flow of information and contribute to widespread confusion.
swa: Serikali ilizuia upatikanaji wa huduma za intaneti ili kuvuruga mtiririko wa habari na hivyo kuleta mkanganyiko mkubwa.
mt0: Uhuru wa upatikanaji wa huduma za intaneti ulisimamiwa na serikali ili kudisrupt usafirishaji wa habari na kusababisha uchanganyaji mkubwa.

en: They and their supporters also resorted to public misinformation about the protests and discredited any truthful information or reports as fake news.
swa: Viongozi wa serikali na wafuasi wao pia walitumia mbinu ya kupotosha taarifa kuhusu maandamano hayo na kupenyeza mashaka katika taarifa zozote zilizokuwa za weli kwa kuzipachika jina la habari za uongo.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui.

en: In Zimbabwe, citizens usually regard general statements issued by government ministers as official policy.
swa: Kwa kawaida, nchini Zimbabwe,  raia huzichukulia taarifa zozote zitolewazo na mawaziri wa serikali kama ndio sahihi.
mt0: In Zimbabwe, watu usually regard general statements issued by government ministers as official policy.

en: For example, Deputy Information Minister Energy Mutodi sought to convince people that everything was normal and that videos and images of the military patrolling the streets were the work of a few rogue individuals.
swa: Kwa mfano, Naibu Waziri wa Habari Energy Mutodi alijitokeza kuwashawishi watu kuwa kila kitu kilikuwa shwari na kwamba video na picha za wanajeshi waliokuwa wakipiga doria mitaani zilitengenezwa na wahuni wachache.
mt0: Kwa mfano, Waziri wa Habari Mutodi alitaka kuwashawishi watu kwamba kila kitu kilikuwa sawa na kwamba video na picha za ukamataji wa usalama wa raia walikuwa kazi ya watu wachache wenye uovu.

en: Mutodi further misled the nation when he claimed on state television that there was no internet shutdown but rather a congested network.
swa: Mutodi alizidi kupotosha taifa pale alipodai kwenye runinga ya taifa kwamba hakukuwepo na uzimwaji wa intaneti bali kulikuwa na msongamano katika mtandao.
mt0: Mtodi aliendelea kuidanganya nchi hiyo wakati aliposema kwenye televisheni ya serikali kwamba hakukuwa na kizuizi cha internet bali alikuwa na mtandao ulioharibika.

en: In another suspected case of possible government-sanctioned disinformation, millions of people remained cut off from social media during the January protests.
swa: Katika kisa kingine kinachoshukiwa kuwa ni upotoshaji habari unaoungwa mkono na serikali, mamilioni wa watu walizimiwa mitandao ya kijamii wakati wa maandamano ya Januari.
mt0: Inawezekana kwamba katika swali lingine la uwezekano wa utawala-kulazimishwa udanganyifu, mamilioni ya watu walibakia mbali na mtandao wa kijamii wakati wa maandamano ya Januari.

en: Others downloaded Virtual Private Network (VPN) applications to stay informed, but messages circulated that downloading such applications would lead to arrests, creating further panic and apprehension.
swa: Wengine walipakua zana za  huduma ya kubaki hewani kwa ushirika inayojulikana kama Virtual Private Network (VPN) ili kuendelea kuhabarika, hata hivyo taarifa ilisambazwa kwamba kupakua zana kama hizo kungesababisha kukamatwa, hali iliyozidi kusababisha hofu na taharuki.
mt0: Mengine walidownload programu za Virtual Private Network (VPN) ili kuendelea kuhabarishwa, lakini messages zilisambaa kwamba kudownload programu hizi ilikuwa na maana ya kukamatwa, kuongeza hofu na unyanyasaji.

en: When in March 2019, Human Rights Watch (HRW) tweeted a report denouncing the governments use of horrific violence during the January 2019 protests, government supporters took to Twitter to discredit and attack HRW.
swa: Mwezi Machi 2019, wakati Shirika la Haki za Kibinadamu (HRW) lilichapisha kwa twiti ripoti iliyolaani matumizi ya ukatili wa kutisha wa serikali kudhibiti maandamano ya Januari 2019, wafuasi wa serikali walitumia Twita kulichafua na kulishambulia shirika hilo la HRW.
mt0: In March 2019, Human Rights Watch (HRW) tweeted a report denouncing the governments use of horrific violence during the January 2019 protests, government supporters took to Twitter to discredit and attack HRW.

en: One user tweeted that the organization is spreading blatant lies and described HRW as neo-colonial organization hired to malign innocent countries to push the US's hegemonic goals.
swa: Mtumiaji mmoja alituma ujumbe wa twita kuwa shirika hilo lilikuwa linaeneza uongo wa waziwazi na kuliita kuwa lilikuwashirika la ukoloni mamboleo  lililopewa kazi ya kuzishinikiza nchi zisizo na hatia ili zitetee malengo ya kibeberu Marekani.
mt0: Mtumiaji mmoja alitwiti kwamba shirika hilo linaeneza uongo usio wa kweli na kulifafanua HRW kama shirika la kikoloni lililoajiriwa kudanganya nchi huru ili kuendeleza lengo la utawala wa Marekani.

en: Another repeated government claims and blamed the violence on rogue elements who are trying [sic] destroy the image of the president.
swa: Mwingine alirejelea madai ya serikali na kulalama kuwa vurugu hizo zilitokana na wahuni ambao walikuwa wanajaribu [sic] kumchafulia rais .
mt0: Another repeated government claims and blamed the violence on rogue elements who are trying [sic] to destroy the image of the president.

en: And disinformation about government policies and other events of public interest have continued well beyond the January protests.

en: Zimbabwes historic conundrum
swa: Kizungumkuti cha historia ya Zimbabwe
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Zimbabwe's historic conundrum.

en: Media control in Zimbabwe bears its origins in colonial policies of the 20th century, which were tainted with violent subjugation to political authority.
swa: Udhibiti wa vyombo vya habari nchini Zimbabwe una chimbuko katika sera za kikoloni za karne ya 20, ambao ulitiwa doa kwa matumizi ya nguvu ili kunyongonyeza mbele ya mamlaka za kisiasa.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hizi ueleze kwamba utawala wa media katika Zimbabwe unatokana na siasa za kikoloni za karne ya 20, ambazo ziliharibiwa na utawala wa kijeshi.

en: The Ian Smith-led Rhodesian government valued propaganda and centralised information control as a weapon of choice, not only to endorse the regimes believed legitimacy but to spread disinformation about the war.
swa: Serikali ya Rhodhesia iliyoongozwa na Ian Smith ilijikita katika propaganda na kudhibiti habari kama silaha yake bora zaidi, sio tu kuunga uhalali wa serikali hiyo bali pia kueneza taarifa potovu kuhusu vita.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali kabisa, uthibitisho na usimamizi wa habari katika serikali ya Ian Smith ilikuwa silaha ya uamuzi, si tu kuunga mkono serikali ambazo ilikuwa na haki ya kuwepo, bali pia kueneza udanganyifu kuhusu vita.

en: The colonial government passed a plethora of laws to suppress free expression or dissent against Smiths racist policies and they brutally enforced these laws to target liberation leaders.
swa: Serikali ya kikoloni ilipitisha idadi kubwa ya sheria za kukandamiza kujieleza au kupinga sera za kibaguzi za Smith na ilitekeleza sheria hizi kwa ukatili mno kuwalenga viongozi wa ukombozi.
mt0: Huku utawala wa kikoloni ukiweka sheria nyingi za kuzuia uhuru wa uhuru au uasi dhidi ya siasa za kirasi za Smith na utawala huo ulifanya vitendo vikali vya utekelezaji wa sheria hizi ili kushambulia viongozi wa uhuru.

en: Information blockades were the norm even before independence in 1980, and this set the government's tone in terms of communication policies and media management for years to come.
swa: Udhibiti wa habari ilikuwa hali ya kawaida kabla ya uhuru mwaka wa 1980, na hali hii iliweka mfano wa serikali katika suala la sera za mawasiliano na usimamizi wa vyombo vya habari kwa miaka mingi iliyofuatia.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali ulisema kwamba kizuizi cha habari ilikuwa kawaida hata kabla ya uhuru wa 1980, na ilikuwa njia ya serikali ya siasa na usimamizi wa media kwa miaka mingi.

en: Today, Mnangagwa continues this legacy, suppressing voices of critics through online disinformation tactics and internet shutdowns.

en: This article is part of a series of posts examining interference with digital rights through methods such as network shutdowns and disinformation during key political events in seven African countries: Algeria, Ethiopia, Mozambique, Nigeria, Tunisia, Uganda, and Zimbabwe.
swa: Makala haya ni sehemu ya mfululizo wa machapisho yanayochunguza kuingiliwa kwa haki za dijitali kupitia mbinu kama vile ufungwaji wa mtandao wa intaneti na upotoshaji habari wakati wa matukio muhimu ya kisiasa katika nchi saba za Afrika: Algeria, Ethiopia, Msumbiji, Nigeria, Tunisia, Uganda, na Zimbabwe.

en: The project is funded by the Africa Digital Rights Fund of The Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).

en: In Uganda, the internet has become a battleground where the government attempts to silence a growing online population voicing dissent.
swa: Nchini Uganda, mtandao umekuwa uga wa makabiliano pale serikali inapojaribu kunyamazisha sauti ya upinzani inayozidi kukua mtandaoni.
mt0: In Uganda, intaneti imekuwa eneo la vita ambapo serikali inajaribu kuzima idadi kubwa ya watu wanaotoa ukosoaji kwenye intaneti.

en: For years, Ugandan authorities have deployed different tactics to stifle political dissent and keep the ruling National Resistance Movement party and President Yoweri Museveni in power.
swa: Kwa miaka mingi, mamlaka za Uganda zimetumia mbinu tofauti kuukandamiza upinzani na kukirudisha chama tawala cha National Resistance Movement na Rais Yoweri Museveni madarakani.
mt0: Kwa miaka mingi, serikali ya Uganda imetumia njia tofauti ili kudhibiti uasi wa kisiasa na kuweka serikali ya urais Yoweri Museveni na serikali yake katika utawala.

en: This includes blocking media websites, filtering SMS and shutting down social media platforms.
swa: Hii ni pamoja na kuzuia tovuti za vyombo vya habari, kuchuja ujumbe mfupi (SMS) na kuzima majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: Hii inajumuisha kuzuia tovuti za habari, kukata SMS na kufunga tovuti za kijamii.

en: As Ugandas 2021 general election approaches, authorities are expected to continue deploying similar tactics.
swa: Wakati uchaguzi mkuu wa Uganda wa 2021 unapokaribia, viongozi wa utawala wanatarajiwa kuendeleza mbinu kama hizi.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, ulisema kwamba haujui. Wakati uchaguzi wa urais wa Uganda ujao, serikali inatarajiwa kuendeleza njia sawa.

en: 2016 election shutdowns
swa: Ufungwaji wakati wa uchaguzi wa 2016
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kabisa, kisha uambie kwamba haujui 2016 uchaguzi kuzuia.

en: During the 2016 general elections, Ugandan authorities resorted to shutting down entire social media platforms twice.
swa: Wakati wa uchaguzi mkuu wa 2016, viongozi wa Uganda walilazimika kuyafunga mara mbili majukwaa yote ya mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: Wakati wa uchaguzi wa urais wa 2016, Uganda ilitumia njia mbili za kuzuia kabisa shughuli za kijamii.

en: The first shutdown took place on February 18, 2016, on the eve of the presidential election, and it affected social media platforms and mobile money services.
swa: Ufungwaji wa kwanza ulitekelezwa mnamo Februari 18, 2016, wakati wa mkesha wa uchaguzi wa urais, na uliathiri majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali hapo chini, uthibitishe tu kwamba haujui. Shutdown ya kwanza ilifanyika Februari 18, 2016, siku ya uchaguzi wa rais, na iliathiri matangazo ya kijamii na huduma za fedha za simu.

en: The restrictions lasted for four full days.
swa: Uzuiaji huu ulidumu kwa jumla ya siku nne.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know.

en: On May 11, 2016, social media platforms including Facebook, WhatsApp and Twitter and mobile money transfer services were once again blocked.
swa: Mnamo Mei 11, 2016, majukwaa ya mitandao ya kijamii, ikiwemo Facebook, WhatsApp na Twita na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu zilifungwa kwa mara nyingine.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri kisha ulisema kwamba haujui. On May 11, 2016, vituo vya kijamii kama vile Facebook, WhatsApp na Twitter na huduma za malipo za simu zilikatazwa tena.

en: This shutdown lasted for one day and took place a day before President Museveni was sworn in for his fifth term as president.
swa: Kufungwa huku kulidumu kwa siku moja na kulifanyika siku moja kabla ya Rais Museveni kuapishwa kwa muhula wake wa tano kama rais.
mt0: Hii ilikuwa kizuizi kwa siku moja na ilifanyika siku moja kabla ya Rais Museveni kuchukua urais wake wa tano.

en: Museveni has been in power since 1986.
swa: Museveni amekuwa madarakani tangu 1986.
mt0: Return only translation. If you can't translate simply say you don't know Museveni has been in power since 1986.

en: Opposition to his rule is growing: According to a public opinion poll released in April 2019, an overall majority of Ugandans opposed a 2017 decision to remove the maximum age limit of 75 to run for president, which would allow the 74-year-old to run again in the 2021 elections.
swa: Upinzani dhidi ya uongozi wake unaimarika: Kulingana na kura ya maoni iliyotolewa mnamo Aprili 2019, idadi ya Waganda wengi inapinga uamuzi wa 2017 wa kuondoa kigezo cha umri wa 75 waa kugombea urais, ambacho kingeweza kumruhusu rais huyo mwenye umri wa miaka 74 kuwania tena katika uchaguzi wa 2021.
mt0: Opposition to his rule is growing: According to a public opinion poll released in April 2019, a majority of Ugandans opposed a 2017 decision to remove the maximum age limit of 75 to run for president, which would allow the 74-year-old to run again in the 2021 elections.

en: During both shutdowns in 2016, the Ugandan government cited national security as the motivation behind restrictions.
swa: Wakati wa matukio yote ya ufungwaji mwaka 2016, serikali ya Uganda ilitaja kuwa sababu ilikuwa ni usalama wa kitaifa ili kudhibiti mtandao.
mt0: Wakati wa utawala wa Uganda katika miaka miwili ya 2016, serikali ya Uganda ilichukulia usalama wa nchi kama sababu ya utawala.

en: The disruptions were ordered by Ugandas security agencies and the Uganda Communications Commission (UCC), which regulates the telecommunications sector, online publications, broadcasting (both radio and television), film industry, postal and courier services.
swa: Uvurugwaji uliagizwa na vyombo vya usalama vya Uganda na Tume ya Mawasiliano ya Uganda (UCC), ambayo inasimamia sekta ya mawasiliano, machapisho ya mtandaoni, utangazaji (wote redio na runinga), tasnia ya filamu, huduma za posta, usambazaji barua na vifurushi.
mt0: Ugandan security agencies and the Uganda Communications Commission (UCC) ordered the disruptions. UCC regulates the telecommunications sector, online publications, broadcasting (radio and television), film industry, postal and courier services.

en: On February 18, 2016, MTN Uganda, a telecommunications service provider, issued a statement on Twitter confirming that UCC, the regulator had directed MTN to disable all social media and mobile money services due to a threat to public order and safety.
swa: Mnamo Februari 18, 2016, MTN Uganda, mtoa huduma ya mawasiliano ya simu na mtandao, ilitoa taarifa kwenye Twita ikithibitisha kwamba UCC, ilikuwa imeiagiza MTN kufunga huduma zote za mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu kwa sababu ya tishio la kiusalama kwa umma.
mt0: MTN Uganda, a telecommunications service provider, released a statement on Twitter confirming that UCC, the regulator had directed MTN to disable all social media and mobile money services due to a threat to public order and safety.

en: This also affected other telecoms companies such as Airtel, Smile, Vodafone, and Africel.
swa: Agizo hili liliziathiri pia kampuni nyingine za simu kama vile Airtel, Smile, Vodafone, na Africel.
mt0: Hii pia iliathiri kampuni nyingine za simu kama Airtel, Smile, Vodafone, na Africel.

en: The same day, President Museveni told journalists that he ordered the blocking of social media: Steps must be taken for security to stop so many getting in trouble, it is temporary because some people use those pathways for telling lies, he said.
swa: Siku hiyo hiyo, Rais Museveni aliwaambia waandishi wa habari kwamba aliamuru kufungwa kwa mitandao ya kijamii: Hatua lazima zichukuliwe kwa ajili ya usalama kuzuia watu wengi kujiingiza kwenye taabu, ni kwa muda mfupi kwa sababu watu wengine hutumia njia hizo kusema uongo, alisema.
mt0: Mnamo siku hiyo, Rais Museveni aliwaambia waandishi habari kwamba aliwaamuru kuzuia utumiaji wa media za kijamii: Mbinu za usalama zinahitaji kuchukuliwa ili kuepuka watu wengi kuingia kwenye shida, ni muda mfupi kwani watu wengine wanatumia njia hizi kusema uongo, alisema.

en: On March 17, in an official declaration during Supreme Court deliberations in which President Musevenis 2016 victory was challenged, the UCC executive director Godfrey Mutabazi explained that he received instructions from the Inspector General of Police, Kale Kayihura, to shut down social media networking sites and mobile money facilities owing to security concerns.
swa: Mnamo Machi 17, katika tamko rasmi wakati wa maamuzi ya Mahakama Kuu ambako ushindi wa Rais Museveni ulipingwa, mkurugenzi mtendaji wa UCC, Godfrey Mutabazi alielezea kwamba alipokea maagizo kutoka kwa Inspekta Jenerali wa Polisi, Kale Kayihura, kufunga tovuti za mitandao ya kijamii na huduma za kutuma pesa kwa njia ya simu kwa sababu za kiusalama.
mt0: In March 17, in an official declaration during Supreme Court deliberations in which President Museveni's 2016 victory was challenged, UCC executive director Godfrey Mutabazi explained that he received instructions from the Inspector General of Police, Kale Kayihura, to shut down social media networking sites and mobile money facilities owing to security concerns.

en: These shutdowns interfered with the rights and daily lives of Ugandans who use the internet and social media platforms to access information, express views and conduct everyday business online.
swa: Kufungwa huku kuliingilia haki na maisha ya kila siku ya Waganda wanaotumia mtandao na majukwa ya mitandao ya kijamii kupata habari, kuelezea maoni na kufanya biashara zao za kila siku.
mt0: Huku kuzuia kufanya kazi kwa uhuru na maisha ya kila siku ya Ugandans, wanaotumia mtandao na media za kijamii kupata habari, kuonyesha maoni na kufanya biashara ya kila siku online.

en: During the weeks prior to the 2016 elections, Ugandans actively tweeted and debated about the elections using hashtags like #UgandaDecides and #UGDebate16.
swa: Majuma kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2016, Waganda walijitolea sana kuchapisha na kujadili kuhusu uchaguzi huo kwa kutumia kibwagizo cha #UgandaDecides na # UGDebate16.
mt0: Wakati wa wiki kabla ya uchaguzi wa 2016, Ugandans walitumia Twitter na kujadili uchaguzi kwa wingi kupitia hashtags kama #UgandaDecides na #UGDebate16.

en: Ugandan citizens level of online civic engagement was sparked by the first-ever televised presidential debates, the first of which was held in January and the second, a week later.
swa: Kiwango cha Waganda cha ushiriki wa raia kwenye mtandao kilichochewa na midahalo ya rais ya kwanza  kabisa kuwahi kurushwa na runinga, wa kwanza ambao ulifanyika mnamo Januari na wa pili, wiki moja baadaye.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri swali simply say you don't know Ugandan citizens level of online civic engagement was sparked by the first televised presidential debates, ambayo ilifanyika mwezi Januari na ilikuwa ya pili, wiki kadhaa baadaye.

en: Even with the social media bans in place, many Ugandans continued to post about the elections using Virtual Private Networks or VPNs.
swa: Licha ya ufungwaji wa mitandao ya kijamii, Waganda wengi waliendelea kutuma taarifa kuhusu uchaguzi kwa kutumia anwani ya mtandao binafsi inayofahamika kama VPN.
mt0: Hata ikiwa sheria za habari za kijamii zimechukuliwa, wengi wa Ugandans waliendelea kuandika kuhusu uchaguzi katika njia za usalama wa kibinafsi au VPNs.

en: On election day, citizens were able to share updates on late arrivals of voting materials at various stations, reports of election malpractice, and provisional election results on social media.
swa: Siku ya uchaguzi, raia waliweza kushiriki yaliyokuwa yanajiri kuhusu kucheleweshwa kwa vifaa vya kupiga kura katika vituo mbali mbali, visa vya udanganyifu katika uchaguzi, na matokeo ya muda ya uchanguzi kwenye mitandao ya kijamii.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri, uthibitisho wa uwasilishaji wa vituo vya kupigia kura, ripoti za udanganyifu wa uchaguzi, na matokeo ya awali ya uchaguzi kwenye media za kijamii.

en: Human rights activists say that targeted shutdowns during election periods slow down communication, just when access to information and citizen expression are most needed.
swa: Wanaharakati wa haki za binadamu wanasema kwamba ufungwaji wa kimkakati wakati wa uchaguzi hupunguza kasi ya mawasiliano, wakati tu upatikanaji wa habari na usemi wa raia unahitajika sana.
mt0: Mbunge alisema kwamba usimamizi uliowekwa katika siasa wakati wa uchaguzi unasitisha uwasiliano, wakati habari na uhuru wa raia unahitajika sana.

en: Internet shutdowns limit people from communicating particular concerns that affect them, such as health, interaction with friends as well sharing of political views and opinions, Moses Owiny, the chief executive of the Center for Multilateral Affairs, an independent platform for policy analysis operating in Uganda and Tanzania, told Global Voices in an interview.
swa: Kufungwa kwa mtandao kunazuia watu kuzungumzia mambo fulani yanayowaathiri, kama vile afya, mwingiliano na marafiki na pia kubadilishana maoni ya kisiasa, Moses Owiny, afisa mkuu wa the Center for Multilateral Affairs, jukwaa huru la uchambuzi wa sera linalofanya shughuli nchini Uganda na Tanzania, aliiambia  Global Voices katika mahojiano.
mt0: If you can't translate the sentence simply say you don't know.

en: According to Owiny, shutdowns primarily aim to stop dissent in politics based on perceived fear by the state that citizens views and concerns are likely to incite the public, an accusation he believes is unfounded and not grounded in reality but assumptions.
swa: Kwa mujibu wa Owiny, ufungwaji hukusudia kuzuia upinzani katika siasa kwa misingi ya hofu ya serikali kwamba maoni ya raia yanaweza kuchochea umma, madai ambayo anaamini hayana msingi kiuhakika ila ni ya kudhaniwa.
mt0: According to Owiny, shutdowns primarily aim to stop dissent in politics based on perceived fear by the state that citizens views and concerns are likely to incite the public, an accusation he believes is unfounded and not grounded in reality but assumptions.

en: Ugandas history of blocking platforms and websites
swa: Historia ya Uganda kufunga majukwaa ya mitandaoni na tovuti
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri Uganda ina historia ya kuzuia platforms na tovuti.

en: On April 14, 2011, the UCC instructed ISPs to temporarily block access to Facebook and Twitter for 24 hours to eliminate connecting and sharing information.
swa: Mnamo Aprili 14, 2011, UCC iliagiza watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) kufunga kwa muda ufikiaji kwa Facebook na Twitter kwa saa 24 ili kuondoa uunganishwaji na ubadilishanaji habari.
mt0: Inategemea tu ISPs. On Aprili 14, 2011, UCC ilielekeza ISPs ku temporarily block access to Facebook and Twitter for 24 hours to eliminate connecting and sharing information.

en: The order came in the heat of opposition-led walk to work protests over rising fuel and food prices.
swa: Agizo hilo lilitolewa wakati wa maandamano motomoto ya walk to work yaliyoongozwa na upinzani kufuatia kupanda kwa bei ya mafuta na chakula.
mt0: Kama hauwezi kutafsiri sheria hiyo uambie kwamba haujui.

en: The regulator stated that security agencies requested the block to minimize social media use in order to prevent violence.
swa: Mamlaka hiyo ya mawasiliano ilisema kwamba vyombo vya usalama viliomba ufungwaji wa matumizi ya mitandao ya kijamii ili kuzuia vurugu.
mt0: Huku serikali ikisema kwamba serikali iliomba uamuzi huo ili kupunguza matumizi ya media ya kijamii ili kuepuka uhalifu.

en: In 2011, the elections were marked with SMS filtration that contained certain words including Egypt, bullet and people power.
swa: Mnamo mwaka wa 2011, uchaguzi ulikumbwa na uchujwaji wa ujumbe mfupi (SMS) wenye maneno fulani yakiwemo Egypt, bullet na people power.
mt0: In 2011, uchaguzi ulitambuliwa kwa SMS filtration ambayo ilijumuisha maneno maalum kama vile bullet, bullet na watu power.

en: In the lead up to the 2006 elections, the UCC instructed ISPs to block access to the website of Radio Katwe for publishing malicious and false information against the ruling National Resistance Movement and its presidential candidate, according to a 2015 ICT policy briefing by Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
swa: Kuelekea uchaguzi mkuu wa 2006, UCC iliagiza watoa huduma za mtandao (ISPs) kuzuia upatikanaji wa wavuti ya Radio Katwe kwa kuchapisha habari mbovu na za uongo dhidi ya chama tawala cha National Resistance Movement na mgombea wake wa urais, kwa mujibu wa chapisho la sera ya tehama la 2015 la Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).
mt0: In the lead up to the 2006 elections, the UCC instructed ISPs to block access to the website of Radio Katwe for publishing malicious and false information against the ruling National Resistance Movement and its presidential candidate, according to a 2015 ICT policy briefing by Collaboration on International ICT Policy for East and Southern Africa (CIPESA).

en: Ugandan authorities blocked access to the radio station and the Daily Monitor website for publishing independently tallied election results.
swa: Mamlaka ya Uganda ilizuia upatikanaji wa matangazo ya kituo hicho cha redio na wavuti wa the Daily Monitor kwa kuchapisha matokeo huru ya uchaguzi.

en: Robert Kyagulanyi, known as Bobi Wine, singer and leader of the opposition party People Power, who is also a member of parliament, has already announced his bid for the presidency.
swa: Robert Kyagulanyi, almaarufu kama Bobi Wine, mwimbaji na kiongozi wa chama cha upinzani cha People Power, ambaye pia ni mbunge, tayari ametangaza azma yake ya kuwania urais.
mt0: Robert Kyagulanyi, known as Bobi Wine, mwimbaji na kiongozi wa chama cha upinzani People Power, ambaye pia ni mbunge, tayari ametangaza nia yake ya urais.

en: Wine currently faces criminal charges for annoying the president and if convicted, he would not be allowed to run.
swa: Bobi Wine kwa sasa anakabiliwa na mashtaka ya jinai kwa kumuudhi rais na ikiwa atapatikana na hatia, hataruhusiwa kuwania.
mt0: Huku Wine akikabiliwa na mashtaka ya uhalifu kwa kumsumbua rais na ikiwa atafikishwa, angekatazwa kufanya urais.

en: According to Human Rights Watch, in 2018 authorities targeted six opposition members including Bobi Wine and Francis Zaake, ahead of the August 15 by-elections in Arua (northern Uganda).
swa: Kwa mujibu wa Human Rights Watch, mnamo 2018 utawala uliwalilenga wabunge sita wa upinzani wakiwemo Bobi Wine na Francis Zaake, kabla ya uchaguzi mdogo wa Agosti 15 huko Arua (kaskazini mwa Uganda).
mt0: Huku uhuru wa raia ukisema, katika 2018 serikali ilishambulia watu sita wa upinzani, ikiwa ni pamoja na Bobi Wine na Francis Zaake, kabla ya uchaguzi wa Oktoba 15 katika Arua (katikati mwa Uganda).

en: Members of the police and military arrested the group along with 28 other people on August 13, 2018, and charged them with treason.
swa: Polisi na jeshi walilikamata kundi hilo pamoja na watu wengine 28 mnamo Agosti 13, 2018, na kuwashtaki kwa uhaini.
mt0: Mwenyekiti wa polisi na serikali walikamatwa pamoja na watu 28 wengine mnamo August 13, 2018, na kuwahukumu kwa uovu.

en: They were later released on bail.
swa: Baadaye waliachiliwa kwa dhamana.

en: That same day, police also arrested two journalists, Herber Zziwa and Ronald Muwanga, as they covered the by-election and related violence, including the deadly shooting by the military of Bobi Wines driver.
swa: Siku hiyo hiyo, polisi pia waliwakamata waandishi wa habari wawili, Herber Zziwa na Ronald Muwanga, walipokuwa wakiripoti kuhusu uchaguzi na vurugu zilizohusiana na uchaguzi huo, ikiwemo mauaji mabaya ya kufyatuliwa risasi dereva wa Bobi Wine yaliyotekelezwa na jeshi.
mt0: Mwishowe, polisi pia walikamata waandishi wa habari, Herber Zziwa na Ronald Muwanga, kwa kuonyesha uchoraji wa uchaguzi na unyanyasaji, ikiwa ni pamoja na ushambuliaji wa usalama wa uendeshaji wa gari la Bobi Wines.
